1	neither shalt thou go up by steps unto mine altar , that thy nakedness be not uncovered thereon .
1	now these are the ordinances which thou shalt set before them .
1	if thou buy a hebrew servant , six years he shall serve : and in the seventh he shall go out free for nothing .
1	if he come in by himself , he shall go out by himself : if he be married , then his wife shall go out with him .
1	but if the servant shall plainly say , i love my master , my wife , and my children ; i will not go out free :
1	and if a man sell his daughter to be a maid-servant , she shall not go out as the men-servants do .
1	and if he espouse her unto his son , he shall deal with her after the manner of daughters .
1	if he take him another wife ; her food , her raiment , and her duty of marriage , shall he not diminish .
1	and if he do not these three things unto her , then shall she go out for nothing , without money .
1	he that smiteth a man , so that he dieth , shall surely be put to death .
1	and if a man lie not in wait , but god deliver him into his hand ; then i will appoint thee a place whither he shall flee .
1	and if a man come presumptuously upon his neighbor , to slay him with guile ; thou shalt take him from mine altar , that he may die .
1	and he that smiteth his father , or his mother , shall be surely put to death .
1	and he that stealeth a man , and selleth him , or if he be found in his hand , he shall surely be put to death .
1	and he that curseth his father or his mother , shall surely be put to death .
1	and if men contend , and one smite the other with a stone , or with his fist , and he die not , but keep his bed ;
1	and if a man smite his servant , or his maid , with a rod , and he die under his hand ; he shall surely be punished .
1	notwithstanding , if he continue a day or two , he shall not be punished : for he is his money .
1	but if any harm follow , then thou shalt give life for life ,
1	eye for eye , tooth for tooth , hand for hand , foot for foot ,
1	burning for burning , wound for wound , stripe for stripe .
1	if there be laid on him a ransom , then he shall give for the redemption of his life whatsoever is laid upon him .
1	whether it have gored a son , or have gored a daughter , according to this judgment shall it be done unto him .
1	if the ox gore a man-servant or a maid-servant , there shall be given unto their master thirty shekels of silver , and the ox shall be stoned .
1	the owner of the pit shall make it good ; he shall give money unto the owner thereof , and the dead beast shall be his .
1	if the thief be found breaking in , and be smitten so that he dieth , there shall be no bloodguiltiness for him .
1	if the theft be found in his hand alive , whether it be ox , or ass , or sheep ; he shall pay double .
1	but if it be stolen from him , he shall make restitution unto the owner thereof .
1	if it be torn in pieces , let him bring it for witness ; he shall not make good that which was torn .
1	if the owner thereof be with it , he shall not make it good : if it be a hired thing , it came for its hire .
1	and if a man entice a virgin that is not betrothed , and lie with her , he shall surely pay a dowry for her to be his wife .
1	if her father utterly refuse to give her unto him , he shall pay money according to the dowry of virgins .
1	thou shalt not suffer a sorceress to live .
1	whosoever lieth with a beast shall surely be put to death .
1	he that sacrificeth unto any god , save unto jehovah only , shall be utterly destroyed .
1	and a sojourner shalt thou not wrong , neither shalt thou oppress him : for ye were sojourners in the land of egypt .
1	ye shall not afflict any widow , or fatherless child .
1	if thou afflict them at all , and they cry at all unto me , i will surely hear their cry ;
1	and my wrath shall wax hot , and i will kill you with the sword ; and your wives shall be widows , and your children fatherless .
1	if thou at all take thy neighbor ’ s garment to pledge , thou shalt restore it unto him before the sun goeth down :
1	thou shalt not revile god , nor curse a ruler of thy people .
1	thou shalt not delay to offer of thy harvest , and of the outflow of thy presses . the first-born of thy sons shalt thou give unto me .
1	thou shalt not take up a false report : put not thy hand with the wicked to be an unrighteous witness .
1	thou shalt not follow a multitude to do evil ; neither shalt thou speak in a cause to turn aside after a multitude to wrest justice :
1	neither shalt thou favor a poor man in his cause .
1	if thou meet thine enemy ’ s ox or his ass going astray , thou shalt surely bring it back to him again .
1	if thou see the ass of him that hateth thee lying under his burden , thou shalt forbear to leave him , thou shalt surely release it with him .
1	thou shalt not wrest the justice due to thy poor in his cause .
1	keep thee far from a false matter ; and the innocent and righteous slay thou not : for i will not justify the wicked .
1	and thou shalt take no bribe : for a bribe blindeth them that have sight , and perverteth the words of the righteous .
1	and a sojourner shalt thou not oppress : for ye know the heart of a sojourner , seeing ye were sojourners in the land of egypt .
1	and six years thou shalt sow thy land , and shalt gather in the increase thereof :
1	three times thou shalt keep a feast unto me in the year .
1	three times in the year all thy males shall appear before the lord jehovah .
1	thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leavened bread ; neither shall the fat of my feast remain all night until the morning .
1	behold , i send an angel before thee , to keep thee by the way , and to bring thee into the place which i have prepared .
1	there shall none cast her young , nor be barren , in thy land : the number of thy days i will fulfil .
1	and i will send the hornet before thee , which shall drive out the hivite , the canaanite , and the hittite , from before thee .
1	i will not drive them out from before thee in one year , lest the land become desolate , and the beasts of the field multiply against thee .
1	by little and little i will drive them out from before thee , until thou be increased , and inherit the land .
1	thou shalt make no covenant with them , nor with their gods .
1	and moses alone shall come near unto jehovah ; but they shall not come near ; neither shall the people go up with him .
1	and he sent young men of the children of israel , who offered burnt-offerings , and sacrificed peace-offerings of oxen unto jehovah .
1	and moses took half of the blood , and put it in basins ; and half of the blood he sprinkled on the altar .
1	then went up moses , and aaron , nadab , and abihu , and seventy of the elders of israel :
1	and upon the nobles of the children of israel he laid not his hand : and they beheld god , and did eat and drink .
1	and moses rose up , and joshua his minister : and moses went up into the mount of god .
1	and moses went up into the mount , and the cloud covered the mount .
1	and the appearance of the glory of jehovah was like devouring fire on the top of the mount in the eyes of the children of israel .
1	and moses entered into the midst of the cloud , and went up into the mount : and moses was in the mount forty days and forty nights .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	speak unto the children of israel , that they take for me an offering : of every man whose heart maketh him willing ye shall take my offering .
1	and this is the offering which ye shall take of them : gold , and silver , and brass ,
1	and blue , and purple , and scarlet , and fine linen , and goats ’ hair ,
1	and rams ’ skins dyed red , and sealskins , and acacia wood ,
1	oil for the light , spices for the anointing oil , and for the sweet incense ,
1	onyx stones , and stones to be set , for the ephod , and for the breastplate .
1	and let them make me a sanctuary , that i may dwell among them .
1	according to all that i show thee , the pattern of the tabernacle , and the pattern of all the furniture thereof , even so shall ye make it .
1	and thou shalt overlay it with pure gold , within and without shalt thou overlay it , and shalt make upon it a crown of gold round about .
1	and thou shalt make staves of acacia wood , and overlay them with gold .
1	and thou shalt put the staves into the rings on the sides of the ark , wherewith to bear the ark .
1	the staves shall be in the rings of the ark : they shall not be taken from it .
1	and thou shalt put into the ark the testimony which i shall give thee .
1	and thou shalt make two cherubim of gold ; of beaten work shalt thou make them , at the two ends of the mercy-seat .
1	and thou shalt put the mercy-seat above upon the ark ; and in the ark thou shalt put the testimony that i shall give thee .
1	and thou shalt overlay it with pure gold , and make thereto a crown of gold round about .
1	and thou shalt make unto it a border of a handbreadth round about ; and thou shalt make a golden crown to the border thereof round about .
1	and thou shalt make for it four rings of gold , and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof .
1	close by the border shall the rings be , for places for the staves to bear the table .
1	and thou shalt make the staves of acacia wood , and overlay them with gold , that the table may be borne with them .
1	and thou shalt set upon the table showbread before me alway .
1	and in the candlestick four cups made like almond-blossoms , the knops thereof , and the flowers thereof ;
1	their knops and their branches shall be of one piece with it ; the whole of it one beaten work of pure gold .
1	and thou shalt make the lamps thereof , seven : and they shall light the lamps thereof , to give light over against it .
1	and the snuffers thereof , and the snuffdishes thereof , shall be of pure gold .
1	of a talent of pure gold shall it be made , with all these vessels .
1	and see that thou make them after their pattern , which hath been showed thee in the mount .
1	the length of each curtain shall be eight and twenty cubits , and the breadth of each curtain four cubits : all the curtains shall have one measure .
1	five curtains shall be coupled together one to another ; and the other five curtains shall be coupled one to another .
1	and thou shalt make fifty clasps of gold , and couple the curtains one to another with the clasps : and the tabernacle shall be one whole .
1	and thou shalt make curtains of goats ’ hair for a tent over the tabernacle : eleven curtains shalt thou make them .
1	the length of each curtain shall be thirty cubits , and the breadth of each curtain four cubits : the eleven curtains shall have one measure .
1	and thou shalt couple five curtains by themselves , and six curtains by themselves , and shalt double over the sixth curtain in the forefront of the tent .
1	and thou shalt make fifty clasps of brass , and put the clasps into the loops , and couple the tent together , that it may be one .
1	and the overhanging part that remaineth of the curtains of the tent , the half curtain that remaineth , shall hang over the back of the tabernacle .
1	and thou shalt make a covering for the tent of rams ’ skins dyed red , and a covering of sealskins above .
1	and thou shalt make the boards for the tabernacle of acacia wood , standing up .
1	ten cubits shall be the length of a board , and a cubit and a half the breadth of each board .
1	two tenons shall there be in each board , joined one to another : thus shalt thou make for all the boards of the tabernacle .
1	and thou shalt make the boards for the tabernacle , twenty boards for the south side southward .
1	and for the second side of the tabernacle , on the north side , twenty boards ,
1	and their forty sockets of silver ; two sockets under one board , and two sockets under another board .
1	and for the hinder part of the tabernacle westward thou shalt make six boards .
1	and two boards shalt thou make for the corners of the tabernacle in the hinder part .
1	and there shall be eight boards , and their sockets of silver , sixteen sockets ; two sockets under one board , and two sockets under another board .
1	and thou shalt make bars of acacia wood ; five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle ,
1	and the middle bar in the midst of the boards shall pass through from end to end .
1	and thou shalt overlay the boards with gold , and make their rings of gold for places for the bars : and thou shalt overlay the bars with gold .
1	and thou shalt rear up the tabernacle according to the fashion thereof which hath been showed thee in the mount .
1	and thou shalt hang it upon four pillars of acacia overlaid with gold ; their hooks shall be of gold , upon four sockets of silver .
1	and thou shalt put the mercy-seat upon the ark of the testimony in the most holy place .
1	and thou shalt make for it a grating of network of brass ; and upon the net shalt thou make four brazen rings in the four corners thereof .
1	and thou shalt put it under the ledge round the altar beneath , that the net may reach halfway up the altar .
1	and thou shalt make staves for the altar , staves of acacia wood , and overlay them with brass .
1	and the staves thereof shall be put into the rings , and the staves shall be upon the two sides of the altar , in bearing it .
1	hollow with planks shalt thou make it : as it hath been showed thee in the mount , so shall they make it .
1	and the pillars thereof shall be twenty , and their sockets twenty , of brass ; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets shall be of silver .
1	and for the breadth of the court on the west side shall be hangings of fifty cubits ; their pillars ten , and their sockets ten .
1	and the breadth of the court on the east side eastward shall be fifty cubits .
1	the hangings for the one side of the gate shall be fifteen cubits ; their pillars three , and their sockets three .
1	and for the other side shall be hangings of fifteen cubits ; their pillars three , and their sockets three .
1	all the pillars of the court round about shall be filleted with silver ; their hooks of silver , and their sockets of brass .
1	and thou shalt command the children of israel , that they bring unto thee pure olive oil beaten for the light , to cause a lamp to burn continually .
1	and thou shalt make holy garments for aaron thy brother , for glory and for beauty .
1	and they shall take the gold , and the blue , and the purple , and the scarlet , and the fine linen .
1	and they shall make the ephod of gold , of blue , and purple , scarlet , and fine twined linen , the work of the skilful workman .
1	it shall have two shoulder-pieces joined to the two ends thereof , that it may be joined together .
1	and thou shalt take two onyx stones , and grave on them the names of the children of israel :
1	six of their names on the one stone , and the names of the six that remain on the other stone , according to their birth .
1	and thou shalt make settings of gold ,
1	and two chains of pure gold ; like cords shalt thou make them , of wreathen work : and thou shalt put the wreathen chains on the settings .
1	foursquare it shall be and double ; a span shall be the length thereof , and a span the breadth thereof .
1	and thou shalt set in it settings of stones , four rows of stones : a row of sardius , topaz , and carbuncle shall be the first row ;
1	and the second row an emerald , a sapphire , and a diamond ;
1	and the third row a jacinth , an agate , and an amethyst ;
1	and the fourth row a beryl , and an onyx , and a jasper : they shall be inclosed in gold in their settings .
1	and thou shalt make upon the breastplate chains like cords , of wreathen work of pure gold .
1	and thou shalt make upon the breastplate two rings of gold , and shalt put the two rings on the two ends of the breastplate .
1	and thou shalt put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings at the ends of the breastplate .
1	and thou shalt make the robe of the ephod all of blue .
1	a golden bell and a pomegranate , a golden bell and a pomegranate , upon the skirts of the robe round about .
1	and thou shalt make a plate of pure gold , and grave upon it , like the engravings of a signet , holy to jehovah .
1	and thou shalt put it on a lace of blue , and it shall be upon the mitre ; upon the forefront of the mitre it shall be .
1	and thou shalt make them linen breeches to cover the flesh of their nakedness ; from the loins even unto the thighs they shall reach :
1	and unleavened bread , and cakes unleavened mingled with oil , and wafers unleavened anointed with oil : of fine wheaten flour shalt thou make them .
1	and thou shalt put them into one basket , and bring them in the basket , with the bullock and the two rams .
1	and aaron and his sons thou shalt bring unto the door of the tent of meeting , and shalt wash them with water .
1	and thou shalt set the mitre upon his head , and put the holy crown upon the mitre .
1	then shalt thou take the anointing oil , and pour it upon his head , and anoint him .
1	and thou shalt bring his sons , and put coats upon them .
1	and thou shalt bring the bullock before the tent of meeting : and aaron and his sons shall lay their hands upon the head of the bullock .
1	and thou shalt kill the bullock before jehovah , at the door of the tent of meeting .
1	but the flesh of the bullock , and its skin , and its dung , shalt thou burn with fire without the camp : it is a sin-offering .
1	thou shalt also take the one ram ; and aaron and his sons shall lay their hands upon the head of the ram .
1	and thou shalt slay the ram , and thou shalt take its blood , and sprinkle it round about upon the altar .
1	and thou shalt take the other ram ; and aaron and his sons shall lay their hands upon the head of the ram .
1	and one loaf of bread , and one cake of oiled bread , and one wafer , out of the basket of unleavened bread that is before jehovah :
1	and thou shalt put the whole upon the hands of aaron , and upon the hands of his sons , and shalt wave them for a wave-offering before jehovah .
1	and thou shalt take the breast of aaron ’ s ram of consecration , and wave it for a wave-offering before jehovah : and it shall be thy portion .
1	and the holy garments of aaron shall be for his sons after him , to be anointed in them , and to be consecrated in them .
1	seven days shall the son that is priest in his stead put them on , when he cometh into the tent of meeting to minister in the holy place .
1	and thou shalt take the ram of consecration , and boil its flesh in a holy place .
1	and thus shalt thou do unto aaron , and to his sons , according to all that i have commanded thee : seven days shalt thou consecrate them .
1	seven days thou shalt make atonement for the altar , and sanctify it : and the altar shall be most holy ; whatsoever toucheth the altar shall be holy .
1	now this is that which thou shalt offer upon the altar : two lambs a year old day by day continually .
1	the one lamb thou shalt offer in the morning ; and the other lamb thou shalt offer at even :
1	and there i will meet with the children of israel ; and the tent shall be sanctified by my glory .
1	and i will dwell among the children of israel , and will be their god .
1	and thou shalt make an altar to burn incense upon : of acacia wood shalt thou make it .
1	and thou shalt make the staves of acacia wood , and overlay them with gold .
1	and aaron shall burn thereon incense of sweet spices : every morning , when he dresseth the lamps , he shall burn it .
1	and when aaron lighteth the lamps at even , he shall burn it , a perpetual incense before jehovah throughout your generations .
1	ye shall offer no strange incense thereon , nor burnt-offering , nor meal-offering ; and ye shall pour no drink-offering thereon .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	every one that passeth over unto them that are numbered , from twenty years old and upward , shall give the offering of jehovah .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and aaron and his sons shall wash their hands and their feet thereat :
1	moreover jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and of cassia five hundred , after the shekel of the sanctuary , and of olive oil a hin ;
1	and thou shalt make it a holy anointing oil , a perfume compounded after the art of the perfumer : it shall be a holy anointing oil .
1	and thou shalt anoint therewith the tent of meeting , and the ark of the testimony ,
1	and the table and all the vessels thereof , and the candlestick and the vessels thereof , and the altar of incense ,
1	and the altar of burnt-offering with all the vessels thereof , and the laver and the base thereof .
1	and thou shalt sanctify them , that they may be most holy : whatsoever toucheth them shall be holy .
1	and thou shalt anoint aaron and his sons , and sanctify them , that they may minister unto me in the priest ’ s office .
1	and thou shalt speak unto the children of israel , saying , this shall be a holy anointing oil unto me throughout your generations .
1	whosoever compoundeth any like it , or whosoever putteth any of it upon a stranger , he shall be cut off from his people .
1	and thou shalt make of it incense , a perfume after the art of the perfumer , seasoned with salt , pure and holy :
1	and the incense which thou shalt make , according to the composition thereof ye shall not make for yourselves : it shall be unto thee holy for jehovah .
1	whosoever shall make like unto that , to smell thereof , he shall be cut off from his people .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	see , i have called by name bezalel the son of uri , the son of hur , of the tribe of judah :
1	and i have filled him with the spirit of god , in wisdom , and in understanding , and in knowledge , and in all manner of workmanship ,
1	to devise skilful works , to work in gold , and in silver , and in brass ,
1	and in cutting of stones for setting , and in carving of wood , to work in all manner of workmanship .
1	the tent of meeting , and the ark of the testimony , and the mercy-seat that is thereupon , and all the furniture of the tent ,
1	and the table and its vessels , and the pure candlestick with all its vessels , and the altar of incense ,
1	and the altar of burnt-offering with all its vessels , and the laver and its base ,
1	and the anointing oil , and the incense of sweet spices for the holy place : according to all that i have commanded thee shall they do .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	wherefore the children of israel shall keep the sabbath , to observe the sabbath throughout their generations , for a perpetual covenant .
1	and all the people brake off the golden rings which were in their ears , and brought them unto aaron .
1	and when aaron saw this , he built an altar before it ; and aaron made proclamation , and said , to-morrow shall be a feast to jehovah .
1	and jehovah said unto moses , i have seen this people , and , behold , it is a stiffnecked people :
1	and jehovah repented of the evil which he said he would do unto his people .
1	and the tables were the work of god , and the writing was the writing of god , graven upon the tables .
1	and when joshua heard the noise of the people as they shouted , he said unto moses , there is a noise of war in the camp .
1	and moses said unto aaron , what did this people unto thee , that thou hast brought a great sin upon them ?
1	and aaron said , let not the anger of my lord wax hot : thou knowest the people , that they are set on evil .
1	and when moses saw that the people were broken loose ( for aaron had let them loose for a derision among their enemies ) ,
1	and the sons of levi did according to the word of moses : and there fell of the people that day about three thousand men .
1	and moses returned unto jehovah , and said , oh , this people have sinned a great sin , and have made them gods of gold .
1	yet now , if thou wilt forgive their sin— ; and if not , blot me , i pray thee , out of thy book which thou hast written .
1	and jehovah said unto moses , whosoever hath sinned against me , him will i blot out of my book .
1	and jehovah smote the people , because they made the calf , which aaron made .
1	and when the people heard these evil tidings , they mourned : and no man did put on him his ornaments .
1	and the children of israel stripped themselves of their ornaments from mount horeb onward .
1	and he said , my presence shall go with thee , and i will give thee rest .
1	and he said unto him , if thy presence go not with me , carry us not up hence .
1	and he said , show me , i pray thee , thy glory .
1	and he said , thou canst not see my face ; for man shall not see me and live .
1	and jehovah said , behold , there is a place by me , and thou shalt stand upon the rock :
1	and i will take away my hand , and thou shalt see my back ; but my face shall not be seen .
1	and be ready by the morning , and come up in the morning unto mount sinai , and present thyself there to me on the top of the mount .
1	and jehovah descended in the cloud , and stood with him there , and proclaimed the name of jehovah .
1	and moses made haste , and bowed his head toward the earth , and worshipped .
1	but ye shall break down their altars , and dash in pieces their pillars , and ye shall cut down their asherim
1	( for thou shalt worship no other god : for jehovah , whose name is jealous , is a jealous god ) ;
1	thou shalt make thee no molten gods .
1	all that openeth the womb is mine ; and all thy cattle that is male , the firstlings of cow and sheep .
1	six days thou shalt work , but on the seventh day thou shalt rest : in plowing time and in harvest thou shalt rest .
1	and thou shalt observe the feast of weeks , even of the first-fruits of wheat harvest , and the feast of ingathering at the year ’ s end .
1	three times in the year shall all thy males appear before the lord jehovah , the god of israel .
1	thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leavened bread ; neither shall the sacrifice of the feast of the passover be left unto the morning .
1	and jehovah said unto moses , write thou these words : for after the tenor of these words i have made a covenant with thee and with israel .
1	and when aaron and all the children of israel saw moses , behold , the skin of his face shone ; and they were afraid to come nigh him .
1	and moses called unto them ; and aaron and all the rulers of the congregation returned unto him : and moses spake to them .
1	and afterward all the children of israel came nigh : and he gave them in commandment all that jehovah had spoken with him in mount sinai .
1	and when moses had done speaking with them , he put a veil on his face .
1	ye shall kindle no fire throughout your habitations upon the sabbath day .
1	and moses spake unto all the congregation of the children of israel , saying , this is the thing which jehovah commanded , saying ,
1	and blue , and purple , and scarlet , and fine linen , and goats ’ hair ,
1	and rams ’ skins dyed red , and sealskins , and acacia wood ,
1	and oil for the light , and spices for the anointing oil , and for the sweet incense ,
1	and onyx stones , and stones to be set , for the ephod , and for the breastplate .
1	and let every wise-hearted man among you come , and make all that jehovah hath commanded :
1	the tabernacle , its tent , and its covering , its clasps , and its boards , its bars , its pillars , and its sockets ;
1	the ark , and the staves thereof , the mercy-seat , and the veil of the screen ;
1	the table , and its staves , and all its vessels , and the showbread ;
1	the candlestick also for the light , and its vessels , and its lamps , and the oil for the light ;
1	the altar of burnt-offering , with its grating of brass , its staves , and all its vessels , the laver and its base ;
1	the hangings of the court , the pillars thereof , and their sockets , and the screen for the gate of the court ;
1	the pins of the tabernacle , and the pins of the court , and their cords ;
1	and all the congregation of the children of israel departed from the presence of moses .
1	and all the women whose heart stirred them up in wisdom spun the goats ’ hair .
1	and the rulers brought the onyx stones , and the stones to be set , for the ephod , and for the breastplate ;
1	and the spice , and the oil ; for the light , and for the anointing oil , and for the sweet incense .
1	and he hath filled him with the spirit of god , in wisdom , in understanding , and in knowledge , and in all manner of workmanship ;
1	and to devise skilful works , to work in gold , and in silver , and in brass ,
1	and in cutting of stones for setting , and in carving of wood , to work in all manner of skilful workmanship .
1	and he hath put in his heart that he may teach , both he , and oholiab , the son of ahisamach , of the tribe of dan .
1	and all the wise men , that wrought all the work of the sanctuary , came every man from his work which they wrought ;
1	and they spake unto moses , saying , the people bring much more than enough for the service of the work which jehovah commanded to make .
1	for the stuff they had was sufficient for all the work to make it , and too much .

1	and he coupled five curtains one to another : and the other five curtains he coupled one to another .
1	and he made fifty clasps of gold , and coupled the curtains one to another with the clasps : so the tabernacle was one .
1	and he made curtains of goats ’ hair for a tent over the tabernacle : eleven curtains he made them .

1	and he coupled five curtains by themselves , and six curtains by themselves .
1	and he made fifty clasps of brass to couple the tent together , that it might be one .
1	and he made a covering for the tent of rams ’ skins dyed red , and a covering of sealskins above .
1	and he made the boards for the tabernacle , of acacia wood , standing up .
1	ten cubits was the length of a board , and a cubit and a half the breadth of each board .
1	each board had two tenons , joined one to another : thus did he make for all the boards of the tabernacle .
1	and he made the boards for the tabernacle : twenty boards for the south side southward ;
1	and for the second side of the tabernacle , on the north side , he made twenty boards ,
1	and their forty sockets of silver ; two sockets under one board , and two sockets under another board .
1	and for the hinder part of the tabernacle westward he made six boards .
1	and two boards made he for the corners of the tabernacle in the hinder part .
1	and there were eight boards , and their sockets of silver , sixteen sockets ; under every board two sockets .
1	and he made bars of acacia wood ; five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle ,
1	and five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle , and five bars for the boards of the tabernacle for the hinder part westward .
1	and he made the middle bar to pass through in the midst of the boards from the one end to the other .
1	and he overlaid the boards with gold , and made their rings of gold for places for the bars , and overlaid the bars with gold .
1	and the five pillars of it with their hooks : and he overlaid their capitals and their fillets with gold ; and their five sockets were of brass .
1	and he overlaid it with pure gold within and without , and made a crown of gold to it round about .
1	and he made staves of acacia wood , and overlaid them with gold .
1	and he put the staves into the rings on the sides of the ark , to bear the ark .
1	and he made a mercy-seat of pure gold : two cubits and a half was the length thereof , and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof .
1	and he made two cherubim of gold ; of beaten work made he them , at the two ends of the mercy-seat ;
1	and he overlaid it with pure gold , and made thereto a crown of gold round about .
1	and he made unto it a border of a handbreadth round about , and made a golden crown to the border thereof round about .
1	and he cast for it four rings of gold , and put the rings in the four corners that were on the four feet thereof .
1	close by the border were the rings , the places for the staves to bear the table .
1	and he made the staves of acacia wood , and overlaid them with gold , to bear the table .
1	and in the candlestick were four cups made like almond-blossoms , the knops thereof , and the flowers thereof ;
1	their knops and their branches were of one piece with it : the whole of it was one beaten work of pure gold .
1	and he made the lamps thereof , seven , and the snuffers thereof , and the snuffdishes thereof , of pure gold .
1	of a talent of pure gold made he it , and all the vessels thereof .
1	and he made the staves of acacia wood , and overlaid them with gold .
1	and he made the holy anointing oil , and the pure incense of sweet spices , after the art of the perfumer .
1	and he made the horns thereof upon the four corners of it ; the horns thereof were of one piece with it : and he overlaid it with brass .
1	and he made for the altar a grating of network of brass , under the ledge round it beneath , reaching halfway up .
1	and he cast four rings for the four ends of the grating of brass , to be places for the staves .
1	and he made the staves of acacia wood , and overlaid them with brass .
1	and he put the staves into the rings on the sides of the altar , wherewith to bear it ; he made it hollow with planks .
1	and he made the court : for the south side southward the hangings of the court were of fine twined linen , a hundred cubits ;
1	their pillars were twenty , and their sockets twenty , of brass ; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets were of silver .
1	and for the east side eastward fifty cubits .
1	the hangings for the one side of the gate were fifteen cubits ; their pillars three , and their sockets three ;
1	all the hangings of the court round about were of fine twined linen .
1	and all the pins of the tabernacle , and of the court round about , were of brass .
1	and bezalel the son of uri , the son of hur , of the tribe of judah , made all that jehovah commanded moses .
1	and of the thousand seven hundred seventy and five shekels he made hooks for the pillars , and overlaid their capitals , and made fillets for them .
1	and the brass of the offering was seventy talents , and two thousand and four hundred shekels .
1	and he made the ephod of gold , blue , and purple , and scarlet , and fine twined linen .
1	they made shoulder-pieces for it , joined together ; at the two ends was it joined together .
1	and he put them on the shoulder-pieces of the ephod , to be stones of memorial for the children of israel ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	it was foursquare ; they made the breastplate double : a span was the length thereof , and a span the breadth thereof , being double .
1	and they set in it four rows of stones . a row of sardius , topaz , and carbuncle was the first row ;
1	and the second row , an emerald , a sapphire , and a diamond ;
1	and the third row , a jacinth , an agate , and an amethyst ;
1	and the fourth row , a beryl , an onyx , and a jasper : they were inclosed in inclosings of gold in their settings .
1	and they made upon the breastplate chains like cords , of wreathen work of pure gold .
1	and they made two settings of gold , and two gold rings , and put the two rings on the two ends of the breastplate .
1	and they put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings at the ends of the breastplate .
1	and he made the robe of the ephod of woven work , all of blue ;
1	and they made upon the skirts of the robe pomegranates of blue , and purple , and scarlet , and twined linen .
1	and they made bells of pure gold , and put the bells between the pomegranates upon the skirts of the robe round about , between the pomegranates ;
1	a bell and a pomegranate , a bell and a pomegranate , upon the skirts of the robe round about , to minister in ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and they made the coats of fine linen of woven work for aaron , and for his sons ,
1	and the mitre of fine linen , and the goodly head-tires of fine linen , and the linen breeches of fine twined linen ,
1	and the girdle of fine twined linen , and blue , and purple , and scarlet , the work of the embroiderer ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and they tied unto it a lace of blue , to fasten it upon the mitre above ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and the covering of rams ’ skins dyed red , and the covering of sealskins , and the veil of the screen ;
1	the ark of the testimony , and the staves thereof , and the mercy-seat ;
1	the table , all the vessels thereof , and the showbread ;
1	the pure candlestick , the lamps thereof , even the lamps to be set in order , and all the vessels thereof , and the oil for the light ;
1	and the golden altar , and the anointing oil , and the sweet incense , and the screen for the door of the tent ;
1	the brazen altar , and its grating of brass , its staves , and all its vessels , the laver and its base ;
1	according to all that jehovah commanded moses , so the children of israel did all the work .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	on the first day of the first month shalt thou rear up the tabernacle of the tent of meeting .
1	and thou shalt put therein the ark of the testimony , and thou shalt screen the ark with the veil .
1	and thou shalt set the golden altar for incense before the ark of the testimony , and put the screen of the door to the tabernacle .
1	and thou shalt set the altar of burnt-offering before the door of the tabernacle of the tent of meeting .
1	and thou shalt set the laver between the tent of meeting and the altar , and shalt put water therein .
1	and thou shalt set up the court round about , and hang up the screen of the gate of the court .
1	and thou shalt anoint the altar of burnt-offering , and all its vessels , and sanctify the altar : and the altar shall be most holy .
1	and thou shalt anoint the laver and its base , and sanctify it .
1	and thou shalt bring aaron and his sons unto the door of the tent of meeting , and shalt wash them with water .
1	and thou shalt bring his sons , and put coats upon them ;
1	thus did moses : according to all that jehovah commanded him , so did he .
1	and it came to pass in the first month in the second year , on the first day of the month , that the tabernacle was reared up .
1	and he spread the tent over the tabernacle , and put the covering of the tent above upon it ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and he took and put the testimony into the ark , and set the staves on the ark , and put the mercy-seat above upon the ark :
1	and he put the table in the tent of meeting , upon the side of the tabernacle northward , without the veil .
1	and he set the bread in order upon it before jehovah ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and he put the candlestick in the tent of meeting , over against the table , on the side of the tabernacle southward .
1	and he lighted the lamps before jehovah ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and he put the golden altar in the tent of meeting before the veil :
1	and he burnt thereon incense of sweet spices ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and he put the screen of the door to the tabernacle .
1	and he set the laver between the tent of meeting and the altar , and put water therein , wherewith to wash .
1	and moses and aaron and his sons washed their hands and their feet thereat ;
1	when they went into the tent of meeting , and when they came near unto the altar , they washed ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	then the cloud covered the tent of meeting , and the glory of jehovah filled the tabernacle .
1	and moses was not able to enter into the tent of meeting , because the cloud abode thereon , and the glory of jehovah filled the tabernacle .
1	and when the cloud was taken up from over the tabernacle , the children of israel went onward , throughout all their journeys :
1	but if the cloud was not taken up , then they journeyed not till the day that it was taken up .
1	in the fifth day of the month , which was the fifth year of king jehoiachin ’ s captivity ,
1	and out of the midst thereof came the likeness of four living creatures . and this was their appearance : they had the likeness of a man ;
1	and every one had four faces , and every one of them had four wings .
1	and they had the hands of a man under their wings on their four sides ; and they four had their faces and their wings thus :
1	their wings were joined one to another ; they turned not when they went ; they went every one straight forward .
1	and their faces and their wings were separate above ; two wings of every one were joined one to another , and two covered their bodies .
1	and they went every one straight forward : whither the spirit was to go , they went ; they turned not when they went .
1	and the living creatures ran and returned as the appearance of a flash of lightning .
1	now as i beheld the living creatures , behold , one wheel upon the earth beside the living creatures , for each of the four faces thereof .
1	when they went , they went in their four directions : they turned not when they went .
1	as for their rims , they were high and dreadful ; and they four had their rims full of eyes round about .
1	and there was a voice above the firmament that was over their heads : when they stood , they let down their wings .
1	and he said unto me , son of man , stand upon thy feet , and i will speak with thee .
1	and the spirit entered into me when he spake unto me , and set me upon my feet ; and i heard him that spake unto me .
1	and the children are impudent and stiffhearted : i do send thee unto them ; and thou shalt say unto them , thus saith the lord jehovah .
1	and thou shalt speak my words unto them , whether they will hear , or whether they will forbear ; for they are most rebellious .
1	and when i looked , behold , a hand was put forth unto me ; and , lo , a roll of a book was therein ;
1	and he spread it before me : and it was written within and without ; and there were written therein lamentations , and mourning , and woe .
1	and he said unto me , son of man , eat that which thou findest ; eat this roll , and go , speak unto the house of israel .
1	so i opened my mouth , and he caused me to eat the roll .
1	and he said unto me , son of man , go , get thee unto the house of israel , and speak with my words unto them .
1	for thou art not sent to a people of a strange speech and of a hard language , but to the house of israel ;
1	behold , i have made thy face hard against their faces , and thy forehead hard against their foreheads .
1	as an adamant harder than flint have i made thy forehead : fear them not , neither be dismayed at their looks , though they are a rebellious house .
1	moreover he said unto me , son of man , all my words that i shall speak unto thee receive in thy heart , and hear with thine ears .
1	and it came to pass at the end of seven days , that the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	thou also , son of man , take thee a tile , and lay it before thee , and portray upon it a city , even jerusalem :
1	and thou shalt set thy face toward the siege of jerusalem , with thine arm uncovered ; and thou shalt prophesy against it .
1	and thy food which thou shalt eat shall be by weight , twenty shekels a day : from time to time shalt thou eat it .
1	and thou shalt drink water by measure , the sixth part of a hin : from time to time shalt thou drink .
1	and thou shalt eat it as barley cakes , and thou shalt bake it in their sight with dung that cometh out of man .
1	and jehovah said , even thus shall the children of israel eat their bread unclean , among the nations whither i will drive them .
1	then he said unto me , see , i have given thee cow ’ s dung for man ’ s dung , and thou shalt prepare thy bread thereon .
1	that they may want bread and water , and be dismayed one with another , and pine away in their iniquity .
1	and thou shalt take thereof a few in number , and bind them in thy skirts .
1	thus saith the lord jehovah : this is jerusalem ; i have set her in the midst of the nations , and countries are round about her .
1	and i will do in thee that which i have not done , and whereunto i will not do any more the like , because of all thine abominations .
1	moreover i will make thee a desolation and a reproach among the nations that are round about thee , in the sight of all that pass by .
1	and the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	son of man , set thy face toward the mountains of israel , and prophesy unto them ,
1	and your altars shall become desolate , and your sun-images shall be broken ; and i will cast down your slain men before your idols .
1	and i will lay the dead bodies of the children of israel before their idols ; and i will scatter your bones round about your altars .
1	and the slain shall fall in the midst of you , and ye shall know that i am jehovah .
1	yet will i leave a remnant , in that ye shall have some that escape the sword among the nations , when ye shall be scattered through the countries .
1	and they shall know that i am jehovah : i have not said in vain that i would do this evil unto them .
1	moreover the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	thus saith the lord jehovah : an evil , an only evil ; behold , it cometh .
1	an end is come , the end is come ; it awaketh against thee ; behold , it cometh .
1	behold , the day , behold , it cometh : thy doom is gone forth ; the rod hath blossomed , pride hath budded .
1	the time is come , the day draweth near : let not the buyer rejoice , nor the seller mourn ; for wrath is upon all the multitude thereof .
1	they have blown the trumpet , and have made all ready ; but none goeth to the battle ; for my wrath is upon all the multitude thereof .
1	all hands shall be feeble , and all knees shall be weak as water .
1	they shall also gird themselves with sackcloth , and horror shall cover them ; and shame shall be upon all faces , and baldness upon all their heads .
1	my face will i turn also from them , and they shall profane my secret place ; and robbers shall enter into it , and profane it .
1	make the chain ; for the land is full of bloody crimes , and the city is full of violence .
1	destruction cometh ; and they shall seek peace , and there shall be none .
1	and , behold , the glory of the god of israel was there , according to the appearance that i saw in the plain .
1	and he brought me to the door of the court ; and when i looked , behold , a hole in the wall .
1	then said he unto me , son of man , dig now in the wall : and when i had digged in the wall , behold , a door .
1	and he said unto me , go in , and see the wicked abominations that they do here .
1	he said also unto me , thou shalt again see yet other great abominations which they do .
1	then said he unto me , hast thou seen this , o son of man ? thou shalt again see yet greater abominations than these .
1	and as for me also , mine eye shall not spare , neither will i have pity , but i will bring their way upon their head .
1	now the cherubim stood on the right side of the house , when the man went in ; and the cloud filled the inner court .
1	and the sound of the wings of the cherubim was heard even to the outer court , as the voice of god almighty when he speaketh .
1	and there appeared in the cherubim the form of a man ’ s hand under their wings .
1	and as for their appearance , they four had one likeness , as if a wheel had been within a wheel .
1	as for the wheels , they were called in my hearing the whirling wheels .
1	and the cherubim mounted up : this is the living creature that i saw by the river chebar .
1	when they stood , these stood ; and when they mounted up , these mounted up with them : for the spirit of the living creature was in them .
1	and the glory of jehovah went forth from over the threshold of the house , and stood over the cherubim .
1	this is the living creature that i saw under the god of israel by the river chebar ; and i knew that they were cherubim .
1	every one had four faces , and every one four wings ; and the likeness of the hands of a man was under their wings .
1	and he said unto me , son of man , these are the men that devise iniquity , and that give wicked counsel in this city ;
1	that say , the time is not near to build houses : this city is the caldron , and we are the flesh .
1	therefore prophesy against them , prophesy , o son of man .
1	ye have multiplied your slain in this city , and ye have filled the streets thereof with the slain .
1	ye have feared the sword ; and i will bring the sword upon you , saith the lord jehovah .
1	and i will bring you forth out of the midst thereof , and deliver you into the hands of strangers , and will execute judgments among you .
1	ye shall fall by the sword ; i will judge you in the border of israel ; and ye shall know that i am jehovah .
1	this city shall not be your caldron , neither shall ye be the flesh in the midst thereof ; i will judge you in the border of israel ;
1	and the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	and they shall come thither , and they shall take away all the detestable things thereof and all the abominations thereof from thence .

1	then i spake unto them of the captivity all the things that jehovah had showed me .

1	and in the morning came the word of jehovah unto me , saying ,
1	son of man , hath not the house of israel , the rebellious house , said unto thee , what doest thou ?

1	and they shall know that i am jehovah , when i shall disperse them among the nations , and scatter them through the countries .

1	son of man , eat thy bread with quaking , and drink thy water with trembling and with fearfulness ;

1	and the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	son of man , what is this proverb that ye have in the land of israel , saying , the days are prolonged , and every vision faileth ?
1	for there shall be no more any false vision nor flattering divination within the house of israel .

1	and the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	thus saith the lord jehovah , woe unto the foolish prophets , that follow their own spirit , and have seen nothing !
1	o israel , thy prophets have been like foxes in the waste places .
1	lo , when the wall is fallen , shall it not be said unto you , where is the daubing wherewith ye have daubed it ?
1	then came certain of the elders of israel unto me , and sat before me .
1	and the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,

1	son of man , what is the vine-tree more than any tree , the vine-branch which is among the trees of the forest ?

1	again the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	son of man , cause jerusalem to know her abominations ;
1	then washed i thee with water ; yea , i thoroughly washed away thy blood from thee , and i anointed thee with oil .
1	i clothed thee also with broidered work , and shod thee with sealskin , and i girded thee about with fine linen , and covered thee with silk .
1	and i decked thee with ornaments , and i put bracelets upon thy hands , and a chain on thy neck .

1	and thou tookest thy broidered garments , and coveredst them , and didst set mine oil and mine incense before them .

1	and it is come to pass after all thy wickedness ( woe , woe unto thee ! saith the lord jehovah ) ,
1	that thou hast built unto thee a vaulted place , and hast made thee a lofty place in every street .
1	thou hast also committed fornication with the egyptians , thy neighbors , great of flesh ; and hast multiplied thy whoredom , to provoke me to anger .
1	thou hast moreover multiplied thy whoredom unto the land of traffic , unto chaldea ; and yet thou wast not satisfied herewith .
1	how weak is thy heart , saith the lord jehovah , seeing thou doest all these things , the work of an impudent harlot ;
1	a wife that committeth adultery ! that taketh strangers instead of her husband !
1	wherefore , o harlot , hear the word of jehovah :
1	and i will judge thee , as women that break wedlock and shed blood are judged ; and i will bring upon thee the blood of wrath and jealousy .
1	they shall also bring up a company against thee , and they shall stone thee with stones , and thrust thee through with their swords .
1	behold , every one that useth proverbs shall use this proverb against thee , saying , as is the mother , so is her daughter .
1	and they were haughty , and committed abomination before me : therefore i took them away as i saw good .
1	that thou mayest bear thine own shame , and mayest be ashamed because of all that thou hast done , in that thou art a comfort unto them .
1	for thy sister sodom was not mentioned by thy mouth in the day of thy pride ,
1	thou hast borne thy lewdness and thine abominations , saith jehovah .
1	for thus saith the lord jehovah : i will also deal with thee as thou hast done , who hast despised the oath in breaking the covenant .
1	nevertheless i will remember my covenant with thee in the days of thy youth , and i will establish unto thee an everlasting covenant .
1	and i will establish my covenant with thee ; and thou shalt know that i am jehovah ;
1	and the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	son of man , put forth a riddle , and speak a parable unto the house of israel ;
1	he cropped off the topmost of the young twigs thereof , and carried it unto a land of traffic ; he set it in a city of merchants .
1	moreover the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	that the kingdom might be base , that it might not lift itself up , but that by keeping his covenant it might stand .
1	the word of jehovah came unto me again , saying ,
1	as i live , saith the lord jehovah , ye shall not have occasion any more to use this proverb in israel .
1	but if a man be just , and do that which is lawful and right ,
1	hath walked in my statutes , and hath kept mine ordinances , to deal truly ; he is just , he shall surely live , saith the lord jehovah .
1	if he beget a son that is a robber , a shedder of blood , and that doeth any one of these things ,
1	and that doeth not any of those duties , but even hath eaten upon the mountains , and defiled his neighbor ’ s wife ,
1	none of his transgressions that he hath committed shall be remembered against him : in his righteousness that he hath done he shall live .
1	have i any pleasure in the death of the wicked ? saith the lord jehovah ; and not rather that he should return from his way , and live ?
1	when the righteous man turneth away from his righteousness , and committeth iniquity , and dieth therein ; in his iniquity that he hath done shall he die .
1	because he considereth , and turneth away from all his transgressions that he hath committed , he shall surely live , he shall not die .
1	for i have no pleasure in the death of him that dieth , saith the lord jehovah : wherefore turn yourselves , and live .
1	moreover , take thou up a lamentation for the princes of israel ,
1	and say , what was thy mother ? a lioness : she couched among lions , in the midst of the young lions she nourished her whelps .
1	and she brought up one of her whelps : he became a young lion , and he learned to catch the prey ; he devoured men .
1	the nations also heard of him ; he was taken in their pit ; and they brought him with hooks unto the land of egypt .
1	now when she saw that she had waited , and her hope was lost , then she took another of her whelps , and made him a young lion .
1	and he went up and down among the lions ; he became a young lion , and he learned to catch the prey ; he devoured men .
1	then the nations set against him on every side from the provinces ; and they spread their net over him ; he was taken in their pit .
1	thy mother was like a vine , in thy blood , planted by the waters : it was fruitful and full of branches by reason of many waters .
1	and now it is planted in the wilderness , in a dry and thirsty land .
1	and the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	wilt thou judge them , son of man , wilt thou judge them ? cause them to know the abominations of their fathers ;
1	so i caused them to go forth out of the land of egypt , and brought them into the wilderness .
1	and i gave them my statutes , and showed them mine ordinances , which if a man do , he shall live in them .
1	moreover also i gave them my sabbaths , to be a sign between me and them , that they might know that i am jehovah that sanctifieth them .
1	because they rejected mine ordinances , and walked not in my statutes , and profaned my sabbaths : for their heart went after their idols .
1	nevertheless mine eye spared them , and i destroyed them not , neither did i make a full end of them in the wilderness .
1	i am jehovah your god : walk in my statutes , and keep mine ordinances , and do them ;
1	and hallow my sabbaths ; and they shall be a sign between me and you , that ye may know that i am jehovah your god .
1	moreover i sware unto them in the wilderness , that i would scatter them among the nations , and disperse them through the countries ;
1	because they had not executed mine ordinances , but had rejected my statutes , and had profaned my sabbaths , and their eyes were after their fathers ’ idols .
1	moreover also i gave them statutes that were not good , and ordinances wherein they should not live ;
1	then i said unto them , what meaneth the high place whereunto ye go ? so the name thereof is called bamah unto this day .
1	and i will bring you into the wilderness of the peoples , and there will i enter into judgment with you face to face .
1	and i will cause you to pass under the rod , and i will bring you into the bond of the covenant ;

1	thou shalt also take the bullock of the sin-offering , and it shall be burnt in the appointed place of the house , without the sanctuary .
1	when thou hast made an end of cleansing it , thou shalt offer a young bullock without blemish , and a ram out of the flock without blemish .
1	and thou shalt bring them near before jehovah , and the priests shall cast salt upon them , and they shall offer them up for a burnt-offering unto jehovah .
1	seven days shall they make atonement for the altar and purify it ; so shall they consecrate it .
1	then he brought me back by the way of the outer gate of the sanctuary , which looketh toward the east ; and it was shut .
1	and ye have not kept the charge of my holy things ; but ye have set keepers of my charge in my sanctuary for yourselves .
1	but the levites that went far from me , when israel went astray , that went astray from me after their idols , they shall bear their iniquity .
1	yet will i make them keepers of the charge of the house , for all the service thereof , and for all that shall be done therein .
1	they shall enter into my sanctuary , and they shall come near to my table , to minister unto me , and they shall keep my charge .
1	they shall have linen tires upon their heads , and shall have linen breeches upon their loins ; they shall not gird themselves with anything that causeth sweat .
1	neither shall they shave their heads , nor suffer their locks to grow long ; they shall only cut off the hair of their heads .
1	neither shall any of the priests drink wine , when they enter into the inner court .
1	and they shall teach my people the difference between the holy and the common , and cause them to discern between the unclean and the clean .
1	and after he is cleansed , they shall reckon unto him seven days .
1	and they shall have an inheritance : i am their inheritance ; and ye shall give them no possession in israel ; i am their possession .
1	they shall eat the meal-offering , and the sin-offering , and the trespass-offering ; and every devoted thing in israel shall be theirs .
1	the priests shall not eat of anything that dieth of itself , or is torn , whether it be bird or beast .
1	ye shall have just balances , and a just ephah , and a just bath .
1	and the shekel shall be twenty gerahs ; twenty shekels , five and twenty shekels , fifteen shekels , shall be your maneh .
1	all the people of the land shall give unto this oblation for the prince in israel .
1	and upon that day shall the prince prepare for himself and for all the people of the land a bullock for a sin-offering .
1	and he shall prepare a meal-offering , an ephah for a bullock , and an ephah for a ram , and a hin of oil to an ephah .
1	and the people of the land shall worship at the door of that gate before jehovah on the sabbaths and on the new moons .
1	and the burnt-offering that the prince shall offer unto jehovah shall be on the sabbath day six lambs without blemish and a ram without blemish ;
1	and the prince , when they go in , shall go in in the midst of them ; and when they go forth , they shall go forth together .
1	and thou shalt prepare a lamb a year old without blemish for a burnt-offering unto jehovah daily : morning by morning shalt thou prepare it .
1	thus shall they prepare the lamb , and the meal-offering , and the oil , morning by morning , for a continual burnt-offering .
1	in the four corners of the court there were courts inclosed , forty cubits long and thirty broad : these four in the corners were of one measure .
1	and there was a wall round about in them , round about the four , and boiling-places were made under the walls round about .
1	then said he unto me , these are the boiling-houses , where the ministers of the house shall boil the sacrifice of the people .
1	now when i had returned , behold , upon the bank of the river were very many trees on the one side and on the other .
1	but the miry places thereof , and the marshes thereof , shall not be healed ; they shall be given up to salt .
1	hamath , berothah , sibraim , which is between the border of damascus and the border of hamath ; hazer-hatticon , which is by the border of hauran .
1	and the west side shall be the great sea , from the south border as far as over against the entrance of hamath . this is the west side .
1	so shall ye divide this land unto you according to the tribes of israel .
1	and it shall come to pass , that in what tribe the stranger sojourneth , there shall ye give him his inheritance , saith the lord jehovah .
1	and by the border of dan , from the east side unto the west side , asher , one portion .
1	and by the border of asher , from the east side even unto the west side , naphtali , one portion .
1	and by the border of naphtali , from the east side unto the west side , manasseh , one portion .
1	and by the border of manasseh , from the east side unto the west side , ephraim , one portion .
1	and by the border of ephraim , from the east side even unto the west side , reuben , one portion .
1	and by the border of reuben , from the east side unto the west side , judah , one portion .
1	the oblation that ye shall offer unto jehovah shall be five and twenty thousand reeds in length , and ten thousand in breadth .
1	and it shall be unto them an oblation from the oblation of the land , a thing most holy , by the border of the levites .
1	and they shall sell none of it , nor exchange it , nor shall the first-fruits of the land be alienated ; for it is holy unto jehovah .
1	and they that labor in the city , out of all the tribes of israel , shall till it .
1	all the oblation shall be five and twenty thousand by five and twenty thousand : ye shall offer the holy oblation foursquare , with the possession of the city .
1	and as for the rest of the tribes : from the east side unto the west side , benjamin , one portion .
1	and by the border of benjamin , from the east side unto the west side , simeon , one portion .
1	and by the border of simeon , from the east side unto the west side , issachar , one portion .
1	and by the border of issachar , from the east side unto the west side , zebulun , one portion .
1	and by the border of zebulun , from the east side unto the west side , gad , one portion .
1	this is the land which ye shall divide by lot unto the tribes of israel for inheritance , and these are their several portions , saith the lord jehovah .
1	and these are the egresses of the city : on the north side four thousand and five hundred reeds by measure ;
1	it shall be eighteen thousand reeds round about : and the name of the city from that day shall be , jehovah is there .

1	and when the seventh month was come , and the children of israel were in the cities , the people gathered themselves together as one man to jerusalem .
1	from the first day of the seventh month began they to offer burnt-offerings unto jehovah : but the foundation of the temple of jehovah was not yet laid .
1	now when the adversaries of judah and benjamin heard that the children of the captivity were building a temple unto jehovah , the god of israel ;
1	then the people of the land weakened the hands of the people of judah , and troubled them in building ,
1	and hired counsellors against them , to frustrate their purpose , all the days of cyrus king of persia , even until the reign of darius king of persia .
1	and in the reign of ahasuerus , in the beginning of his reign , wrote they an accusation against the inhabitants of judah and jerusalem .
1	rehum the chancellor and shimshai the scribe wrote a letter against jerusalem to artaxerxes the king in this sort :
1	this is the copy of the letter that they sent unto artaxerxes the king : thy servants the men beyond the river , and so forth .
1	we certify the king that , if this city be builded , and the walls finished , by this means thou shalt have no portion beyond the river .
1	the letter which ye sent unto us hath been plainly read before me .
1	make ye now a decree to cause these men to cease , and that this city be not builded , until a decree shall be made by me .
1	and take heed that ye be not slack herein : why should damage grow to the hurt of the kings ?
1	then ceased the work of the house of god which is at jerusalem ; and it ceased until the second year of the reign of darius king of persia .
1	then we told them after this manner , what the names of the men were that were making this building .
1	they sent a letter unto him , wherein was written thus : unto darius the king , all peace .
1	then asked we those elders , and said unto them thus , who gave you a decree to build this house , and to finish this wall ?
1	we asked them their names also , to certify thee , that we might write the names of the men that were at the head of them .
1	but in the first year of cyrus king of babylon , cyrus the king made a decree to build this house of god .
1	then darius the king made a decree , and search was made in the house of the archives , where the treasures were laid up in babylon .
1	and there was found at achmetha , in the palace that is in the province of media , a roll , and therein was thus written for a record :
1	with three courses of great stones , and a course of new timber : and let the expenses be given out of the king ’ s house .
1	now therefore , tattenai , governor beyond the river , shethar-bozenai , and your companions the apharsachites , who are beyond the river , be ye far from thence :
1	that they may offer sacrifices of sweet savor unto the god of heaven , and pray for the life of the king , and of his sons .
1	then tattenai , the governor beyond the river , shethar-bozenai , and their companions , because that darius the king had sent , did accordingly with all diligence .
1	and this house was finished on the third day of the month adar , which was in the sixth year of the reign of darius the king .
1	and the children of the captivity kept the passover upon the fourteenth day of the first month .
1	now after these things , in the reign of artaxerxes king of persia , ezra the son of seraiah , the son of azariah , the son of hilkiah ,

1	the whole by number and by weight : and all the weight was written at that time .
1	and now , o our god , what shall we say after this ? for we have forsaken thy commandments ,
1	arise ; for the matter belongeth unto thee , and we are with thee : be of good courage , and do it .
1	and they made proclamation throughout judah and jerusalem unto all the children of the captivity , that they should gather themselves together unto jerusalem ;
1	and ezra the priest stood up , and said unto them , ye have trespassed , and have married foreign women , to increase the guilt of israel .
1	then all the assembly answered and said with a loud voice , as thou hast said concerning us , so must we do .
1	only jonathan the son of asahel and jahzeiah the son of tikvah stood up against this matter : and meshullam and shabbethai the levite helped them .
1	and they made an end with all the men that had married foreign women by the first day of the first month .
1	and they gave their hand that they would put away their wives ; and being guilty , they offered a ram of the flock for their guilt .
