1	for i , jehovah thy god , will hold thy right hand , saying unto thee , fear not ; i will help thee .
1	produce your cause , saith jehovah ; bring forth your strong reasons , saith the king of jacob .
1	behold , ye are of nothing , and your work is of nought ; an abomination is he that chooseth you .
1	i am the first that saith unto zion , behold , behold them ; and i will give to jerusalem one that bringeth good tidings .
1	behold , all of them , their works are vanity and nought ; their molten images are wind and confusion .
1	he will not cry , nor lift up his voice , nor cause it to be heard in the street .
1	a bruised reed will he not break , and a dimly burning wick will he not quench : he will bring forth justice in truth .
1	he will not fail nor be discouraged , till he have set justice in the earth ; and the isles shall wait for his law .
1	to open the blind eyes , to bring out the prisoners from the dungeon , and them that sit in darkness out of the prison-house .
1	i am jehovah , that is my name ; and my glory will i not give to another , neither my praise unto graven images .
1	behold , the former things are come to pass , and new things do i declare ; before they spring forth i tell you of them .
1	let them give glory unto jehovah , and declare his praise in the islands .
1	i will lay waste mountains and hills , and dry up all their herbs ; and i will make the rivers islands , and will dry up the pools .
1	hear , ye deaf ; and look , ye blind , that ye may see .
1	thou seest many things , but thou observest not ; his ears are open , but he heareth not .
1	it pleased jehovah , for his righteousness ’ sake , to magnify the law , and make it honorable .
1	who is there among you that will give ear to this ? that will hearken and hear for the time to come ?
1	fear not ; for i am with thee : i will bring thy seed from the east , and gather thee from the west ;
1	every one that is called by my name , and whom i have created for my glory , whom i have formed , yea , whom i have made .
1	bring forth the blind people that have eyes , and the deaf that have ears .
1	i , even i , am jehovah ; and besides me there is no saviour .
1	i am jehovah , your holy one , the creator of israel , your king .
1	thus saith jehovah , who maketh a way in the sea , and a path in the mighty waters ;
1	remember ye not the former things , neither consider the things of old .
1	the people which i formed for myself , that they might set forth my praise .
1	yet thou hast not called upon me , o jacob ; but thou hast been weary of me , o israel .
1	i , even i , am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake ; and i will not remember thy sins .
1	put me in remembrance ; let us plead together : set thou forth thy cause , that thou mayest be justified .
1	thy first father sinned , and thy teachers have transgressed against me .
1	therefore i will profane the princes of the sanctuary ; and i will make jacob a curse , and israel a reviling .
1	yet now hear , o jacob my servant , and israel , who i have chosen :
1	and they shall spring up among the grass , as willows by the watercourses .
1	who hath fashioned a god , or molten an image that is profitable for nothing ?
1	that frustrateth the signs of the liars , and maketh diviners mad ; that turneth wise men backward , and maketh their knowledge foolish ;
1	that saith to the deep , be dry , and i will dry up thy rivers ;
1	i am jehovah , and there is none else ; besides me there is no god . i will gird thee , though thou hast not known me ;
1	i form the light , and create darkness ; i make peace , and create evil ; i am jehovah , that doeth all these things .
1	woe unto him that saith unto a father , what begettest thou ? or to a woman , with what travailest thou ?
1	verily thou art a god that hidest thyself , o god of israel , the saviour .
1	they shall be put to shame , yea , confounded , all of them ; they shall go into confusion together that are makers of idols .
1	but israel shall be saved by jehovah with an everlasting salvation : ye shall not be put to shame nor confounded world without end .
1	look unto me , and be ye saved , all the ends of the earth ; for i am god , and there is none else .
1	in jehovah shall all the seed of israel be justified , and shall glory .
1	they stoop , they bow down together ; they could not deliver the burden , but themselves are gone into captivity .
1	to whom will ye liken me , and make me equal , and compare me , that we may be like ?
1	remember this , and show yourselves men ; bring it again to mind , o ye transgressors .
1	remember the former things of old : for i am god , and there is none else ; i am god , and there is none like me ;
1	hearken unto me , ye stout-hearted , that are far from righteousness :
1	take the millstones , and grind meal ; remove thy veil , strip off the train , uncover the leg , pass through the rivers .
1	thy nakedness shall be uncovered , yea , thy shame shall be seen : i will take vengeance , and will spare no man .
1	our redeemer , jehovah of hosts is his name , the holy one of israel .
1	sit thou silent , and get thee into darkness , o daughter of the chaldeans ; for thou shalt no more be called the mistress of kingdoms .
1	( for they call themselves of the holy city , and stay themselves upon the god of israel ; jehovah of hosts is his name ) :
1	because i knew that thou art obstinate , and thy neck is an iron sinew , and thy brow brass ;
1	for my name ’ s sake will i defer mine anger , and for my praise will i refrain for thee , that i cut thee not off .
1	behold , i have refined thee , but not as silver ; i have chosen thee in the furnace of affliction .
1	hearken unto me , o jacob , and israel my called : i am he ; i am the first , i also am the last .
1	i , even i , have spoken ; yea , i have called him ; i have brought him , and he shall make his way prosperous .
1	oh that thou hadst hearkened to my commandments ! then had thy peace been as a river , and thy righteousness as the waves of the sea :
1	there is no peace , saith jehovah , to the wicked .
1	and he said unto me , thou art my servant ; israel , in whom i will be glorified .
1	and i will make all my mountains a way , and my highways shall be exalted .
1	lo , these shall come from far ; and , lo , these from the north and from the west ; and these from the land of sinim .
1	but zion said , jehovah hath forsaken me , and the lord hath forgotten me .
1	behold , i have graven thee upon the palms of my hands ; thy walls are continually before me .
1	thy children make haste ; thy destroyers and they that made thee waste shall go forth from thee .
1	the children of thy bereavement shall yet say in thine ears , the place is too strait for me ; give place to me that i may dwell .
1	shall the prey be taken from the mighty , or the lawful captives be delivered ?
1	i clothe the heavens with blackness , and i make sackcloth their covering .
1	the lord jehovah hath opened mine ear , and i was not rebellious , neither turned away backward .
1	i gave my back to the smiters , and my cheeks to them that plucked off the hair ; i hid not my face from shame and spitting .
1	the captive exile shall speedily be loosed ; and he shall not die and go down into the pit , neither shall his bread fail .
1	for i am jehovah thy god , who stirreth up the sea , so that the waves thereof roar : jehovah of hosts is his name .
1	these two things are befallen thee , who shall bemoan thee ? desolation and destruction , and the famine and the sword ; how shall i comfort thee ?
1	therefore hear now this , thou afflicted , and drunken , but not with wine :
1	for thus saith jehovah , ye were sold for nought ; and ye shall be redeemed without money .
1	for thus saith the lord jehovah , my people went down at the first into egypt to sojourn there : and the assyrian hath oppressed them without cause .
1	therefore my people shall know my name : therefore they shall know in that day that i am he that doth speak ; behold , it is i .
1	break forth into joy , sing together , ye waste places of jerusalem ; for jehovah hath comforted his people , he hath redeemed jerusalem .
1	jehovah hath made bare his holy arm in the eyes of all the nations ; and all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our god .
1	behold , my servant shall deal wisely , he shall be exalted and lifted up , and shall be very high .
1	like as many were astonished at thee ( his visage was so marred more than any man , and his form more than the sons of men ) ,
1	who hath believed our message ? and to whom hath the arm of jehovah been revealed ?
1	surely he hath borne our griefs , and carried our sorrows ; yet we did esteem him stricken , smitten of god , and afflicted .
1	all we like sheep have gone astray ; we have turned every one to his own way ; and jehovah hath laid on him the iniquity of us all .
1	enlarge the place of thy tent , and let them stretch forth the curtains of thy habitations ; spare not : lengthen thy cords , and strengthen thy stakes .
1	for jehovah hath called thee as a wife forsaken and grieved in spirit , even a wife of youth , when she is cast off , saith thy god .
1	for a small moment have i forsaken thee ; but with great mercies will i gather thee .
1	in overflowing wrath i hid my face from thee for a moment ; but with everlasting lovingkindness will i have mercy on thee , saith jehovah thy redeemer .
1	o thou afflicted , tossed with tempest , and not comforted , behold , i will set thy stones in fair colors , and lay thy foundations with sapphires .
1	and i will make thy pinnacles of rubies , and thy gates of carbuncles , and all thy border of precious stones .
1	and all thy children shall be taught of jehovah ; and great shall be the peace of thy children .
1	behold , they may gather together , but not by me : whosoever shall gather together against thee shall fall because of thee .
1	behold , i have given him for a witness to the peoples , a leader and commander to the peoples .
1	seek ye jehovah while he may be found ; call ye upon him while he is near :
1	for my thoughts are not your thoughts , neither are your ways my ways , saith jehovah .
1	for as the heavens are higher than the earth , so are my ways higher than your ways , and my thoughts than your thoughts .
1	thus saith jehovah , keep ye justice , and do righteousness ; for my salvation is near to come , and my righteousness to be revealed .
1	for thus saith jehovah of the eunuchs that keep my sabbaths , and choose the things that please me , and hold fast my covenant :
1	the lord jehovah , who gathereth the outcasts of israel , saith , yet will i gather others to him , besides his own that are gathered .
1	all ye beasts of the field , come to devour , yea , all ye beasts in the forest .
1	he entereth into peace ; they rest in their beds , each one that walketh in his uprightness .
1	but draw near hither , ye sons of the sorceress , the seed of the adulterer and the harlot .
1	ye that inflame yourselves among the oaks , under every green tree ; that slay the children in the valleys , under the clefts of the rocks ?
1	upon a high and lofty mountain hast thou set thy bed ; thither also wentest thou up to offer sacrifice .
1	i will declare thy righteousness ; and as for thy works , they shall not profit thee .
1	and he will say , cast ye up , cast ye up , prepare the way , take up the stumbling-block out of the way of my people .
1	i have seen his ways , and will heal him : i will lead him also , and restore comforts unto him and to his mourners .
1	but the wicked are like the troubled sea ; for it can not rest , and its waters cast up mire and dirt .
1	there is no peace , saith my god , to the wicked .
1	then shalt thou call , and jehovah will answer ; thou shalt cry , and he will say , here i am .
1	behold , jehovah ’ s hand is not shortened , that it can not save ; neither his ear heavy , that it can not hear :
1	but your iniquities have separated between you and your god , and your sins have hid his face from you , so that he will not hear .
1	for your hands are defiled with blood , and your fingers with iniquity ; your lips have spoken lies , your tongue muttereth wickedness .
1	none sueth in righteousness , and none pleadeth in truth : they trust in vanity , and speak lies ; they conceive mischief , and bring forth iniquity .
1	their feet run to evil , and they make haste to shed innocent blood : their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity ; desolation and destruction are in their paths .
1	transgressing and denying jehovah , and turning away from following our god , speaking oppression and revolt , conceiving and uttering from the heart words of falsehood .
1	and justice is turned away backward , and righteousness standeth afar off ; for truth is fallen in the street , and uprightness can not enter .
1	yea , truth is lacking ; and he that departeth from evil maketh himself a prey .
1	according to their deeds , accordingly he will repay , wrath to his adversaries , recompense to his enemies ; to the islands he will repay recompense .
1	and a redeemer will come to zion , and unto them that turn from transgression in jacob , saith jehovah .
1	arise , shine ; for thy light is come , and the glory of jehovah is risen upon thee .
1	and nations shall come to thy light , and kings to the brightness of thy rising .
1	who are these that fly as a cloud , and as the doves to their windows ?
1	for that nation and kingdom that will not serve thee shall perish ; yea , those nations shall be utterly wasted .
1	whereas thou hast been forsaken and hated , so that no man passed through thee , i will make thee an eternal excellency , a joy of many generations .
1	violence shall no more be heard in thy land , desolation nor destruction within thy borders ; but thou shalt call thy walls salvation , and thy gates praise .
1	the little one shall become a thousand , and the small one a strong nation ; i , jehovah , will hasten it in its time .
1	to proclaim the year of jehovah ’ s favor , and the day of vengeance of our god ; to comfort all that mourn ;
1	and they shall build the old wastes , they shall raise up the former desolations , and they shall repair the waste cities , the desolations of many generations .
1	and strangers shall stand and feed your flocks , and foreigners shall be your plowmen and your vine-dressers .
1	thou shalt also be a crown of beauty in the hand of jehovah , and a royal diadem in the hand of thy god .
1	and give him no rest , till he establish , and till he make jerusalem a praise in the earth .
1	but they that have garnered it shall eat it , and praise jehovah ; and they that have gathered it shall drink it in the courts of my sanctuary .
1	and they shall call them the holy people , the redeemed of jehovah : and thou shalt be called sought out , a city not forsaken .
1	wherefore art thou red in thine apparel , and thy garments like him that treadeth in the winevat ?
1	for the day of vengeance was in my heart , and the year of my redeemed is come .
1	and i trod down the peoples in mine anger , and made them drunk in my wrath , and i poured out their lifeblood on the earth .
1	for he said , surely , they are my people , children that will not deal falsely : so he was their saviour .
1	but they rebelled , and grieved his holy spirit : therefore he was turned to be their enemy , and himself fought against them .
1	that caused his glorious arm to go at the right hand of moses ? that divided the waters before them , to make himself an everlasting name ?
1	that led them through the depths , as a horse in the wilderness , so that they stumbled not ?
1	thy holy people possessed it but a little while : our adversaries have trodden down thy sanctuary .
1	we are become as they over whom thou never barest rule , as they that were not called by thy name .
1	oh that thou wouldest rend the heavens , that thou wouldest come down , that the mountains might quake at thy presence ,
1	when thou didst terrible things which we looked not for , thou camest down , the mountains quaked at thy presence .
1	be not wroth very sore , o jehovah , neither remember iniquity for ever : behold , look , we beseech thee , we are all thy people .
1	thy holy cities are become a wilderness , zion is become a wilderness , jerusalem a desolation .
1	our holy and our beautiful house , where our fathers praised thee , is burned with fire ; and all our pleasant places are laid waste .
1	wilt thou refrain thyself for these things , o jehovah ? wilt thou hold thy peace , and afflict us very sore ?
1	i have spread out my hands all the day unto a rebellious people , that walk in a way that is not good , after their own thoughts ;
1	a people that provoke me to my face continually , sacrificing in gardens , and burning incense upon bricks ;
1	that sit among the graves , and lodge in the secret places ; that eat swine ’ s flesh , and broth of abominable things is in their vessels ;
1	behold , it is written before me : i will not keep silence , but will recompense , yea , i will recompense into their bosom ,
1	but ye that forsake jehovah , that forget my holy mountain , that prepare a table for fortune , and that fill up mingled wine unto destiny ;
1	behold , my servants shall sing for joy of heart , but ye shall cry for sorrow of heart , and shall wail for vexation of spirit .
1	for , behold , i create new heavens and a new earth ; and the former things shall not be remembered , nor come into mind .
1	but be ye glad and rejoice for ever in that which i create ; for , behold , i create jerusalem a rejoicing , and her people a joy .
1	and they shall build houses , and inhabit them ; and they shall plant vineyards , and eat the fruit of them .
1	they shall not labor in vain , nor bring forth for calamity ; for they are the seed of the blessed of jehovah , and their offspring with them .
1	and it shall come to pass that , before they call , i will answer ; and while they are yet speaking , i will hear .
1	a voice of tumult from the city , a voice from the temple , a voice of jehovah that rendereth recompense to his enemies .
1	before she travailed , she brought forth ; before her pain came , she was delivered of a man-child .
1	rejoice ye with jerusalem , and be glad for her , all ye that love her : rejoice for joy with her , all ye that mourn over her ;
1	that ye may suck and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations ; that ye may milk out , and be delighted with the abundance of her glory .
1	as one whom his mother comforteth , so will i comfort you ; and ye shall be comforted in jerusalem .
1	for by fire will jehovah execute judgment , and by his sword , upon all flesh ; and the slain of jehovah shall be many .
1	and of them also will i take for priests and for levites , saith jehovah .
1	james , a servant of god and of the lord jesus christ , to the twelve tribes which are of the dispersion , greeting .
1	count it all joy , my brethren , when ye fall into manifold temptations ;
1	knowing that the proving of your faith worketh patience .
1	and let patience have its perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , lacking in nothing .
1	but if any of you lacketh wisdom , let him ask of god , who giveth to all liberally and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
1	but let him ask in faith , nothing doubting : for he that doubteth is like the surge of the sea driven by the wind and tossed .
1	for let not that man think that he shall receive anything of the lord ;
1	a doubleminded man , unstable in all his ways .
1	but let the brother of low degree glory in his high estate :
1	and the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
1	but each man is tempted , when he is drawn away by his own lust , and enticed .
1	then the lust , when it hath conceived , beareth sin : and the sin , when it is fullgrown , bringeth forth death .
1	be not deceived , my beloved brethren .
1	of his own will he brought us forth by the word of truth , that we should be a kind of first-fruits of his creatures .
1	ye know this , my beloved brethren . but let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
1	for the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of god .
1	wherefore putting away all filthiness and overflowing of wickedness , receive with meekness the implanted word , which is able to save your souls .
1	but be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deluding your own selves .
1	for if any one is a hearer of the word and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a mirror :
1	for he beholdeth himself , and goeth away , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
1	if any man thinketh himself to be religious , while he bridleth not his tongue but deceiveth his heart , this man ’ s religion is vain .
1	my brethren , hold not the faith of our lord jesus christ , the lord of glory , with respect of persons .
1	for if there come into your synagogue a man with a gold ring , in fine clothing , and there come in also a poor man in vile clothing ;
1	do ye not make distinctions among yourselves , and become judges with evil thoughts ?
1	but ye have dishonored the poor man . do not the rich oppress you , and themselves drag you before the judgment-seats ?
1	do not they blaspheme the honorable name by which ye are called ?
1	howbeit if ye fulfil the royal law , according to the scripture , thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself , ye do well :
1	but if ye have respect of persons , ye commit sin , being convicted by the law as transgressors .
1	for whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet stumble in one point , he is become guilty of all .
1	so speak ye , and so do , as men that are to be judged by a law of liberty .
1	for judgment is without mercy to him that hath showed no mercy : mercy glorieth against judgment .
1	what doth it profit , my brethren , if a man say he hath faith , but have not works ? can that faith save him ?
1	if a brother or sister be naked and in lack of daily food ,
1	even so faith , if it have not works , is dead in itself .
1	thou believest that god is one ; thou doest well : the demons also believe , and shudder .
1	but wilt thou know , o vain man , that faith apart from works is barren ?
1	was not abraham our father justified by works , in that he offered up isaac his son upon the altar ?
1	thou seest that faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ;
1	ye see that by works a man is justified , and not only by faith .
1	and in like manner was not also rahab the harlot justified by works , in that she received the messengers , and sent them out another way ?
1	for as the body apart from the spirit is dead , even so faith apart from works is dead .
1	be not many of you teachers , my brethren , knowing that we shall receive heavier judgment .
1	for in many things we all stumble . if any stumbleth not in word , the same is a perfect man , able to bridle the whole body also .
1	now if we put the horses ’ bridles into their mouths that they may obey us , we turn about their whole body also .
1	so the tongue also is a little member , and boasteth great things . behold , how much wood is kindled by how small a fire !
1	for every kind of beasts and birds , of creeping things and things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed by mankind :
1	but the tongue can no man tame ; it is a restless evil , it is full of deadly poison .
1	therewith bless we the lord and father ; and therewith curse we men , who are made after the likeness of god :
1	out of the same mouth cometh forth blessing and cursing . my brethren , these things ought not so to be .
1	doth the fountain send forth from the same opening sweet water and bitter ?
1	can a fig tree , my brethren , yield olives , or a vine figs ? neither can salt water yield sweet .
1	who is wise and understanding among you ? let him show by his good life his works in meekness of wisdom .
1	but if ye have bitter jealousy and faction in your heart , glory not and lie not against the truth .
1	this wisdom is not a wisdom that cometh down from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
1	for where jealousy and faction are , there is confusion and every vile deed .
1	and the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace for them that make peace .
1	whence come wars and whence come fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your pleasures that war in your members ?
1	ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may spend it in your pleasures .
1	or think ye that the scripture speaketh in vain ? doth the spirit which he made to dwell in us long unto envying ?
1	but he giveth more grace . wherefore the scripture saith , god resisteth the proud , but giveth grace to the humble .
1	be subject therefore unto god ; but resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
1	draw nigh to god , and he will draw nigh to you . cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye doubleminded .
1	be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
1	humble yourselves in the sight of the lord , and he shall exalt you .
1	one only is the lawgiver and judge , even he who is able to save and to destroy : but who art thou that judgest thy neighbor ?
1	come now , ye that say , to-day or to-morrow we will go into this city , and spend a year there , and trade , and get gain :
1	for that ye ought to say , if the lord will , we shall both live , and do this or that .
1	but now ye glory in your vauntings : all such glorying is evil .
1	to him therefore that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
1	come now , ye rich , weep and howl for your miseries that are coming upon you .
1	your riches are corrupted , and your garments are moth-eaten .
1	ye have lived delicately on the earth , and taken your pleasure ; ye have nourished your hearts in a day of slaughter .
1	ye have condemned , ye have killed the righteous one ; he doth not resist you .
1	be ye also patient ; establish your hearts : for the coming of the lord is at hand .
1	murmur not , brethren , one against another , that ye be not judged : behold , the judge standeth before the doors .
1	take , brethren , for an example of suffering and of patience , the prophets who spake in the name of the lord .
1	is any among you suffering ? let him pray . is any cheerful ? let him sing praise .
1	and he prayed again ; and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
1	my brethren , if any among you err from the truth , and one convert him ;
1	peter , an apostle of jesus christ , to the elect who are sojourners of the dispersion in pontus , galatia , cappadocia , asia , and bithynia ,
1	unto an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
1	who by the power of god are guarded through faith unto a salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
1	wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a little while , if need be , ye have been put to grief in manifold trials ,
1	receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
1	concerning which salvation the prophets sought and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
1	as children of obedience , not fashioning yourselves according to your former lusts in the time of your ignorance :
1	but like as he who called you is holy , be ye yourselves also holy in all manner of living ;
1	because it is written , ye shall be holy ; for i am holy .
1	knowing that ye were redeemed , not with corruptible things , with silver or gold , from your vain manner of life handed down from your fathers ;
1	but with precious blood , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot , even the blood of christ :
1	who was foreknown indeed before the foundation of the world , but was manifested at the end of the times for your sake ,
1	seeing ye have purified your souls in your obedience to the truth unto unfeigned love of the brethren , love one another from the heart fervently :
1	having been begotten again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , through the word of god , which liveth and abideth .
1	but the word of the lord abideth for ever .
1	putting away therefore all wickedness , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
1	as newborn babes , long for the spiritual milk which is without guile , that ye may grow thereby unto salvation ;
1	if ye have tasted that the lord is gracious :
1	unto whom coming , a living stone , rejected indeed of men , but with god elect , precious ,
1	because it is contained in scripture ,
1	for you therefore that believe is the preciousness : but for such as disbelieve ,
1	who in time past were no people , but now are the people of god : who had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
1	beloved , i beseech you as sojourners and pilgrims , to abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
1	be subject to every ordinance of man for the lord ’ s sake : whether to the king , as supreme ;
1	or unto governors , as sent by him for vengeance on evil-doers and for praise to them that do well .
1	for so is the will of god , that by well-doing ye should put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
1	as free , and not using your freedom for a cloak of wickedness , but as bondservants of god .
1	honor all men . love the brotherhood . fear god . honor the king .
1	servants , be in subjection to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
1	for this is acceptable , if for conscience toward god a man endureth griefs , suffering wrongfully .
1	for hereunto were ye called : because christ also suffered for you , leaving you an example , that ye should follow his steps :
1	who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
1	who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
1	for ye were going astray like sheep ; but are now returned unto the shepherd and bishop of your souls .
1	beholding your chaste behavior coupled with fear .
1	whose adorning let it not be the outward adorning of braiding the hair , and of wearing jewels of gold , or of putting on apparel ;
1	for after this manner aforetime the holy women also , who hoped in god , adorned themselves , being in subjection to their own husbands :
1	as sarah obeyed abraham , calling him lord : whose children ye now are , if ye do well , and are not put in fear by any terror .
1	finally , be ye all likeminded , compassionate , loving as brethren , tenderhearted , humbleminded :
1	not rendering evil for evil , or reviling for reviling ; but contrariwise blessing ; for hereunto were ye called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
1	and let him turn away from evil , and do good ;
1	for the eyes of the lord are upon the righteous ,
1	and who is he that will harm you , if ye be zealous of that which is good ?
1	but even if ye should suffer for righteousness ’ sake , blessed are ye : and fear not their fear , neither be troubled ;
1	having a good conscience ; that , wherein ye are spoken against , they may be put to shame who revile your good manner of life in christ .
1	for it is better , if the will of god should so will , that ye suffer for well-doing than for evil-doing .
1	in which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ,
1	who is on the right hand of god , having gone into heaven ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
1	that ye no longer should live the rest of your time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of god .
1	wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them into the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
1	who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the living and the dead .
1	but the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore of sound mind , and be sober unto prayer :
1	above all things being fervent in your love among yourselves ; for love covereth a multitude of sins :
1	using hospitality one to another without murmuring :
1	according as each hath received a gift , ministering it among yourselves , as good stewards of the manifold grace of god ;
1	beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial among you , which cometh upon you to prove you , as though a strange thing happened unto you :
1	but insomuch as ye are partakers of christ ’ s sufferings , rejoice ; that at the revelation of his glory also ye may rejoice with exceeding joy .
1	if ye are reproached for the name of christ , blessed are ye ; because the spirit of glory and the spirit of god resteth upon you .
1	for let none of you suffer as a murderer , or a thief , or an evil-doer , or as a meddler in other men ’ s matters :
1	but if a man suffer as a christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify god in this name .
1	and if the righteous is scarcely saved , where shall the ungodly and sinner appear ?
1	wherefore let them also that suffer according to the will of god commit their souls in well-doing unto a faithful creator .
1	neither as lording it over the charge allotted to you , but making yourselves ensamples to the flock .
1	and when the chief shepherd shall be manifested , ye shall receive the crown of glory that fadeth not away .
1	humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of god , that he may exalt you in due time ;
1	casting all your anxiety upon him , because he careth for you .
1	be sober , be watchful : your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
1	whom withstand stedfast in your faith , knowing that the same sufferings are accomplished in your brethren who are in the world .
1	to him be the dominion for ever and ever . amen .
1	she that is in babylon , elect together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth mark my son .
1	salute one another with a kiss of love .
1	grace to you and peace be multiplied in the knowledge of god and of jesus our lord ;
1	yea , and for this very cause adding on your part all diligence , in your faith supply virtue ; and in your virtue knowledge ;
1	and in your knowledge self-control ; and in your self-control patience ; and in your patience godliness ;
1	and in your godliness brotherly kindness ; and in your brotherly kindness love .
1	for if these things are yours and abound , they make you to be not idle nor unfruitful unto the knowledge of our lord jesus christ .
1	for he that lacketh these things is blind , seeing only what is near , having forgotten the cleansing from his old sins .
1	wherefore , brethren , give the more diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never stumble :
1	for thus shall be richly supplied unto you the entrance into the eternal kingdom of our lord and saviour jesus christ .
1	and i think it right , as long as i am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
1	knowing that the putting off of my tabernacle cometh swiftly , even as our lord jesus christ signified unto me .
1	yea , i will give diligence that at every time ye may be able after my decease to call these things to remembrance .
1	and this voice we ourselves heard borne out of heaven , when we were with him in the holy mount .
1	knowing this first , that no prophecy of scripture is of private interpretation .
1	for no prophecy ever came by the will of man : but men spake from god , being moved by the holy spirit .
1	and many shall follow their lascivious doings ; by reason of whom the way of the truth shall be evil spoken of .
1	and in covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose sentence now from of old lingereth not , and their destruction slumbereth not .
1	and turning the cities of sodom and gomorrah into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , having made them an example unto those that should live ungodly ;
1	and delivered righteous lot , sore distressed by the lascivious life of the wicked
1	( for that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their lawless deeds ) :
1	the lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptation , and to keep the unrighteous under punishment unto the day of judgment ;
1	but chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of defilement , and despise dominion . daring , self-willed , they tremble not to rail at dignities :
1	whereas angels , though greater in might and power , bring not a railing judgment against them before the lord .
1	having eyes full of adultery , and that can not cease from sin ; enticing unstedfast souls ; having a heart exercised in covetousness ; children of cursing ;
1	forsaking the right way , they went astray , having followed the way of balaam the son of beor , who loved the hire of wrong-doing ;
1	but he was rebuked for his own transgression : a dumb ass spake with man ’ s voice and stayed the madness of the prophet .
1	these are springs without water , and mists driven by a storm ; for whom the blackness of darkness hath been reserved .
1	promising them liberty , while they themselves are bondservants of corruption ; for of whom a man is overcome , of the same is he also brought into bondage .
1	that ye should remember the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and the commandment of the lord and saviour through your apostles :
1	knowing this first , that in the last days mockers shall come with mockery , walking after their own lusts ,
1	by which means the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished :
1	but forget not this one thing , beloved , that one day is with the lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
1	seeing that these things are thus all to be dissolved , what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy living and godliness ,
1	but , according to his promise , we look for new heavens and a new earth , wherein dwelleth righteousness .
1	wherefore , beloved , seeing that ye look for these things , give diligence that ye may be found in peace , without spot and blameless in his sight .
1	ye therefore , beloved , knowing these things beforehand , beware lest , being carried away with the error of the wicked , ye fall from your own stedfastness .
1	but grow in the grace and knowledge of our lord and saviour jesus christ . to him be the glory both now and for ever . amen .
1	and these things we write , that our joy may be made full .
1	and this is the message which we have heard from him and announce unto you , that god is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
1	if we say that we have fellowship with him and walk in the darkness , we lie , and do not the truth :
1	if we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
1	if we confess our sins , he is faithful and righteous to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
1	if we say that we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
1	and he is the propitiation for our sins ; and not for ours only , but also for the whole world .
1	and hereby we know that we know him , if we keep his commandments .
1	he that saith , i know him , and keepeth not his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him ;
1	but whoso keepeth his word , in him verily hath the love of god been perfected . hereby we know that we are in him :
1	he that saith he abideth in him ought himself also to walk even as he walked .
1	he that saith he is in the light and hateth his brother , is in the darkness even until now .
1	he that loveth his brother abideth in the light , and there is no occasion of stumbling in him .
1	i write unto you , my little children , because your sins are forgiven you for his name ’ s sake .
1	and the world passeth away , and the lust thereof : but he that doeth the will of god abideth for ever .
1	and ye have an anointing from the holy one , and ye know all things .
1	i have not written unto you because ye know not the truth , but because ye know it , and because no lie is of the truth .
1	who is the liar but he that denieth that jesus is the christ ? this is the antichrist , even he that denieth the father and the son .
1	whosoever denieth the son , the same hath not the father : he that confesseth the son hath the father also .
1	and this is the promise which he promised us , even the life eternal .
1	these things have i written unto you concerning them that would lead you astray .
1	if ye know that he is righteous , ye know that every one also that doeth righteousness is begotten of him .
1	and every one that hath this hope set on him purifieth himself , even as he is pure .
1	every one that doeth sin doeth also lawlessness ; and sin is lawlessness .
1	and ye know that he was manifested to take away sins ; and in him is no sin .
1	whosoever abideth in him sinneth not : whosoever sinneth hath not seen him , neither knoweth him .
1	my little children , let no man lead you astray : he that doeth righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous :
1	whosoever is begotten of god doeth no sin , because his seed abideth in him : and he can not sin , because he is begotten of god .
1	for this is the message which ye heard from the beginning , that we should love one another :
1	marvel not , brethren , if the world hateth you .
1	we know that we have passed out of death into life , because we love the brethren . he that loveth not abideth in death .
1	whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer : and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him .
1	hereby know we love , because he laid down his life for us : and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
1	my little children , let us not love in word , neither with the tongue ; but in deed and truth .
1	hereby shall we know that we are of the truth , and shall assure our heart before him :
1	because if our heart condemn us , god is greater than our heart , and knoweth all things .
1	beloved , if our heart condemn us not , we have boldness toward god ;
1	and whatsoever we ask we receive of him , because we keep his commandments and do the things that are pleasing in his sight .
1	beloved , believe not every spirit , but prove the spirits , whether they are of god ; because many false prophets are gone out into the world .
1	hereby know ye the spirit of god : every spirit that confesseth that jesus christ is come in the flesh is of god :
1	ye are of god , my little children , and have overcome them : because greater is he that is in you than he that is in the world .
1	they are of the world : therefore speak they as of the world , and the world heareth them .
1	beloved , let us love one another : for love is of god ; and every one that loveth is begotten of god , and knoweth god .
1	he that loveth not knoweth not god ; for god is love .
1	herein was the love of god manifested in us , that god hath sent his only begotten son into the world that we might live through him .
1	herein is love , not that we loved god , but that he loved us , and sent his son to be the propitiation for our sins .
1	beloved , if god so loved us , we also ought to love one another .
1	no man hath beheld god at any time : if we love one another , god abideth in us , and his love is perfected in us :
1	hereby we know that we abide in him and he in us , because he hath given us of his spirit .
1	and we have beheld and bear witness that the father hath sent the son to be the saviour of the world .
1	whosoever shall confess that jesus is the son of god , god abideth in him , and he in god .
1	there is no fear in love : but perfect love casteth out fear , because fear hath punishment ; and he that feareth is not made perfect in love .
1	we love , because he first loved us .
1	and this commandment have we from him , that he who loveth god love his brother also .
1	whosoever believeth that jesus is the christ is begotten of god : and whosoever loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him .
1	hereby we know that we love the children of god , when we love god and do his commandments .
1	for this is the love of god , that we keep his commandments : and his commandments are not grievous .
1	for whatsoever is begotten of god overcometh the world : and this is the victory that hath overcome the world , even our faith .
1	and who is he that overcometh the world , but he that believeth that jesus is the son of god ?
1	this is he that came by water and blood , even jesus christ ; not with the water only , but with the water and with the blood .
1	and it is the spirit that beareth witness , because the spirit is the truth .
1	for there are three who bear witness , the spirit , and the water , and the blood : and the three agree in one .
1	and the witness is this , that god gave unto us eternal life , and this life is in his son .
1	he that hath the son hath the life ; he that hath not the son of god hath not the life .
1	and this is the boldness which we have toward him , that , if we ask anything according to his will , he heareth us :
1	and if we know that he heareth us whatsoever we ask , we know that we have the petitions which we have asked of him .
1	all unrighteousness is sin : and there is a sin not unto death .
1	we know that whosoever is begotten of god sinneth not ; but he that was begotten of god keepeth himself , and the evil one toucheth him not .
1	we know that we are of god , and the whole world lieth in the evil one .
1	my little children , guard yourselves from idols .
1	the elder unto the elect lady and her children , whom i love in truth ; and not i only , but also all they that know the truth ;
1	for the truth ’ s sake which abideth in us , and it shall be with us for ever :
1	i rejoice greatly that i have found certain of thy children walking in truth , even as we received commandment from the father .
1	look to yourselves , that ye lose not the things which we have wrought , but that ye receive a full reward .
1	if any one cometh unto you , and bringeth not this teaching , receive him not into your house , and give him no greeting :
1	for he that giveth him greeting partaketh in his evil works .
1	the children of thine elect sister salute thee .
1	the elder unto gaius the beloved , whom i love in truth .
1	beloved , i pray that in all things thou mayest prosper and be in health , even as thy soul prospereth .
1	for i rejoiced greatly , when brethren came and bare witness unto thy truth , even as thou walkest in truth .
1	greater joy have i none than this , to hear of my children walking in the truth .
1	beloved , thou doest a faithful work in whatsoever thou doest toward them that are brethren and strangers withal ;
1	who bare witness to thy love before the church : whom thou wilt do well to set forward on their journey worthily of god :
1	because that for the sake of the name they went forth , taking nothing of the gentiles .
1	we therefore ought to welcome such , that we may be fellow-workers for the truth .
1	i wrote somewhat unto the church : but diotrephes , who loveth to have the preeminence among them , receiveth us not .
1	demetrius hath the witness of all men , and of the truth itself : yea , we also bear witness ; and thou knowest that our witness is true .
1	i had many things to write unto thee , but i am unwilling to write them to thee with ink and pen :
1	the words of jeremiah the son of hilkiah , of the priests that were in anathoth in the land of benjamin :
1	to whom the word of jehovah came in the days of josiah the son of amon , king of judah , in the thirteenth year of his reign .
1	now the word of jehovah came unto me , saying ,
1	then said i , ah , lord jehovah ! behold , i know not how to speak ; for i am a child .
1	be not afraid because of them ; for i am with thee to deliver thee , saith jehovah .
1	then jehovah put forth his hand , and touched my mouth ; and jehovah said unto me , behold , i have put my words in thy mouth :
1	moreover the word of jehovah came unto me , saying , jeremiah , what seest thou ? and i said , i see a rod of an almond-tree .
1	then said jehovah unto me , thou hast well seen : for i watch over my word to perform it .
1	then jehovah said unto me , out of the north evil shall break forth upon all the inhabitants of the land .
1	and they shall fight against thee ; but they shall not prevail against thee : for i am with thee , saith jehovah , to deliver thee .
1	and the word of jehovah came to me , saying ,
1	israel was holiness unto jehovah , the first-fruits of his increase : all that devour him shall be held guilty ; evil shall come upon them , saith jehovah .
1	hear ye the word of jehovah , o house of jacob , and all the families of the house of israel :
1	wherefore i will yet contend with you , saith jehovah , and with your children ’ s children will i contend .
1	hath a nation changed its gods , which yet are no gods ? but my people have changed their glory for that which doth not profit .
1	be astonished , o ye heavens , at this , and be horribly afraid , be ye very desolate , saith jehovah .
1	is israel a servant ? is he a home-born slave ? why is he become a prey ?
1	the young lions have roared upon him , and yelled ; and they have made his land waste : his cities are burned up , without inhabitant .
1	the children also of memphis and tahpanhes have broken the crown of thy head .
1	hast thou not procured this unto thyself , in that thou hast forsaken jehovah thy god , when he led thee by the way ?
1	yet i had planted thee a noble vine , wholly a right seed : how then art thou turned into the degenerate branches of a foreign vine unto me ?
1	for though thou wash thee with lye , and take thee much soap , yet thine iniquity is marked before me , saith the lord jehovah .
1	wherefore will ye contend with me ? ye all have transgressed against me , saith jehovah .
1	in vain have i smitten your children ; they received no correction : your own sword hath devoured your prophets , like a destroying lion .
1	can a virgin forget her ornaments , or a bride her attire ? yet my people have forgotten me days without number .
1	how trimmest thou thy way to seek love ! therefore even the wicked women hast thou taught thy ways .
1	why gaddest thou about so much to change thy way ? thou shalt be ashamed of egypt also , as thou wast ashamed of assyria .
1	therefore the showers have been withholden , and there hath been no latter rain ; yet thou hadst a harlot ’ s forehead , thou refusedst to be ashamed .
1	wilt thou not from this time cry unto me , my father , thou art the guide of my youth ?
1	and i said after she had done all these things , she will return unto me ; but she returned not : and her treacherous sister judah saw it .
1	and it came to pass through the lightness of her whoredom , that the land was polluted , and she committed adultery with stones and with stocks .
1	and yet for all this her treacherous sister judah hath not returned unto me with her whole heart , but feignedly , saith jehovah .
1	and jehovah said unto me , backsliding israel hath showed herself more righteous than treacherous judah .
1	and i will give you shepherds according to my heart , who shall feed you with knowledge and understanding .
1	surely as a wife treacherously departeth from her husband , so have ye dealt treacherously with me , o house of israel , saith jehovah .
1	return , ye backsliding children , i will heal your backslidings .
1	but the shameful thing hath devoured the labor of our fathers from our youth , their flocks and their herds , their sons and their daughters .
1	for thus saith jehovah to the men of judah and to jerusalem , break up your fallow ground , and sow not among thorns .
1	set up a standard toward zion : flee for safety , stay not ; for i will bring evil from the north , and a great destruction .
1	for this gird you with sackcloth , lament and wail ; for the fierce anger of jehovah is not turned back from us .
1	a full wind from these shall come for me : now will i also utter judgments against them .
1	o jerusalem , wash thy heart from wickedness , that thou mayest be saved . how long shall thine evil thoughts lodge within thee ?
1	for a voice declareth from dan , and publisheth evil from the hills of ephraim .
1	as keepers of a field are they against her round about , because she hath been rebellious against me , saith jehovah .
1	thy way and thy doings have procured these things unto thee ; this is thy wickedness ; for it is bitter , for it reacheth unto thy heart .
1	destruction upon destruction is cried ; for the whole land is laid waste : suddenly are my tents destroyed , and my curtains in a moment .
1	how long shall i see the standard , and hear the sound of the trumpet ?
1	i beheld the earth , and , lo , it was waste and void ; and the heavens , and they had no light .
1	i beheld the mountains , and , lo , they trembled , and all the hills moved to and fro .
1	i beheld , and , lo , there was no man , and all the birds of the heavens were fled .
1	for thus saith jehovah , the whole land shall be a desolation ; yet will i not make a full end .
1	and though they say , as jehovah liveth ; surely they swear falsely .
1	then i said , surely these are poor ; they are foolish ; for they know not the way of jehovah , nor the law of their god :
1	they were as fed horses roaming at large ; every one neighed after his neighbor ’ s wife .
1	shall i not visit for these things ? saith jehovah ; and shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this ?
1	go ye up upon her walls , and destroy ; but make not a full end : take away her branches ; for they are not jehovah ’ s .
1	for the house of israel and the house of judah have dealt very treacherously against me , saith jehovah .
1	they have denied jehovah , and said , it is not he ; neither shall evil come upon us ; neither shall we see sword nor famine :
1	and the prophets shall become wind , and the word is not in them : thus shall it be done unto them .
1	their quiver is an open sepulchre , they are all mighty men .
1	but even in those days , saith jehovah , i will not make a full end with you .
1	declare ye this in the house of jacob , and publish it in judah , saying ,
1	hear now this , o foolish people , and without understanding ; that have eyes , and see not ; that have ears , and hear not :
1	but this people hath a revolting and a rebellious heart ; they are revolted and gone .
1	your iniquities have turned away these things , and your sins have withholden good from you .
1	for among my people are found wicked men : they watch , as fowlers lie in wait ; they set a trap , they catch men .
1	as a cage is full of birds , so are their houses full of deceit : therefore they are become great , and waxed rich .
1	shall i not visit for these things ? saith jehovah ; shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this ?
1	a wonderful and horrible thing is come to pass in the land :
1	the comely and delicate one , the daughter of zion , will i cut off .
1	shepherds with their flocks shall come unto her ; they shall pitch their tents against her round about ; they shall feed every one in his place .
1	arise , and let us go up by night , and let us destroy her palaces .
1	be thou instructed , o jerusalem , lest my soul be alienated from thee ; lest i make thee a desolation , a land not inhabited .
1	thus saith jehovah of hosts , they shall thoroughly glean the remnant of israel as a vine : turn again thy hand as a grape-gatherer into the baskets .
1	they have healed also the hurt of my people slightly , saying , peace , peace ; when there is no peace .
1	and i set watchmen over you , saying , hearken to the sound of the trumpet ; but they said , we will not hearken .
1	therefore hear , ye nations , and know , o congregation , what is among them .
1	thus saith jehovah , behold , a people cometh from the north country ; and a great nation shall be stirred up from the uttermost parts of the earth .
1	we have heard the report thereof ; our hands wax feeble : anguish hath taken hold of us , and pangs as of a woman in travail .
1	go not forth into the field , nor walk by the way ; for the sword of the enemy , and terror , are on every side .
1	i have made thee a trier and a fortress among my people ; that thou mayest know and try their way .
1	they are all grievous revolters , going about with slanders ; they are brass and iron : they all of them deal corruptly .
1	the bellows blow fiercely ; the lead is consumed of the fire : in vain do they go on refining ; for the wicked are not plucked away .
1	refuse silver shall men call them , because jehovah hath rejected them .
1	the word that came to jeremiah from jehovah , saying ,
1	thus saith jehovah of hosts , the god of israel , amend your ways and your doings , and i will cause you to dwell in this place .
1	trust ye not in lying words , saying , the temple of jehovah , the temple of jehovah , the temple of jehovah , are these .
1	for if ye thoroughly amend your ways and your doings ; if ye thoroughly execute justice between a man and his neighbor ;
1	then will i cause you to dwell in this place , in the land that i gave to your fathers , from of old even for evermore .
1	behold , ye trust in lying words , that can not profit .
1	and i will cast you out of my sight , as i have cast out all your brethren , even the whole seed of ephraim .
1	therefore pray not thou for this people , neither lift up cry nor prayer for them , neither make intercession to me ; for i will not hear thee .
1	seest thou not what they do in the cities of judah and in the streets of jerusalem ?
1	do they provoke me to anger ? saith jehovah ; do they not provoke themselves , to the confusion of their own faces ?
1	thus saith jehovah of hosts , the god of israel : add your burnt-offerings unto your sacrifices , and eat ye flesh .
1	for i spake not unto your fathers , nor commanded them in the day that i brought them out of the land of egypt , concerning burnt-offerings or sacrifices :
1	yet they hearkened not unto me , nor inclined their ear , but made their neck stiff : they did worse than their fathers .
1	moreover thou shalt say unto them , thus saith jehovah : shall men fall , and not rise up again ? shall one turn away , and not return ?
1	why then is this people of jerusalem slidden back by a perpetual backsliding ? they hold fast deceit , they refuse to return .
1	and they have healed the hurt of the daughter of my people slightly , saying , peace , peace ; when there is no peace .
1	we looked for peace , but no good came ; and for a time of healing , and , behold , dismay !
1	for , behold , i will send serpents , adders , among you , which will not be charmed ; and they shall bite you , saith jehovah .
1	oh that i could comfort myself against sorrow ! my heart is faint within me .
1	the harvest is past , the summer is ended , and we are not saved .
1	for the hurt of the daughter of my people am i hurt : i mourn ; dismay hath taken hold on me .
1	is there no balm in gilead ? is there no physician there ? why then is not the health of the daughter of my people recovered ?
1	thy habitation is in the midst of deceit ; through deceit they refuse to know me , saith jehovah .
1	shall i not visit them for these things ? saith jehovah ; shall not my soul be avenged on such a nation as this ?
1	and i will make jerusalem heaps , a dwelling-place of jackals ; and i will make the cities of judah a desolation , without inhabitant .
1	and jehovah saith , because they have forsaken my law which i set before them , and have not obeyed my voice , neither walked therein ,
1	but have walked after the stubbornness of their own heart , and after the baalim , which their fathers taught them ;
1	behold , the days come , saith jehovah , that i will punish all them that are circumcised in their uncircumcision :

1	thus saith jehovah , learn not the way of the nations , and be not dismayed at the signs of heaven ; for the nations are dismayed at them .

1	jehovah hath spoken concerning you , o remnant of judah , go ye not into egypt : know certainly that i have testified unto you this day .
1	and they came into the land of egypt ; for they obeyed not the voice of jehovah : and they came unto tahpanhes .

1	they cried there , pharaoh king of egypt is but a noise ; he hath let the appointed time pass by .

1	they shall cut down her forest , saith jehovah , though it can not be searched ; because they are more than the locusts , and are innumerable .
1	the daughter of egypt shall be put to shame ; she shall be delivered into the hand of the people of the north .

1	behold , god is mighty , and despiseth not any :
1	he preserveth not the life of the wicked ,
1	he withdraweth not his eyes from the righteous :
1	and if they be bound in fetters ,
1	then he showeth them their work ,
1	he openeth also their ear to instruction ,
1	if they hearken and serve him ,
1	but if they hearken not , they shall perish by the sword ,
1	but they that are godless in heart lay up anger :
1	they die in youth ,
1	he delivereth the afflicted by their affliction ,
1	yea , he would have allured thee out of distress
1	but thou art full of the judgment of the wicked :
1	for let not wrath stir thee up against chastisements ;
1	will thy cry avail , that thou be not in distress ,
1	desire not the night ,
1	take heed , regard not iniquity :
1	behold , god doeth loftily in his power :
1	who hath enjoined him his way ?
1	remember that thou magnify his work ,
1	all men have looked thereon ;
1	behold , god is great , and we know him not ;
1	for he draweth up the drops of water ,
1	which the skies pour down
1	yea , can any understand the spreadings of the clouds ,
1	behold , he spreadeth his light around him ;
1	for by these he judgeth the peoples ;
1	he covereth his hands with the lightning ,
1	the noise thereof telleth concerning him ,
1	yea , at this my heart trembleth ,
1	hear , oh , hear the noise of his voice ,
1	he sendeth it forth under the whole heaven ,
1	after it a voice roareth ;
1	god thundereth marvellously with his voice ;
1	for he saith to the snow , fall thou on the earth ;
1	he sealeth up the hand of every man ,
1	then the beasts go into coverts ,
1	out of the chamber of the south cometh the storm ,
1	by the breath of god ice is given ;
1	yea , he ladeth the thick cloud with moisture ;
1	and it is turned round about by his guidance ,
1	whether it be for correction , or for his land ,
1	hearken unto this , o job :
1	dost thou know how god layeth his charge upon them ,
1	dost thou know the balancings of the clouds ,
1	how thy garments are warm ,

1	teach us what we shall say unto him ;
1	shall it be told him that i would speak ?
1	and now men see not the light which is bright in the skies ;
1	out of the north cometh golden splendor :
1	touching the almighty , we can not find him out :
1	men do therefore fear him :

1	who determined the measures thereof , if thou knowest ?
1	whereupon were the foundations thereof fastened ?

1	or who shut up the sea with doors ,

1	have the gates of death been revealed unto thee ?
1	hast thou comprehended the earth in its breadth ?
1	where is the way to the dwelling of light ?
1	that thou shouldest take it to the bound thereof ,
1	doubtless , thou knowest , for thou wast then born ,
1	hast thou entered the treasuries of the snow ,
1	which i have reserved against the time of trouble ,
1	by what way is the light parted ,
1	who hath cleft a channel for the waterflood ,
1	to cause it to rain on a land where no man is ;
1	to satisfy the waste and desolate ground ,
1	hath the rain a father ?
1	out of whose womb came the ice ?
1	the waters hide themselves and become like stone ,

1	knowest thou the ordinances of the heavens ?
1	canst thou lift up thy voice to the clouds ,
1	canst thou send forth lightnings , that they may go ,
1	who hath put wisdom in the inward parts ?
1	who can number the clouds by wisdom ?
1	when the dust runneth into a mass ,
1	canst thou hunt the prey for the lioness ,
1	when they couch in their dens ,
1	who provideth for the raven his prey ,
1	knowest thou the time when the wild goats of the rock bring forth ?
1	canst thou number the months that they fulfil ?
1	they bow themselves , they bring forth their young ,
1	their young ones become strong , they grow up in the open field ;
1	who hath sent out the wild ass free ?
1	whose home i have made the wilderness ,
1	he scorneth the tumult of the city ,
1	the range of the mountains is his pasture ,
1	will the wild-ox be content to serve thee ?
1	canst thou bind the wild-ox with his band in the furrow ?
1	wilt thou trust him , because his strength is great ?
1	wilt thou confide in him , that he will bring home thy seed ,
1	the wings of the ostrich wave proudly ;
1	for she leaveth her eggs on the earth ,
1	and forgetteth that the foot may crush them ,
1	she dealeth hardly with her young ones , as if they were not hers :
1	because god hath deprived her of wisdom ,
1	what time she lifteth up herself on high ,
1	hast thou given the horse his might ?
1	hast thou made him to leap as a locust ?
1	he paweth in the valley , and rejoiceth in his strength :
1	he mocketh at fear , and is not dismayed ;
1	the quiver rattleth against him ,
1	he swalloweth the ground with fierceness and rage ;
1	as oft as the trumpet soundeth he saith , aha !
1	is it by thy wisdom that the hawk soareth ,
1	is it at thy command that the eagle mounteth up ,
1	on the cliff she dwelleth , and maketh her home ,
1	from thence she spieth out the prey ;
1	her young ones also suck up blood :
1	moreover jehovah answered job , and said ,
1	shall he that cavilleth contend with the almighty ?
1	then job answered jehovah , and said ,
1	behold , i am of small account ; what shall i answer thee ?
1	once have i spoken , and i will not answer ;

1	wilt thou even annul my judgment ?
1	or hast thou an arm like god ?

1	behold now , behemoth , which i made as well as thee ;
1	lo now , his strength is in his loins ,
1	he moveth his tail like a cedar :
1	his bones are as tubes of brass ;
1	he is the chief of the ways of god :
1	surely the mountains bring him forth food ,
1	he lieth under the lotus-trees ,
1	the lotus-trees cover him with their shade ;
1	behold , if a river overflow , he trembleth not ;

1	canst thou put a rope into his nose ?
1	will he make many supplications unto thee ?
1	will he make a covenant with thee ,

1	behold , the hope of him is in vain :
1	none is so fierce that he dare stir him up ;
1	who hath first given unto me , that i should repay him ?
1	i will not keep silence concerning his limbs ,
1	who can strip off his outer garment ?
1	who can open the doors of his face ?
1	his strong scales are his pride ,
1	one is so near to another ,
1	they are joined one to another ;
1	his sneezings flash forth light ,
1	out of his mouth go burning torches ,

1	his breath kindleth coals ,
1	in his neck abideth strength ,
1	the flakes of his flesh are joined together :
1	his heart is as firm as a stone ;
1	when he raiseth himself up , the mighty are afraid :
1	if one lay at him with the sword , it can not avail ;

1	the arrow can not make him flee :
1	clubs are counted as stubble :

1	he maketh a path to shine after him ;
1	upon earth there is not his like ,
1	he beholdeth everything that is high :

1	so eliphaz the temanite and bildad the shuhite and zophar the naamathite went , and did according as jehovah commanded them : and jehovah accepted job .
1	and jehovah turned the captivity of job , when he prayed for his friends : and jehovah gave job twice as much as he had before .
1	he had also seven sons and three daughters .
1	and he called the name of the first , jemimah ; and the name of the second , keziah ; and the name of the third , keren-happuch .
1	and in all the land were no women found so fair as the daughters of job : and their father gave them inheritance among their brethren .
1	and after this job lived a hundred and forty years , and saw his sons , and his sons ’ sons , even four generations .
1	so job died , being old and full of days .
1	the word of jehovah that came to joel the son of pethuel .
1	tell ye your children of it , and let your children tell their children , and their children another generation .
1	lament like a virgin girded with sackcloth for the husband of her youth .
1	the meal-offering and the drink-offering are cut off from the house of jehovah ; the priests , jehovah ’ s ministers , mourn .
1	the field is laid waste , the land mourneth ; for the grain is destroyed , the new wine is dried up , the oil languisheth .
1	be confounded , o ye husbandmen , wail , o ye vinedressers , for the wheat and for the barley ; for the harvest of the field is perished .
1	alas for the day ! for the day of jehovah is at hand , and as destruction from the almighty shall it come .
1	is not the food cut off before our eyes , yea , joy and gladness from the house of our god ?
1	the seeds rot under their clods ; the garners are laid desolate , the barns are broken down ; for the grain is withered .
1	how do the beasts groan ! the herds of cattle are perplexed , because they have no pasture ; yea , the flocks of sheep are made desolate .
1	yea , the beasts of the field pant unto thee ; for the water brooks are dried up , and the fire hath devoured the pastures of the wilderness .
1	the appearance of them is as the appearance of horses ; and as horsemen , so do they run .
1	at their presence the peoples are in anguish ; all faces are waxed pale .
1	neither doth one thrust another ; they march every one in his path ; and they burst through the weapons , and break not off their course .
1	they leap upon the city ; they run upon the wall ; they climb up into the houses ; they enter in at the windows like a thief .
1	the earth quaketh before them ; the heavens tremble ; the sun and the moon are darkened , and the stars withdraw their shining .
1	yet even now , saith jehovah , turn ye unto me with all your heart , and with fasting , and with weeping , and with mourning :
1	who knoweth whether he will not turn and repent , and leave a blessing behind him , even a meal-offering and a drink-offering unto jehovah your god ?
1	blow the trumpet in zion , sanctify a fast , call a solemn assembly ;
1	then was jehovah jealous for his land , and had pity on his people .
1	fear not , o land , be glad and rejoice ; for jehovah hath done great things .
1	and the floors shall be full of wheat , and the vats shall overflow with new wine and oil .

1	and i will show wonders in the heavens and in the earth : blood , and fire , and pillars of smoke .
1	the sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before the great and terrible day of jehovah cometh .
1	for , behold , in those days , and in that time , when i shall bring back the captivity of judah and jerusalem ,
1	and have cast lots for my people , and have given a boy for a harlot , and sold a girl for wine , that they may drink .
1	forasmuch as ye have taken my silver and my gold , and have carried into your temples my goodly precious things ,
1	and have sold the children of judah and the children of jerusalem unto the sons of the grecians , that ye may remove them far from their border ;
1	behold , i will stir them up out of the place whither ye have sold them , and will return your recompense upon your own head ;
1	proclaim ye this among the nations ; prepare war ; stir up the mighty men ; let all the men of war draw near , let them come up .
1	beat your plowshares into swords , and your pruning-hooks into spears : let the weak say , i am strong .
1	haste ye , and come , all ye nations round about , and gather yourselves together : thither cause thy mighty ones to come down , o jehovah .

1	but judah shall abide for ever , and jerusalem from generation to generation .
1	and i will cleanse their blood , that i have not cleansed : for jehovah dwelleth in zion .
1	in the beginning was the word , and the word was with god , and the word was god .
1	the same was in the beginning with god .
1	all things were made through him ; and without him was not anything made that hath been made .
1	in him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
1	and the light shineth in the darkness ; and the darkness apprehended it not .
1	there came a man , sent from god , whose name was john .
1	the same came for witness , that he might bear witness of the light , that all might believe through him .
1	he was not the light , but came that he might bear witness of the light .
1	there was the true light , even the light which lighteth every man , coming into the world .
1	he was in the world , and the world was made through him , and the world knew him not .
1	he came unto his own , and they that were his own received him not .
1	but as many as received him , to them gave he the right to become children of god , even to them that believe on his name :
1	who were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of god .
1	for of his fulness we all received , and grace for grace .
1	for the law was given through moses ; grace and truth came through jesus christ .
1	no man hath seen god at any time ; the only begotten son , who is in the bosom of the father , he hath declared him .
1	and this is the witness of john , when the jews sent unto him from jerusalem priests and levites to ask him , who art thou ?
1	and he confessed , and denied not ; and he confessed , i am not the christ .
1	they said therefore unto him , who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . what sayest thou of thyself ?
1	he said , i am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , make straight the way of the lord , as said isaiah the prophet .
1	and they had been sent from the pharisees .
1	and they asked him , and said unto him , why then baptizest thou , if thou art not the christ , neither elijah , neither the prophet ?

1	even he that cometh after me , the latchet of whose shoe i am not worthy to unloose .

1	on the morrow he seeth jesus coming unto him , and saith , behold , the lamb of god , that taketh away the sin of the world !

1	and i knew him not ; but that he should be made manifest to israel , for this cause came i baptizing in water .

1	he findeth first his own brother simon , and saith unto him , we have found the messiah ( which is , being interpreted , christ ) .

1	now philip was from bethsaida , of the city of andrew and peter .

1	jesus saw nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , behold , an israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
1	nathanael answered him , rabbi , thou art the son of god ; thou art king of israel .

1	and when the wine failed , the mother of jesus saith unto him , they have no wine .
1	and jesus saith unto her , woman , what have i to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
1	his mother saith unto the servants , whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
1	now there were six waterpots of stone set there after the jews ’ manner of purifying , containing two or three firkins apiece .
1	jesus saith unto them , fill the waterpots with water . and they filled them up to the brim .
1	and he saith unto them , draw out now , and bear unto the ruler of the feast . and they bare it .
1	this beginning of his signs did jesus in cana of galilee , and manifested his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
1	after this he went down to capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples ; and there they abode not many days .
1	and the passover of the jews was at hand , and jesus went up to jerusalem .

1	his disciples remembered that it was written , zeal for thy house shall eat me up .

1	jesus answered and said unto them , destroy this temple , and in three days i will raise it up .

1	now when he was in jerusalem at the passover , during the feast , many believed on his name , beholding his signs which he did .
1	but jesus did not trust himself unto them , for that he knew all men ,
1	and because he needed not that any one should bear witness concerning man ; for he himself knew what was in man .
1	now there was a man of the pharisees , named nicodemus , a ruler of the jews :
1	that which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the spirit is spirit .

1	nicodemus answered and said unto him , how can these things be ?
1	jesus answered and said unto him , art thou the teacher of israel , and understandest not these things ?
1	if i told you earthly things and ye believe not , how shall ye believe if i tell you heavenly things ?

1	and as moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the son of man be lifted up ;

1	for god so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten son , that whosoever believeth on him should not perish , but have eternal life .
1	for god sent not the son into the world to judge the world ; but that the world should be saved through him .
1	for every one that doeth evil hateth the light , and cometh not to the light , lest his works should be reproved .
1	but he that doeth the truth cometh to the light , that his works may be made manifest , that they have been wrought in god .

1	and jacob ’ s well was there . jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus by the well . it was about the sixth hour .

1	for his disciples were gone away into the city to buy food .
1	the woman saith unto him , sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : whence then hast thou that living water ?
1	art thou greater than our father jacob , who gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his sons , and his cattle ?
1	jesus answered and said unto her , every one that drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
1	the woman saith unto him , sir , give me this water , that i thirst not , neither come all the way hither to draw .
1	jesus saith unto her , go , call thy husband , and come hither .
1	the woman answered and said unto him , i have no husband . jesus saith unto her , thou saidst well , i have no husband :
1	for thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : this hast thou said truly .
1	the woman saith unto him , sir , i perceive that thou art a prophet .

1	ye worship that which ye know not : we worship that which we know ; for salvation is from the jews .
1	god is a spirit : and they that worship him must worship in spirit and truth .
1	jesus saith unto her , i that speak unto thee am he .
1	so the woman left her waterpot , and went away into the city , and saith to the people ,
