1	in the mean while the disciples prayed him , saying , rabbi , eat .
1	but he said unto them , i have meat to eat that ye know not .
1	the disciples therefore said one to another , hath any man brought him aught to eat ?
1	jesus saith unto them , my meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to accomplish his work .
1	he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal ; that he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
1	for herein is the saying true , one soweth , and another reapeth .
1	i sent you to reap that whereon ye have not labored : others have labored , and ye are entered into their labor .
1	so when the samaritans came unto him , they besought him to abide with them : and he abode there two days .
1	and many more believed because of his word ;
1	and after the two days he went forth from thence into galilee .
1	for jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honor in his own country .
1	he came therefore again unto cana of galilee , where he made the water wine . and there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at capernaum .
1	jesus therefore said unto him , except ye see signs and wonders , ye will in no wise believe .
1	the nobleman saith unto him , sir , come down ere my child die .
1	jesus saith unto him , go thy way ; thy son liveth . the man believed the word that jesus spake unto him , and he went his way .
1	and as he was now going down , his servants met him , saying , that his son lived .
1	so he inquired of them the hour when he began to amend . they said therefore unto him , yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
1	so the father knew that it was at that hour in which jesus said unto him , thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
1	this is again the second sign that jesus did , having come out of judaea into galilee .
1	after these things there was a feast of the jews ; and jesus went up to jerusalem .
1	now there is in jerusalem by the sheep gate a pool , which is called in hebrew bethesda , having five porches .
1	in these lay a multitude of them that were sick , blind , halt , withered .
1	and a certain man was there , who had been thirty and eight years in his infirmity .
1	jesus saith unto him , arise , take up thy bed , and walk .
1	and straightway the man was made whole , and took up his bed and walked .
1	so the jews said unto him that was cured , it is the sabbath , and it is not lawful for thee to take up thy bed .
1	but he answered them , he that made me whole , the same said unto me , take up thy bed , and walk .
1	they asked him , who is the man that said unto thee , take up thy bed , and walk ?
1	but he that was healed knew not who it was ; for jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in the place .
1	the man went away , and told the jews that it was jesus who had made him whole .
1	and for this cause the jews persecuted jesus , because he did these things on the sabbath .
1	but jesus answered them , my father worketh even until now , and i work .
1	for as the father raiseth the dead and giveth them life , even so the son also giveth life to whom he will .
1	for neither doth the father judge any man , but he hath given all judgment unto the son ;
1	that all may honor the son , even as they honor the father . he that honoreth not the son honoreth not the father that sent him .
1	for as the father hath life in himself , even so gave he to the son also to have life in himself :
1	and he gave him authority to execute judgment , because he is a son of man .
1	marvel not at this : for the hour cometh , in which all that are in the tombs shall hear his voice ,
1	and shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of judgment .
1	if i bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
1	it is another that beareth witness of me ; and i know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
1	ye have sent unto john , and he hath borne witness unto the truth .
1	but the witness which i receive is not from man : howbeit i say these things , that ye may be saved .
1	he was the lamp that burneth and shineth ; and ye were willing to rejoice for a season in his light .
1	and the father that sent me , he hath borne witness of me . ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his form .
1	and ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he sent , him ye believe not .
1	ye search the scriptures , because ye think that in them ye have eternal life ; and these are they which bear witness of me ;
1	and ye will not come to me , that ye may have life .
1	i receive not glory from men .
1	but i know you , that ye have not the love of god in yourselves .
1	i am come in my father ’ s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
1	how can ye believe , who receive glory one of another , and the glory that cometh from the only god ye seek not ?
1	think not that i will accuse you to the father : there is one that accuseth you , even moses , on whom ye have set your hope .
1	for if ye believed moses , ye would believe me ; for he wrote of me .
1	but if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
1	after these things jesus went away to the other side of the sea of galilee , which is the sea of tiberias .
1	and a great multitude followed him , because they beheld the signs which he did on them that were sick .
1	and jesus went up into the mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
1	now the passover , the feast of the jews , was at hand .
1	and this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
1	philip answered him , two hundred shillings ’ worth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one may take a little .
1	one of his disciples , andrew , simon peter ’ s brother , saith unto him ,
1	there is a lad here , who hath five barley loaves , and two fishes : but what are these among so many ?
1	jesus said , make the people sit down . now there was much grass in the place . so the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
1	and when they were filled , he saith unto his disciples , gather up the broken pieces which remain over , that nothing be lost .
1	so they gathered them up , and filled twelve baskets with broken pieces from the five barley loaves , which remained over unto them that had eaten .
1	when therefore the people saw the sign which he did , they said , this is of a truth the prophet that cometh into the world .
1	jesus therefore perceiving that they were about to come and take him by force , to make him king , withdrew again into the mountain himself alone .
1	and when evening came , his disciples went down unto the sea ;
1	and the sea was rising by reason of a great wind that blew .
1	but he saith unto them , it is i ; be not afraid .
1	they were willing therefore to receive him into the boat : and straightway the boat was at the land whither they were going .
1	( howbeit there came boats from tiberias nigh unto the place where they ate the bread after the lord had given thanks ) :
1	when the multitude therefore saw that jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they themselves got into the boats , and came to capernaum , seeking jesus .
1	and when they found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
1	they said therefore unto him , what must we do , that we may work the works of god ?
1	jesus answered and said unto them , this is the work of god , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
1	they said therefore unto him , what then doest thou for a sign , that we may see , and believe thee ? what workest thou ?
1	our fathers ate the manna in the wilderness ; as it is written , he gave them bread out of heaven to eat .
1	for the bread of god is that which cometh down out of heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
1	they said therefore unto him , lord , evermore give us this bread .
1	but i said unto you , that ye have seen me , and yet believe not .
1	all that which the father giveth me shall come unto me ; and him that cometh to me i will in no wise cast out .
1	for i am come down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
1	the jews therefore murmured concerning him , because he said , i am the bread which came down out of heaven .
1	jesus answered and said unto them , murmur not among yourselves .
1	no man can come to me , except the father that sent me draw him : and i will raise him up in the last day .
1	not that any man hath seen the father , save he that is from god , he hath seen the father .
1	verily , verily , i say unto you , he that believeth hath eternal life .
1	i am the bread of life .
1	your fathers ate the manna in the wilderness , and they died .
1	this is the bread which cometh down out of heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
1	the jews therefore strove one with another , saying , how can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
1	he that eateth my flesh and drinketh my blood hath eternal life ; and i will raise him up at the last day .
1	for my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
1	he that eateth my flesh and drinketh my blood abideth in me , and i in him .
1	as the living father sent me , and i live because of the father ; so he that eateth me , he also shall live because of me .
1	this is the bread which came down out of heaven : not as the fathers ate , and died ; he that eateth this bread shall live for ever .
1	these things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in capernaum .
1	many therefore of his disciples , when they heard this , said , this is a hard saying ; who can hear it ?
1	but jesus knowing in himself that his disciples murmured at this , said unto them , doth this cause you to stumble ?
1	what then if ye should behold the son of man ascending where he was before ?
1	it is the spirit that giveth life ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that i have spoken unto you are spirit , and are life .
1	upon this many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
1	jesus said therefore unto the twelve , would ye also go away ?
1	simon peter answered him , lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
1	and we have believed and know that thou art the holy one of god .
1	jesus answered them , did not i choose you the twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
1	now he spake of judas the son of simon iscariot , for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
1	and after these things jesus walked in galilee : for he would not walk in judaea , because the jews sought to kill him .
1	now the feast of the jews , the feast of tabernacles , was at hand .
1	his brethren therefore said unto him , depart hence , and go into judaea , that thy disciples also may behold thy works which thou doest .
1	for no man doeth anything in secret , and himself seeketh to be known openly . if thou doest these things , manifest thyself to the world .
1	for even his brethren did not believe on him .
1	jesus therefore saith unto them , my time is not yet come ; but your time is always ready .
1	the world can not hate you ; but me it hateth , because i testify of it , that its works are evil .
1	go ye up unto the feast : i go not up unto this feast ; because my time is not yet fulfilled .
1	and having said these things unto them , he abode still in galilee .
1	but when his brethren were gone up unto the feast , then went he also up , not publicly , but as it were in secret .
1	the jews therefore sought him at the feast , and said , where is he ?
1	yet no man spake openly of him for fear of the jews .
1	but when it was now the midst of the feast jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
1	the jews therefore marvelled , saying , how knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
1	jesus therefore answered them , and said , my teaching is not mine , but his that sent me .
1	if any man willeth to do his will , he shall know of the teaching , whether it is of god , or whether i speak from myself .
1	did not moses give you the law , and yet none of you doeth the law ? why seek ye to kill me ?
1	the multitude answered , thou hast a demon : who seeketh to kill thee ?
1	jesus answered and said unto them , i did one work , and ye all marvel because thereof .
1	moses hath given you circumcision ( not that it is of moses , but of the fathers ) ; and on the sabbath ye circumcise a man .
1	judge not according to appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
1	some therefore of them of jerusalem said , is not this he whom they seek to kill ?
1	and lo , he speaketh openly , and they say nothing unto him . can it be that the rulers indeed know that this is the christ ?
1	howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when the christ cometh , no one knoweth whence he is .
1	i know him ; because i am from him , and he sent me .
1	they sought therefore to take him : and no man laid his hand on him , because his hour was not yet come .
1	the pharisees heard the multitude murmuring these things concerning him ; and the chief priests and the pharisees sent officers to take him .
1	jesus therefore said , yet a little while am i with you , and i go unto him that sent me .
1	ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where i am , ye can not come .
1	what is this word that he said , ye shall seek me , and shall not find me ; and where i am , ye can not come ?
1	he that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , from within him shall flow rivers of living water .
1	some of the multitude therefore , when they heard these words , said , this is of a truth the prophet .
1	others said , this is the christ . but some said , what , doth the christ come out of galilee ?
1	hath not the scripture said that the christ cometh of the seed of david , and from bethlehem , the village where david was ?
1	so there arose a division in the multitude because of him .
1	and some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
1	the officers therefore came to the chief priests and pharisees ; and they said unto them , why did ye not bring him ?
1	the officers answered , never man so spake .
1	the pharisees therefore answered them , are ye also led astray ?
1	hath any of the rulers believed on him , or of the pharisees ?
1	but this multitude that knoweth not the law are accursed .
1	nicodemus saith unto them ( he that came to him before , being one of them ) ,
1	doth our law judge a man , except it first hear from himself and know what he doeth ?
1	they answered and said unto him , art thou also of galilee ? search , and see that out of galilee ariseth no prophet .
1	and they went every man unto his own house :
1	but jesus went unto the mount of olives .
1	and early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
1	and the scribes and the pharisees bring a woman taken in adultery ; and having set her in the midst ,
1	they say unto him , teacher , this woman hath been taken in adultery , in the very act .
1	now in the law moses commanded us to stone such : what then sayest thou of her ?
1	and again he stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground .
1	and jesus lifted up himself , and said unto her , woman , where are they ? did no man condemn thee ?
1	and she said , no man , lord . and jesus said , neither do i condemn thee : go thy way ; from henceforth sin no more . ]
1	the pharisees therefore said unto him , thou bearest witness of thyself ; thy witness is not true .
1	ye judge after the flesh ; i judge no man .
1	yea and if i judge , my judgment is true ; for i am not alone , but i and the father that sent me .
1	yea and in your law it is written , that the witness of two men is true .
1	i am he that beareth witness of myself , and the father that sent me beareth witness of me .
1	these words spake he in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man took him ; because his hour was not yet come .
1	the jews therefore said , will he kill himself , that he saith , whither i go , ye can not come ?
1	and he said unto them , ye are from beneath ; i am from above : ye are of this world ; i am not of this world .
1	i said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for except ye believe that i am he , ye shall die in your sins .
1	they said therefore unto him , who art thou ? jesus said unto them , even that which i have also spoken unto you from the beginning .
1	they perceived not that he spake to them of the father .
1	and he that sent me is with me ; he hath not left me alone ; for i do always the things that are pleasing to him .
1	as he spake these things , many believed on him .
1	jesus therefore said to those jews that had believed him , if ye abide in my word , then are ye truly my disciples ;
1	and ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
1	jesus answered them , verily , verily , i say unto you , every one that committeth sin is the bondservant of sin .
1	and the bondservant abideth not in the house for ever : the son abideth for ever .
1	if therefore the son shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
1	i know that ye are abraham ’ s seed ; yet ye seek to kill me , because my word hath not free course in you .
1	i speak the things which i have seen with my father : and ye also do the things which ye heard from your father .
1	but now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which i heard from god : this did not abraham .
1	ye do the works of your father . they said unto him , we were not born of fornication ; we have one father , even god .
1	why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye can not hear my word .
1	but because i say the truth , ye believe me not .
1	which of you convicteth me of sin ? if i say truth , why do ye not believe me ?
1	he that is of god heareth the words of god : for this cause ye hear them not , because ye are not of god .
1	the jews answered and said unto him , say we not well that thou art a samaritan , and hast a demon ?
1	jesus answered , i have not a demon ; but i honor my father , and ye dishonor me .
1	but i seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
1	verily , verily , i say unto you , if a man keep my word , he shall never see death .
1	art thou greater than our father abraham , who died ? and the prophets died : whom makest thou thyself ?
1	your father abraham rejoiced to see my day ; and he saw it , and was glad .
1	the jews therefore said unto him , thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen abraham ?
1	jesus said unto them , verily , verily , i say unto you , before abraham was born , i am .
1	they took up stones therefore to cast at him : but jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple .
1	and as he passed by , he saw a man blind from his birth .
1	and his disciples asked him , saying , rabbi , who sinned , this man , or his parents , that he should be born blind ?
1	jesus answered , neither did this man sin , nor his parents : but that the works of god should be made manifest in him .
1	we must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
1	when i am in the world , i am the light of the world .
1	when he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and anointed his eyes with the clay ,
1	the neighbors therefore , and they that saw him aforetime , that he was a beggar , said , is not this he that sat and begged ?
1	others said , it is he : others said , no , but he is like him . he said , i am he .
1	they said therefore unto him , how then were thine eyes opened ?
1	and they said unto him , where is he ? he saith , i know not .
1	they bring to the pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
1	now it was the sabbath on the day when jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
1	and asked them , saying , is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
1	his parents answered and said , we know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
1	therefore said his parents , he is of age ; ask him .
1	he therefore answered , whether he is a sinner , i know not : one thing i know , that , whereas i was blind , now i see .
1	they said therefore unto him , what did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
1	he answered them , i told you even now , and ye did not hear ; wherefore would ye hear it again ? would ye also become his disciples ?
1	and they reviled him , and said , thou art his disciple ; but we are disciples of moses .
1	we know that god hath spoken unto moses : but as for this man , we know not whence he is .
1	the man answered and said unto them , why , herein is the marvel , that ye know not whence he is , and yet he opened mine eyes .
1	we know that god heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of god , and do his will , him he heareth .
1	since the world began it was never heard that any one opened the eyes of a man born blind .
1	if this man were not from god , he could do nothing .
1	they answered and said unto him , thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? and they cast him out .
1	jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and finding him , he said , dost thou believe on the son of god ?
1	he answered and said , and who is he , lord , that i may believe on him ?
1	jesus said unto him , thou hast both seen him , and he it is that speaketh with thee .
1	and he said , lord , i believe . and he worshipped him .
1	and jesus said , for judgment came i into this world , that they that see not may see ; and that they that see may become blind .
1	those of the pharisees who were with him heard these things , and said unto him , are we also blind ?
1	jesus said unto them , if ye were blind , ye would have no sin : but now ye say , we see : your sin remaineth .
1	but he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
1	to him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
1	when he hath put forth all his own , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
1	and a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
1	this parable spake jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
1	jesus therefore said unto them again , verily , verily , i say unto you , i am the door of the sheep .
1	all that came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
1	i am the good shepherd : the good shepherd layeth down his life for the sheep .
1	he fleeth because he is a hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
1	i am the good shepherd ; and i know mine own , and mine own know me ,
1	even as the father knoweth me , and i know the father ; and i lay down my life for the sheep .
1	therefore doth the father love me , because i lay down my life , that i may take it again .
1	there arose a division again among the jews because of these words .
1	and many of them said , he hath a demon , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
1	others said , these are not the sayings of one possessed with a demon . can a demon open the eyes of the blind ?
1	and it was the feast of the dedication at jerusalem :
1	it was winter ; and jesus was walking in the temple in solomon ’ s porch .
1	but ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep .
1	my sheep hear my voice , and i know them , and they follow me :
1	and i give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , and no one shall snatch them out of my hand .
1	i and the father are one .
1	the jews took up stones again to stone him .
1	jesus answered them , many good works have i showed you from the father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
1	jesus answered them , is it not written in your law , i said , ye are gods ?
1	if he called them gods , unto whom the word of god came ( and the scripture can not be broken ) ,
1	say ye of him , whom the father sanctified and sent into the world , thou blasphemest ; because i said , i am the son of god ?
1	if i do not the works of my father , believe me not .
1	they sought again to take him : and he went forth out of their hand .
1	and he went away again beyond the jordan into the place where john was at the first baptizing ; and there he abode .
1	and many came unto him ; and they said , john indeed did no sign : but all things whatsoever john spake of this man were true .
1	and many believed on him there .
1	now a certain man was sick , lazarus of bethany , of the village of mary and her sister martha .
1	and it was that mary who anointed the lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother lazarus was sick .
1	the sisters therefore sent unto him , saying , lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
1	now jesus loved martha , and her sister , and lazarus .
1	when therefore he heard that he was sick , he abode at that time two days in the place where he was .
1	then after this he saith to the disciples , let us go into judaea again .
1	the disciples say unto him , rabbi , the jews were but now seeking to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
1	but if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because the light is not in him .
1	the disciples therefore said unto him , lord , if he is fallen asleep , he will recover .
1	now jesus had spoken of his death : but they thought that he spake of taking rest in sleep .
1	then jesus therefore said unto them plainly , lazarus is dead .
1	and i am glad for your sakes that i was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
1	thomas therefore , who is called didymus , said unto his fellow-disciples , let us also go , that we may die with him .
1	so when jesus came , he found that he had been in the tomb four days already .
1	now bethany was nigh unto jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off ;
1	and many of the jews had come to martha and mary , to console them concerning their brother .
1	martha therefore , when she heard that jesus was coming , went and met him : but mary still sat in the house .
1	martha therefore said unto jesus , lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
1	and even now i know that , whatsoever thou shalt ask of god , god will give thee .
1	jesus saith unto her , thy brother shall rise again .
1	martha saith unto him , i know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
1	jesus said unto her , i am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth on me , though he die , yet shall he live ;
1	and whosoever liveth and believeth on me shall never die . believest thou this ?
1	and when she had said this , she went away , and called mary her sister secretly , saying , the teacher is here , and calleth thee .
1	and she , when she heard it , arose quickly , and went unto him .
1	( now jesus was not yet come into the village , but was still in the place where martha met him . )
1	when jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the jews also weeping who came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
1	and said , where have ye laid him ? they say unto him , lord , come and see .
1	the jews therefore said , behold how he loved him !
1	jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the tomb . now it was a cave , and a stone lay against it .
1	jesus saith unto her , said i not unto thee , that , if thou believedst , thou shouldest see the glory of god ?
1	so they took away the stone . and jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , father , i thank thee that thou heardest me .
1	and when he had thus spoken , he cried with a loud voice , lazarus , come forth .
1	many therefore of the jews , who came to mary and beheld that which he did , believed on him .
1	but some of them went away to the pharisees , and told them the things which jesus had done .
1	the chief priests therefore and the pharisees gathered a council , and said , what do we ? for this man doeth many signs .
1	if we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the romans will come and take away both our place and our nation .
1	but a certain one of them , caiaphas , being high priest that year , said unto them , ye know nothing at all ,
1	nor do ye take account that it is expedient for you that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
1	now this he said not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that jesus should die for the nation ;
1	and not for the nation only , but that he might also gather together into one the children of god that are scattered abroad .
1	so from that day forth they took counsel that they might put him to death .
1	now the passover of the jews was at hand : and many went up to jerusalem out of the country before the passover , to purify themselves .
1	jesus therefore six days before the passover came to bethany , where lazarus was , whom jesus raised from the dead .
1	so they made him a supper there : and martha served ; but lazarus was one of them that sat at meat with him .
1	but judas iscariot , one of his disciples , that should betray him , saith ,
1	why was not this ointment sold for three hundred shillings , and given to the poor ?
1	jesus therefore said , suffer her to keep it against the day of my burying .
1	for the poor ye have always with you ; but me ye have not always .
1	but the chief priests took counsel that they might put lazarus also to death ;
1	because that by reason of him many of the jews went away , and believed on jesus .
1	on the morrow a great multitude that had come to the feast , when they heard that jesus was coming to jerusalem ,
1	and jesus , having found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
1	fear not , daughter of zion : behold , thy king cometh , sitting on an ass ’ s colt .
1	the multitude therefore that was with him when he called lazarus out of the tomb , and raised him from the dead , bare witness .
1	for this cause also the multitude went and met him , for that they heard that he had done this sign .
1	the pharisees therefore said among themselves , behold how ye prevail nothing ; lo , the world is gone after him .
1	now there were certain greeks among those that went up to worship at the feast :
1	these therefore came to philip , who was of bethsaida of galilee , and asked him , saying , sir , we would see jesus .
1	philip cometh and telleth andrew : andrew cometh , and philip , and they tell jesus .
1	and jesus answereth them , saying , the hour is come , that the son of man should be glorified .
1	he that loveth his life loseth it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
1	now is my soul troubled ; and what shall i say ? father , save me from this hour . but for this cause came i unto this hour .
1	father , glorify thy name . there came therefore a voice out of heaven , saying , i have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
1	the multitude therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it had thundered : others said , an angel hath spoken to him .
1	jesus answered and said , this voice hath not come for my sake , but for your sakes .
1	now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
1	and i , if i be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto myself .
1	but this he said , signifying by what manner of death he should die .
1	while ye have the light , believe on the light , that ye may become sons of light .
1	but though he had done so many signs before them , yet they believed not on him :
1	that the word of isaiah the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake ,
1	for this cause they could not believe , for that isaiah said again ,
1	he hath blinded their eyes , and he hardened their heart ;
1	these things said isaiah , because he saw his glory ; and he spake of him .
1	for they loved the glory that is of men more than the glory that is of god .
1	and jesus cried and said , he that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
1	and he that beholdeth me beholdeth him that sent me .
1	i am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me may not abide in the darkness .
1	and i know that his commandment is life eternal ; the things therefore which i speak , even as the father hath said unto me , so i speak .
1	and during supper , the devil having already put into the heart of judas iscariot , simon ’ s son , to betray him ,
1	jesus , knowing that the father had given all things into his hands , and that he came forth from god , and goeth unto god ,
1	riseth from supper , and layeth aside his garments ; and he took a towel , and girded himself .
1	then he poureth water into the basin , and began to wash the disciples ’ feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
1	so he cometh to simon peter . he saith unto him , lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
1	jesus answered and said unto him , what i do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt understand hereafter .
1	peter saith unto him , thou shalt never wash my feet . jesus answered him , if i wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
1	simon peter saith unto him , lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
1	for he knew him that should betray him ; therefore said he , ye are not all clean .
1	ye call me , teacher , and , lord : and ye say well ; for so i am .
1	if i then , the lord and the teacher , have washed your feet , ye also ought to wash one another ’ s feet .
1	for i have given you an example , that ye also should do as i have done to you .
1	verily , verily , i say unto you , a servant is not greater than his lord ; neither one that is sent greater than he that sent him .
1	if ye know these things , blessed are ye if ye do them .
1	from henceforth i tell you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that i am he .
1	verily , verily , i say unto you , he that receiveth whomsoever i send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
1	the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
1	there was at the table reclining in jesus ’ bosom one of his disciples , whom jesus loved .
1	simon peter therefore beckoneth to him , and saith unto him , tell us who it is of whom he speaketh .
1	he leaning back , as he was , on jesus ’ breast saith unto him , lord , who is it ?
1	and after the sop , then entered satan into him . jesus therefore saith unto him , what thou doest , do quickly .
1	now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
1	he then having received the sop went out straightway : and it was night .
1	when therefore he was gone out , jesus saith , now is the son of man glorified , and god is glorified in him ;
1	and god shall glorify him in himself , and straightway shall he glorify him .
1	a new commandment i give unto you , that ye love one another ; even as i have loved you , that ye also love one another .
1	by this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
1	peter saith unto him , lord , why can not i follow thee even now ? i will lay down my life for thee .
1	let not your heart be troubled : believe in god , believe also in me .
1	and whither i go , ye know the way .
1	thomas saith unto him , lord , we know not whither thou goest ; how know we the way ?
1	jesus saith unto him , i am the way , and the truth , and the life : no one cometh unto the father , but by me .
1	if ye had known me , ye would have known my father also : from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
1	philip saith unto him , lord , show us the father , and it sufficeth us .
1	believe me that i am in the father , and the father in me : or else believe me for the very works ’ sake .
1	and whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will i do , that the father may be glorified in the son .
1	if ye shall ask anything in my name , that will i do .
1	if ye love me , ye will keep my commandments .
1	and i will pray the father , and he shall give you another comforter , that he may be with you for ever ,
1	i will not leave you desolate : i come unto you .
1	yet a little while , and the world beholdeth me no more ; but ye behold me : because i live , ye shall live also .
1	in that day ye shall know that i am in my father , and ye in me , and i in you .
1	judas ( not iscariot ) saith unto him , lord , what is come to pass that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
1	he that loveth me not keepeth not my words : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the father ’ s who sent me .
1	these things have i spoken unto you , while yet abiding with you .
1	and now i have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe .
1	i will no more speak much with you , for the prince of the world cometh : and he hath nothing in me ;
1	i am the true vine , and my father is the husbandman .
1	already ye are clean because of the word which i have spoken unto you .
1	if ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ask whatsoever ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
1	herein is my father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; and so shall ye be my disciples .
1	even as the father hath loved me , i also have loved you : abide ye in my love .
1	if ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as i have kept my father ’ s commandments , and abide in his love .
1	these things have i spoken unto you , that my joy may be in you , and that your joy may be made full .
1	this is my commandment , that ye love one another , even as i have loved you .
1	greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
1	ye are my friends , if ye do the things which i command you .
1	these things i command you , that ye may love one another .
1	if the world hateth you , ye know that it hath hated me before it hated you .
1	but all these things will they do unto you for my name ’ s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
1	if i had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no excuse for their sin .
1	he that hateth me hateth my father also .
1	but this cometh to pass , that the word may be fulfilled that is written in their law , they hated me without a cause .
1	and ye also bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
1	these things have i spoken unto you , that ye should not be caused to stumble .
1	they shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the hour cometh , that whosoever killeth you shall think that he offereth service unto god .
1	and these things will they do , because they have not known the father , nor me .
1	but now i go unto him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , whither goest thou ?
1	but because i have spoken these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
1	and he , when he is come , will convict the world in respect of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
1	of sin , because they believe not on me ;
1	of righteousness , because i go to the father , and ye behold me no more ;
1	of judgment , because the prince of this world hath been judged .
1	i have yet many things to say unto you , but ye can not bear them now .
1	he shall glorify me : for he shall take of mine , and shall declare it unto you .
1	all things whatsoever the father hath are mine : therefore said i , that he taketh of mine , and shall declare it unto you .
1	a little while , and ye behold me no more ; and again a little while , and ye shall see me .
1	they said therefore , what is this that he saith , a little while ? we know not what he saith .
1	and ye therefore now have sorrow : but i will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no one taketh away from you .
1	hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be made full .
1	in that day ye shall ask in my name : and i say not unto you , that i will pray the father for you ;
1	for the father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that i came forth from the father .
1	i came out from the father , and am come into the world : again , i leave the world , and go unto the father .
1	his disciples say , lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no dark saying .
1	now know we that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from god .
1	jesus answered them , do ye now believe ?
1	even as thou gavest him authority over all flesh , that to all whom thou hast given him , he should give eternal life .
1	and this is life eternal , that they should know thee the only true god , and him whom thou didst send , even jesus christ .
1	i glorified thee on the earth , having accomplished the work which thou hast given me to do .
1	and now , father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which i had with thee before the world was .
1	now they know that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are from thee :
1	i pray for them : i pray not for the world , but for those whom thou hast given me ; for they are thine :
1	and all things that are mine are thine , and thine are mine : and i am glorified in them .
1	but now i come to thee ; and these things i speak in the world , that they may have my joy made full in themselves .
1	i have given them thy word ; and the world hated them , because they are not of the world , even as i am not of the world .
1	i pray not that thou shouldest take them from the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil one .
1	they are not of the world , even as i am not of the world .
1	sanctify them in the truth : thy word is truth .
1	as thou didst send me into the world , even so sent i them into the world .
1	and for their sakes i sanctify myself , that they themselves also may be sanctified in truth .
1	neither for these only do i pray , but for them also that believe on me through their word ;
1	and the glory which thou hast given me i have given unto them ; that they may be one , even as we are one ;
1	o righteous father , the world knew thee not , but i knew thee ; and these knew that thou didst send me ;
1	now judas also , who betrayed him , knew the place : for jesus oft-times resorted thither with his disciples .
1	judas then , having received the band of soldiers , and officers from the chief priests and the pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
1	jesus therefore , knowing all the things that were coming upon him , went forth , and saith unto them , whom seek ye ?
1	they answered him , jesus of nazareth . jesus saith unto them , i am he . and judas also , who betrayed him , was standing with them .
1	when therefore he said unto them , i am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
1	again therefore he asked them , whom seek ye ? and they said , jesus of nazareth .
1	jesus answered , i told you that i am he ; if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
1	that the word might be fulfilled which he spake , of those whom thou hast given me i lost not one .
1	jesus therefore said unto peter , put up the sword into the sheath : the cup which the father hath given me , shall i not drink it ?
1	so the band and the chief captain , and the officers of the jews , seized jesus and bound him ,
1	and led him to annas first ; for he was father in law to caiaphas , who was high priest that year .
1	now caiaphas was he that gave counsel to the jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
1	the maid therefore that kept the door saith unto peter , art thou also one of this man ’ s disciples ? he saith , i am not .
1	the high priest therefore asked jesus of his disciples , and of his teaching .
1	why askest thou me ? ask them that have heard me , what i spake unto them : behold , these know the things which i said .
1	and when he had said this , one of the officers standing by struck jesus with his hand , saying , answerest thou the high priest so ?
1	jesus answered him , if i have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
1	annas therefore sent him bound unto caiaphas the high priest .
1	peter therefore denied again : and straightway the cock crew .
1	pilate therefore went out unto them , and saith , what accusation bring ye against this man ?
1	they answered and said unto him , if this man were not an evil-doer , we should not have delivered him up unto thee .

1	jesus answered , sayest thou this of thyself , or did others tell it thee concerning me ?

1	they cried out therefore again , saying , not this man , but barabbas . now barabbas was a robber .

1	when pilate therefore heard this saying , he was the more afraid ;
1	and he entered into the praetorium again , and saith unto jesus , whence art thou ? but jesus gave him no answer .
1	pilate therefore saith unto him , speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that i have power to release thee , and have power to crucify thee ?
1	now it was the preparation of the passover : it was about the sixth hour . and he saith unto the jews , behold , your king !
1	then therefore he delivered him unto them to be crucified .

1	and pilate wrote a title also , and put it on the cross . and there was written , jesus of nazareth , the king of the jews .
1	pilate answered , what i have written i have written .

1	when jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , it is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up his spirit .

1	and again another scripture saith , they shall look on him whom they pierced .

1	so joshua went up from gilgal , he , and all the people of war with him , and all the mighty men of valor .
1	and jehovah said unto joshua , fear them not : for i have delivered them into thy hands ; there shall not a man of them stand before thee .
1	joshua therefore came upon them suddenly ; for he went up from gilgal all the night .
1	then spake joshua to jehovah in the day when jehovah delivered up the amorites before the children of israel ; and he said in the sight of israel ,
1	and the sun stood still , and the moon stayed ,
1	and there was no day like that before it or after it , that jehovah hearkened unto the voice of a man : for jehovah fought for israel .
1	and joshua returned , and all israel with him , unto the camp to gilgal .
1	and these five kings fled , and hid themselves in the cave at makkedah .
1	and it was told joshua , saying , the five kings are found , hidden in the cave at makkedah .
1	and joshua said , roll great stones unto the mouth of the cave , and set men by it to keep them :
1	that all the people returned to the camp to joshua at makkedah in peace : none moved his tongue against any of the children of israel .
1	then said joshua , open the mouth of the cave , and bring forth those five kings unto me out of the cave .
1	and afterward joshua smote them , and put them to death , and hanged them on five trees : and they were hanging upon the trees until the evening .
1	and joshua passed from makkedah , and all israel with him , unto libnah , and fought against libnah :
1	and joshua passed from libnah , and all israel with him , unto lachish , and encamped against it , and fought against it :
1	then horam king of gezer came up to help lachish ; and joshua smote him and his people , until he had left him none remaining .
1	and joshua passed from lachish , and all israel with him , unto eglon ; and they encamped against it , and fought against it ;
1	and joshua went up from eglon , and all israel with him , unto hebron ; and they fought against it :
1	and joshua returned , and all israel with him , to debir , and fought against it :
1	and joshua smote them from kadesh-barnea even unto gaza , and all the country of goshen , even unto gibeon .
1	and all these kings and their land did joshua take at one time , because jehovah , the god of israel , fought for israel .
1	and joshua returned , and all israel with him , unto the camp to gilgal .
1	and all these kings met together ; and they came and encamped together at the waters of merom , to fight with israel .
1	so joshua came , and all the people of war with him , against them by the waters of merom suddenly , and fell upon them .
1	and joshua did unto them as jehovah bade him : he hocked their horses , and burnt their chariots with fire .
1	but as for the cities that stood on their mounds , israel burned none of them , save hazor only ; that did joshua burn .
1	as jehovah commanded moses his servant , so did moses command joshua : and so did joshua ; he left nothing undone of all that jehovah commanded moses .
1	joshua made war a long time with all those kings .
1	there was not a city that made peace with the children of israel , save the hivites the inhabitants of gibeon : they took all in battle .

1	to subvert a man in his cause , the lord approveth not .
1	who is he that saith , and it cometh to pass , when the lord commandeth it not ?
1	out of the mouth of the most high cometh there not evil and good ?
1	wherefore doth a living man complain , a man for the punishment of his sins ?
1	let us search and try our ways , and turn again to jehovah .
1	let us lift up our heart with our hands unto god in the heavens .
1	we have transgressed and have rebelled ; thou hast not pardoned .
1	thou hast covered with anger and pursued us ; thou hast slain , thou hast not pitied .
1	thou hast covered thyself with a cloud , so that no prayer can pass through .
1	thou hast made us an offscouring and refuse in the midst of the peoples .
1	all our enemies have opened their mouth wide against us .
1	fear and the pit are come upon us , devastation and destruction .
1	mine eye runneth down with streams of water , for the destruction of the daughter of my people .
1	mine eye poureth down , and ceaseth not , without any intermission ,
1	till jehovah look down , and behold from heaven .
1	mine eye affecteth my soul , because of all the daughters of my city .
1	they have chased me sore like a bird , they that are mine enemies without cause .
1	they have cut off my life in the dungeon , and have cast a stone upon me .
1	waters flowed over my head ; i said , i am cut off .
1	i called upon thy name , o jehovah , out of the lowest dungeon .
1	thou heardest my voice ; hide not thine ear at my breathing , at my cry .
1	thou drewest near in the day that i called upon thee ; thou saidst , fear not .
1	o lord , thou hast pleaded the causes of my soul ; thou hast redeemed my life .
1	o jehovah , thou hast seen my wrong ; judge thou my cause .
1	thou hast seen all their vengeance and all their devices against me .
1	thou hast heard their reproach , o jehovah , and all their devices against me ,
1	the lips of those that rose up against me , and their device against me all the day .
1	behold thou their sitting down , and their rising up ; i am their song .
1	thou wilt render unto them a recompense , o jehovah , according to the work of their hands .
1	thou wilt give them hardness of heart , thy curse unto them .
1	thou wilt pursue them in anger , and destroy them from under the heavens of jehovah .
1	how is the gold become dim ! how is the most pure gold changed !
1	the precious sons of zion , comparable to fine gold ,
1	even the jackals draw out the breast , they give suck to their young ones :
1	the tongue of the sucking child cleaveth to the roof of his mouth for thirst :
1	they that did feed delicately are desolate in the streets :
1	for the iniquity of the daughter of my people is greater than the sin of sodom ,
1	her nobles were purer than snow , they were whiter than milk ;
1	their visage is blacker than a coal ; they are not known in the streets :
1	they that are slain with the sword are better than they that are slain with hunger ;
1	the hands of the pitiful women have boiled their own children ;
1	jehovah hath accomplished his wrath , he hath poured out his fierce anger ;
1	the kings of the earth believed not , neither all the inhabitants of the world ,
1	it is because of the sins of her prophets , and the iniquities of her priests ,
1	they wander as blind men in the streets , they are polluted with blood ,
1	depart ye , they cried unto them , unclean ! depart , depart , touch not !
1	the anger of jehovah hath scattered them ; he will no more regard them :
1	our eyes do yet fail in looking for our vain help :
1	they hunt our steps , so that we can not go in our streets :
1	our pursuers were swifter than the eagles of the heavens :
1	the breath of our nostrils , the anointed of jehovah , was taken in their pits ;
1	rejoice and be glad , o daughter of edom , that dwellest in the land of uz :
1	the punishment of thine iniquity is accomplished , o daughter of zion ; he will no more carry thee away into captivity :
1	remember , o jehovah , what is come upon us :
1	our inheritance is turned unto strangers ,
1	we are orphans and fatherless ;
1	we have drunken our water for money ;
1	our pursuers are upon our necks :
1	we have given the hand to the egyptians ,
1	our fathers sinned , and are not ;
1	servants rule over us :
1	we get our bread at the peril of our lives ,
1	our skin is black like an oven ,
1	they ravished the women in zion ,
1	princes were hanged up by their hand :
1	the young men bare the mill ;
1	the elders have ceased from the gate ,
1	the joy of our heart is ceased ;
1	the crown is fallen from our head :
1	for this our heart is faint ;
1	for the mountain of zion , which is desolate :
1	thou , o jehovah , abidest for ever ;
1	wherefore dost thou forget us for ever ,
1	turn thou us unto thee , o jehovah , and we shall be turned ;
1	but thou hast utterly rejected us ;
1	and jehovah called unto moses , and spake unto him out of the tent of meeting , saying ,
1	and he shall lay his hand upon the head of the burnt-offering ; and it shall be accepted for him to make atonement for him .
1	and he shall flay the burnt-offering , and cut it into its pieces .
1	and the sons of aaron the priest shall put fire upon the altar , and lay wood in order upon the fire ;
1	and if his oblation to jehovah be a burnt-offering of birds , then he shall offer his oblation of turtle-doves , or of young pigeons .
1	and he shall take away its crop with the filth thereof , and cast it beside the altar on the east part , in the place of the ashes :
1	and if thy oblation be a meal-offering of the baking-pan , it shall be of fine flour unleavened , mingled with oil .
1	thou shalt part it in pieces , and pour oil thereon : it is a meal-offering .
1	and if thy oblation be a meal-offering of the frying-pan , it shall be made of fine flour with oil .
1	as an oblation of first-fruits ye shall offer them unto jehovah : but they shall not come up for a sweet savor on the altar .
1	and thou shalt put oil upon it , and lay frankincense thereon : it is a meal-offering .
1	and if his oblation for a sacrifice of peace-offerings unto jehovah be of the flock ; male or female , he shall offer it without blemish .
1	if he offer a lamb for his oblation , then shall he offer it before jehovah ;
1	and the priest shall burn it upon the altar : it is the food of the offering made by fire unto jehovah .
1	and if his oblation be a goat , then he shall offer it before jehovah :
1	it shall be a perpetual statute throughout your generations in all your dwellings , that ye shall eat neither fat nor blood .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and the anointed priest shall take of the blood of the bullock , and bring it to the tent of meeting :
1	and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood , and sprinkle of the blood seven times before jehovah , before the veil of the sanctuary .
1	as it is taken off from the ox of the sacrifice of peace-offerings : and the priest shall burn them upon the altar of burnt-offering .
1	and the skin of the bullock , and all its flesh , with its head , and with its legs , and its inwards , and its dung ,
1	and the elders of the congregation shall lay their hands upon the head of the bullock before jehovah ; and the bullock shall be killed before jehovah .
1	and the anointed priest shall bring of the blood of the bullock to the tent of meeting :
1	and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood , and sprinkle it seven times before jehovah , before the veil .
1	and all the fat thereof shall he take off from it , and burn it upon the altar .
1	and he shall carry forth the bullock without the camp , and burn it as he burned the first bullock : it is the sin-offering for the assembly .
1	when a ruler sinneth , and doeth unwittingly any one of all the things which jehovah his god hath commanded not to be done , and is guilty ;
1	if his sin , wherein he hath sinned , be made known to him , he shall bring for his oblation a goat , a male without blemish .
1	and if any one of the common people sin unwittingly , in doing any of the things which jehovah hath commanded not to be done , and be guilty ;
1	and he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin-offering , and kill the sin-offering in the place of burnt-offering .
1	and if he bring a lamb as his oblation for a sin-offering , he shall bring it a female without blemish .
1	and he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin-offering , and kill it for a sin-offering in the place where they kill the burnt-offering .
1	and it shall be , when he shall be guilty in one of these things , that he shall confess that wherein he hath sinned :
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	it is a trespass-offering : he is certainly guilty before jehovah .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and the priest shall make atonement for him before jehovah ; and he shall be forgiven concerning whatsoever he doeth so as to be guilty thereby .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and he shall put off his garments , and put on other garments , and carry forth the ashes without the camp unto a clean place .
1	fire shall be kept burning upon the altar continually ; it shall not go out .
1	and this is the law of the meal-offering : the sons of aaron shall offer it before jehovah , before the altar .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and every meal-offering of the priest shall be wholly burnt : it shall not be eaten .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	the priest that offereth it for sin shall eat it : in a holy place shall it be eaten , in the court of the tent of meeting .
1	every male among the priests shall eat thereof : it is most holy .
1	and this is the law of the trespass-offering : it is most holy .
1	in the place where they kill the burnt-offering shall they kill the trespass-offering ; and the blood thereof shall he sprinkle upon the altar round about .
1	and he shall offer of it all the fat thereof : the fat tail , and the fat that covereth the inwards ,
1	and the priest shall burn them upon the altar for an offering made by fire unto jehovah : it is a trespass-offering .
1	every male among the priests shall eat thereof : it shall be eaten in a holy place : it is most holy .
1	as is the sin-offering , so is the trespass-offering ; there is one law for them : the priest that maketh atonement therewith , he shall have it .
1	and the priest that offereth any man ’ s burnt-offering , even the priest shall have to himself the skin of the burnt-offering which he hath offered .
1	and every meal-offering , mingled with oil , or dry , shall all the sons of aaron have , one as well as another .
1	and this is the law of the sacrifice of peace-offerings , which one shall offer unto jehovah .
1	with cakes of leavened bread he shall offer his oblation with the sacrifice of his peace-offerings for thanksgiving .
1	but that which remaineth of the flesh of the sacrifice on the third day shall be burnt with fire .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	speak unto the children of israel , saying , ye shall eat no fat , of ox , or sheep , or goat .
1	and ye shall eat no manner of blood , whether it be of bird or of beast , in any of your dwellings .
1	whosoever it be that eateth any blood , that soul shall be cut off from his people .

1	he among the sons of aaron that offereth the blood of the peace-offerings , and the fat , shall have the right thigh for a portion .
