1	and he sprinkled thereof upon the altar seven times , and anointed the altar and all its vessels , and the laver and its base , to sanctify them .
1	and he poured of the anointing oil upon aaron ’ s head , and anointed him , to sanctify him .
1	and he brought the bullock of the sin-offering : and aaron and his sons laid their hands upon the head of the bullock of the sin-offering .
1	but the bullock , and its skin , and its flesh , and its dung , he burnt with fire without the camp ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and he presented the ram of the burnt-offering : and aaron and his sons laid their hands upon the head of the ram .
1	and he killed it ; and moses sprinkled the blood upon the altar round about .
1	and he cut the ram into its pieces ; and moses burnt the head , and the pieces , and the fat .
1	and he presented the other ram , the ram of consecration : and aaron and his sons laid their hands upon the head of the ram .
1	and he put the whole upon the hands of aaron , and upon the hands of his sons , and waved them for a wave-offering before jehovah .
1	and that which remaineth of the flesh and of the bread shall ye burn with fire .
1	as hath been done this day , so jehovah hath commanded to do , to make atonement for you .
1	and aaron and his sons did all the things which jehovah commanded by moses .
1	and it came to pass on the eighth day , that moses called aaron and his sons , and the elders of israel ;
1	and an ox and a ram for peace-offerings , to sacrifice before jehovah ; and a meal-offering mingled with oil : for to-day jehovah appeareth unto you .
1	and they brought that which moses commanded before the tent of meeting : and all the congregation drew near and stood before jehovah .
1	and moses said , this is the thing which jehovah commanded that ye should do : and the glory of jehovah shall appear unto you .
1	so aaron drew near unto the altar , and slew the calf of the sin-offering , which was for himself .
1	but the fat , and the kidneys , and the caul from the liver of the sin-offering , he burnt upon the altar ; as jehovah commanded moses .
1	and the flesh and the skin he burnt with fire without the camp .
1	and he slew the burnt-offering ; and aaron ’ s sons delivered unto him the blood , and he sprinkled it upon the altar round about .
1	and they delivered the burnt-offering unto him , piece by piece , and the head : and he burnt them upon the altar .
1	and he washed the inwards and the legs , and burnt them upon the burnt-offering on the altar .
1	and he presented the burnt-offering , and offered it according to the ordinance .
1	and he presented the meal-offering , and filled his hand therefrom , and burnt it upon the altar , besides the burnt-offering of the morning .
1	and they put the fat upon the breasts , and he burnt the fat upon the altar :
1	and the breasts and the right thigh aaron waved for a wave-offering before jehovah ; as moses commanded .
1	and there came forth fire from before jehovah , and devoured them , and they died before jehovah .
1	so they drew near , and carried them in their coats out of the camp , as moses had said .
1	and jehovah spake unto aaron , saying ,
1	and that ye may make a distinction between the holy and the common , and between the unclean and the clean ;
1	and that ye may teach the children of israel all the statutes which jehovah hath spoken unto them by moses .
1	behold , the blood of it was not brought into the sanctuary within : ye should certainly have eaten it in the sanctuary , as i commanded .
1	and when moses heard that , it was well-pleasing in his sight .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses and to aaron , saying unto them ,
1	speak unto the children of israel , saying , these are the living things which ye may eat among all the beasts that are on the earth .
1	whatsoever parteth the hoof , and is clovenfooted , and cheweth the cud , among the beasts , that may ye eat .
1	and the coney , because he cheweth the cud but parteth not the hoof , he is unclean unto you .
1	and the hare , because she cheweth the cud but parteth not the hoof , she is unclean unto you .
1	and the swine , because he parteth the hoof , and is clovenfooted , but cheweth not the cud , he is unclean unto you .
1	of their flesh ye shall not eat , and their carcasses ye shall not touch ; they are unclean unto you .
1	and they shall be an abomination unto you ; ye shall not eat of their flesh , and their carcasses ye shall have in abomination .
1	whatsoever hath no fins nor scales in the waters , that is an abomination unto you .
1	and the kite , and the falcon after its kind ,
1	every raven after its kind ,
1	and the ostrich , and the night-hawk , and the sea-mew , and the hawk after its kind ,
1	and the little owl , and the cormorant , and the great owl ,
1	and the horned owl , and the pelican , and the vulture ,
1	and the stork , the heron after its kind , and the hoopoe , and the bat .
1	all winged creeping things that go upon all fours are an abomination unto you .
1	yet these may ye eat of all winged creeping things that go upon all fours , which have legs above their feet , wherewith to leap upon the earth .
1	but all winged creeping things , which have four feet , are an abomination unto you .
1	and by these ye shall become unclean : whosoever toucheth the carcass of them shall be unclean until the even ;
1	and whosoever beareth aught of the carcass of them shall wash his clothes , and be unclean until the even .
1	and he that beareth the carcass of them shall wash his clothes , and be unclean until the even : they are unclean unto you .
1	and the gecko , and the land-crocodile , and the lizard , and the sand-lizard , and the chameleon .
1	these are they which are unclean to you among all that creep : whosoever doth touch them , when they are dead , shall be unclean until the even .
1	and every earthen vessel , whereinto any of them falleth , whatsoever is in it shall be unclean , and it ye shall break .
1	nevertheless a fountain or a pit wherein is a gathering of water shall be clean : but that which toucheth their carcass shall be unclean .
1	and if aught of their carcass fall upon any sowing seed which is to be sown , it is clean .
1	but if water be put upon the seed , and aught of their carcass fall thereon , it is unclean unto you .
1	and if any beast , of which ye may eat , die ; he that toucheth the carcass thereof shall be unclean until the even .
1	and every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth is an abomination ; it shall not be eaten .
1	ye shall not make yourselves abominable with any creeping thing that creepeth , neither shall ye make yourselves unclean with them , that ye should be defiled thereby .
1	to make a distinction between the unclean and the clean , and between the living thing that may be eaten and the living thing that may not be eaten .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and in the eighth day the flesh of his foreskin shall be circumcised .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses and unto aaron , saying ,
1	when the plague of leprosy is in a man , then he shall be brought unto the priest ;
1	but whensoever raw flesh appeareth in him , he shall be unclean .
1	and the priest shall look on the raw flesh , and pronounce him unclean : the raw flesh is unclean : it is leprosy .
1	or if the raw flesh turn again , and be changed unto white , then he shall come unto the priest ;
1	and when the flesh hath in the skin thereof a boil , and it is healed ,
1	and in the place of the boil there is a white rising , or a bright spot , reddish-white , then it shall be showed to the priest ;
1	and if it spread abroad in the skin , then the priest shall pronounce him unclean : it is a plague .
1	and when a man or woman hath a plague upon the head or upon the beard ,
1	then he shall be shaven , but the scall shall he not shave ; and the priest shall shut up him that hath the scall seven days more :
1	but if the scall spread abroad in the skin after his cleansing ,
1	and when a man or a woman hath in the skin of the flesh bright spots , even white bright spots ;
1	and if a man ’ s hair be fallen off his head , he is bald ; yet is he clean .
1	and if his hair be fallen off from the front part of his head , he is forehead bald ; yet is he clean .
1	he is a leprous man , he is unclean : the priest shall surely pronounce him unclean ; his plague is in his head .
1	the garment also that the plague of leprosy is in , whether it be a woollen garment , or a linen garment ;
1	whether it be in warp , or woof ; of linen , or of woollen ; whether in a skin , or in anything made of skin ;
1	and the priest shall look upon the plague , and shut up that which hath the plague seven days :
1	then the priest shall command that they wash the thing wherein the plague is , and he shall shut it up seven days more :
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	this shall be the law of the leper in the day of his cleansing : he shall be brought unto the priest :
1	then shall the priest command to take for him that is to be cleansed two living clean birds , and cedar wood , and scarlet , and hyssop :
1	and the priest shall command to kill one of the birds in an earthen vessel over running water .
1	and the priest shall take of the log of oil , and pour it into the palm of his own left hand ;
1	and the priest shall offer the burnt-offering and the meal-offering upon the altar : and the priest shall make atonement for him , and he shall be clean .
1	and on the eighth day he shall bring them for his cleansing unto the priest , unto the door of the tent of meeting , before jehovah :
1	and the priest shall take the lamb of the trespass-offering , and the log of oil , and the priest shall wave them for a wave-offering before jehovah .
1	and the priest shall pour of the oil into the palm of his own left hand ;
1	and the priest shall sprinkle with his right finger some of the oil that is in his left hand seven times before jehovah :
1	and he shall offer one of the turtle-doves , or of the young pigeons , such as he is able to get ,
1	this is the law of him in whom is the plague of leprosy , who is not able to get that which pertaineth to his cleansing .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses and unto aaron , saying ,
1	then he that owneth the house shall come and tell the priest , saying , there seemeth to me to be as it were a plague in the house .
1	then the priest shall go out of the house to the door of the house , and shut up the house seven days .
1	and the priest shall come again the seventh day , and shall look ; and , behold , if the plague be spread in the walls of the house ;
1	then the priest shall command that they take out the stones in which the plague is , and cast them into an unclean place without the city :
1	and they shall take other stones , and put them in the place of those stones ; and he shall take other mortar , and shall plaster the house .
1	moreover he that goeth into the house all the while that it is shut up shall be unclean until the even .
1	and he that lieth in the house shall wash his clothes ; and he that eateth in the house shall wash his clothes .
1	and he shall take to cleanse the house two birds , and cedar-wood , and scarlet , and hyssop :
1	and he shall kill one of the birds in an earthen vessel over running water :
1	this is the law for all manner of plague of leprosy , and for a scall ,
1	and for the leprosy of a garment , and for a house ,
1	and for a rising , and for a scab , and for a bright spot ;
1	to teach when it is unclean , and when it is clean : this is the law of leprosy .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses and to aaron , saying ,
1	every bed whereon he that hath the issue lieth shall be unclean ; and everything whereon he sitteth shall be unclean .
1	and whosoever toucheth his bed shall wash his clothes , and bathe himself in water , and be unclean until the even .
1	and he that toucheth the flesh of him that hath the issue shall wash his clothes , and bathe himself in water , and be unclean until the even .
1	and what saddle soever he that hath the issue rideth upon shall be unclean .
1	and the earthen vessel , which he that hath the issue toucheth , shall be broken ; and every vessel of wood shall be rinsed in water .
1	and every garment , and every skin , whereon is the seed of copulation , shall be washed with water , and be unclean until the even .
1	the woman also with whom a man shall lie with seed of copulation , they shall both bathe themselves in water , and be unclean until the even .
1	and everything that she lieth upon in her impurity shall be unclean : everything also that she sitteth upon shall be unclean .
1	and whosoever toucheth her bed shall wash his clothes , and bathe himself in water , and be unclean until the even .
1	and whosoever toucheth anything that she sitteth upon shall wash his clothes , and bathe himself in water , and be unclean until the even .
1	and if it be on the bed , or on anything whereon she sitteth , when he toucheth it , he shall be unclean until the even .
1	and whosoever toucheth those things shall be unclean , and shall wash his clothes , and bathe himself in water , and be unclean until the even .
1	but if she be cleansed of her issue , then she shall number to herself seven days , and after that she shall be clean .
1	this is the law of him that hath an issue , and of him whose seed of copulation goeth from him , so that he is unclean thereby ;
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , after the death of the two sons of aaron , when they drew near before jehovah , and died ;
1	herewith shall aaron come into the holy place : with a young bullock for a sin-offering , and a ram for a burnt-offering .
1	and he shall take of the congregation of the children of israel two he-goats for a sin-offering , and one ram for a burnt-offering .
1	and aaron shall present the bullock of the sin-offering , which is for himself , and make atonement for himself , and for his house .
1	and he shall take the two goats , and set them before jehovah at the door of the tent of meeting .
1	and aaron shall cast lots upon the two goats ; one lot for jehovah , and the other lot for azazel .
1	and aaron shall present the goat upon which the lot fell for jehovah , and offer him for a sin-offering .
1	and the goat shall bear upon him all their iniquities unto a solitary land : and he shall let go the goat in the wilderness .
1	and the fat of the sin-offering shall he burn upon the altar .
1	and he that letteth go the goat for azazel shall wash his clothes , and bathe his flesh in water , and afterward he shall come into the camp .
1	and he that burneth them shall wash his clothes , and bathe his flesh in water , and afterward he shall come into the camp .
1	for on this day shall atonement be made for you , to cleanse you ; from all your sins shall ye be clean before jehovah .
1	it is a sabbath of solemn rest unto you , and ye shall afflict your souls ; it is a statute for ever .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and bringeth it not unto the door of the tent of meeting , to sacrifice it unto jehovah ; that man shall be cut off from his people .
1	therefore i said unto the children of israel , no soul of you shall eat blood , neither shall any stranger that sojourneth among you eat blood .
1	but if he wash them not , nor bathe his flesh , then he shall bear his iniquity .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	speak unto the children of israel , and say unto them , i am jehovah your god .
1	mine ordinances shall ye do , and my statutes shall ye keep , to walk therein : i am jehovah your god .
1	ye shall therefore keep my statutes , and mine ordinances ; which if a man do , he shall live in them : i am jehovah .
1	none of you shall approach to any that are near of kin to him , to uncover their nakedness : i am jehovah .
1	the nakedness of thy father , even the nakedness of thy mother , shalt thou not uncover : she is thy mother ; thou shalt not uncover her nakedness .
1	the nakedness of thy father ’ s wife shalt thou not uncover ; it is thy father ’ s nakedness .
1	the nakedness of thy father ’ s wife ’ s daughter , begotten of thy father , she is thy sister , thou shalt not uncover her nakedness .
1	thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father ’ s sister : she is thy father ’ s near kinswoman .
1	thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy mother ’ s sister : for she is thy mother ’ s near kinswoman .
1	thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father ’ s brother , thou shalt not approach to his wife : she is thine aunt .
1	thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy daughter-in-law : she is thy son ’ s wife ; thou shalt not uncover her nakedness .
1	thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy brother ’ s wife : it is thy brother ’ s nakedness .
1	and thou shalt not take a wife to her sister , to be a rival to her , to uncover her nakedness , besides the other in her life-time .
1	and thou shalt not approach unto a woman to uncover her nakedness , as long as she is impure by her uncleanness .
1	and thou shalt not lie carnally with thy neighbor ’ s wife , to defile thyself with her .
1	thou shalt not lie with mankind , as with womankind : it is abomination .
1	defile not ye yourselves in any of these things : for in all these the nations are defiled which i cast out from before you ;
1	and the land is defiled : therefore i do visit the iniquity thereof upon it , and the land vomiteth out her inhabitants .
1	ye therefore shall keep my statutes and mine ordinances , and shall not do any of these abominations ; neither the home-born , nor the stranger that sojourneth among you
1	( for all these abominations have the men of the land done , that were before you , and the land is defiled ) ;
1	that the land vomit not you out also , when ye defile it , as it vomited out the nation that was before you .
1	for whosoever shall do any of these abominations , even the souls that do them shall be cut off from among their people .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	speak unto all the congregation of the children of israel , and say unto them , ye shall be holy ; for i jehovah your god am holy .
1	ye shall fear every man his mother , and his father ; and ye shall keep my sabbaths : i am jehovah your god .
1	turn ye not unto idols , nor make to yourselves molten gods : i am jehovah your god .
1	and when ye offer a sacrifice of peace-offerings unto jehovah , ye shall offer it that ye may be accepted .
1	and if it be eaten at all on the third day , it is an abomination ; it shall not be accepted :
1	ye shall not steal ; neither shall ye deal falsely , nor lie one to another .
1	and ye shall not swear by my name falsely , and profane the name of thy god : i am jehovah .
1	thou shalt not oppress thy neighbor , nor rob him : the wages of a hired servant shall not abide with thee all night until the morning .
1	thou shalt not curse the deaf , nor put a stumblingblock before the blind ; but thou shalt fear thy god : i am jehovah .
1	thou shalt not go up and down as a talebearer among thy people : neither shalt thou stand against the blood of thy neighbor : i am jehovah .
1	thou shalt not hate thy brother in thy heart : thou shalt surely rebuke thy neighbor , and not bear sin because of him .
1	thou shalt not take vengeance , nor bear any grudge against the children of thy people ; but thou shalt love thy neighbor as thyself : i am jehovah .
1	and he shall bring his trespass-offering unto jehovah , unto the door of the tent of meeting , even a ram for a trespass-offering .
1	but in the fourth year all the fruit thereof shall be holy , for giving praise unto jehovah .
1	and in the fifth year shall ye eat of the fruit thereof , that it may yield unto you the increase thereof : i am jehovah your god .
1	ye shall not eat anything with the blood : neither shall ye use enchantments , nor practise augury .
1	ye shall not round the corners of your heads , neither shalt thou mar the corners of thy beard .
1	ye shall not make any cuttings in your flesh for the dead , nor print any marks upon you : i am jehovah .
1	profane not thy daughter , to make her a harlot ; lest the land fall to whoredom , and the land become full of wickedness .
1	ye shall keep my sabbaths , and reverence my sanctuary : i am jehovah .
1	thou shalt rise up before the hoary head , and honor the face of the old man , and thou shalt fear thy god : i am jehovah .
1	and if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land , ye shall not do him wrong .
1	ye shall do no unrighteousness in judgment , in measures of length , of weight , or of quantity .
1	and ye shall observe all my statutes , and all mine ordinances , and do them : i am jehovah .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	sanctify yourselves therefore , and be ye holy ; for i am jehovah your god .
1	and ye shall keep my statutes , and do them : i am jehovah who sanctifieth you .
1	and if a man lie with a beast , he shall surely be put to death : and ye shall slay the beast .
1	and if a man shall take his brother ’ s wife , it is impurity : he hath uncovered his brother ’ s nakedness ; they shall be childless .
1	and for his sister a virgin , that is near unto him , that hath had no husband ; for her may he defile himself .
1	he shall not defile himself , being a chief man among his people , to profane himself .
1	they shall not make baldness upon their head , neither shall they shave off the corner of their beard , nor make any cuttings in their flesh .
1	and the daughter of any priest , if she profane herself by playing the harlot , she profaneth her father : she shall be burnt with fire .
1	neither shall he go in to any dead body , nor defile himself for his father , or for his mother ;
1	and he shall take a wife in her virginity .
1	and he shall not profane his seed among his people : for i am jehovah who sanctifieth him .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	or a man that is broken-footed , or broken-handed ,
1	or crook-backed , or a dwarf , or that hath a blemish in his eye , or is scurvy , or scabbed , or hath his stones broken ;
1	he shall eat the bread of his god , both of the most holy , and of the holy :
1	so moses spake unto aaron , and to his sons , and unto all the children of israel .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	or whosoever toucheth any creeping thing , whereby he may be made unclean , or a man of whom he may take uncleanness , whatsoever uncleanness he hath ;
1	the soul that toucheth any such shall be unclean until the even , and shall not eat of the holy things , unless he bathe his flesh in water .
1	and when the sun is down , he shall be clean ; and afterward he shall eat of the holy things , because it is his bread .
1	that which dieth of itself , or is torn of beasts , he shall not eat , to defile himself therewith : i am jehovah .
1	they shall therefore keep my charge , lest they bear sin for it , and die therein , if they profane it : i am jehovah who sanctifieth them .
1	and if a priest ’ s daughter be married unto a stranger , she shall not eat of the heave-offering of the holy things .
1	and they shall not profane the holy things of the children of israel , which they offer unto jehovah ,
1	and so cause them to bear the iniquity that bringeth guilt , when they eat their holy things : for i am jehovah who sanctifieth them .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	that ye may be accepted , ye shall offer a male without blemish , of the bullocks , of the sheep , or of the goats .
1	but whatsoever hath a blemish , that shall ye not offer : for it shall not be acceptable for you .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and whether it be cow or ewe , ye shall not kill it and its young both in one day .
1	and when ye sacrifice a sacrifice of thanksgiving unto jehovah , ye shall sacrifice it that ye may be accepted .
1	on the same day it shall be eaten ; ye shall leave none of it until the morning : i am jehovah .
1	therefore shall ye keep my commandments , and do them : i am jehovah .
1	and ye shall not profane my holy name ; but i will be hallowed among the children of israel : i am jehovah who halloweth you ,
1	who brought you out of the land of egypt , to be your god : i am jehovah .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	these are the set feasts of jehovah , even holy convocations , which ye shall proclaim in their appointed season .
1	in the first month , on the fourteenth day of the month at even , is jehovah ’ s passover .
1	and on the fifteenth day of the same month is the feast of unleavened bread unto jehovah : seven days ye shall eat unleavened bread .
1	in the first day ye shall have a holy convocation : ye shall do no servile work .
1	but ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto jehovah seven days : in the seventh day is a holy convocation ; ye shall do no servile work .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and he shall wave the sheaf before jehovah , to be accepted for you : on the morrow after the sabbath the priest shall wave it .
1	and in the day when ye wave the sheaf , ye shall offer a he-lamb without blemish a year old for a burnt-offering unto jehovah .
1	even unto the morrow after the seventh sabbath shall ye number fifty days ; and ye shall offer a new meal-offering unto jehovah .
1	and ye shall offer one he-goat for a sin-offering , and two he-lambs a year old for a sacrifice of peace-offerings .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	ye shall do no servile work ; and ye shall offer an offering made by fire unto jehovah .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	for whatsoever soul it be that shall not be afflicted in that same day ; he shall be cut off from his people .
1	and whatsoever soul it be that doeth any manner of work in that same day , that soul will i destroy from among his people .
1	ye shall do no manner of work : it is a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	speak unto the children of israel , saying , on the fifteenth day of this seventh month is the feast of tabernacles for seven days unto jehovah .
1	on the first day shall be a holy convocation : ye shall do no servile work .
1	besides the sabbaths of jehovah , and besides your gifts , and besides all your vows , and besides all your freewill-offerings , which ye give unto jehovah .
1	ye shall dwell in booths seven days ; all that are home-born in israel shall dwell in booths ;
1	and moses declared unto the children of israel the set feasts of jehovah .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	command the children of israel , that they bring unto thee pure olive oil beaten for the light , to cause a lamp to burn continually .
1	he shall keep in order the lamps upon the pure candlestick before jehovah continually .
1	and thou shalt take fine flour , and bake twelve cakes thereof : two tenth parts of an ephah shall be in one cake .
1	and thou shalt set them in two rows , six on a row , upon the pure table before jehovah .
1	and thou shalt put pure frankincense upon each row , that it may be to the bread for a memorial , even an offering made by fire unto jehovah .
1	every sabbath day he shall set it in order before jehovah continually ; it is on the behalf of the children of israel , an everlasting covenant .
1	and they put him in ward , that it might be declared unto them at the mouth of jehovah .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	and thou shalt speak unto the children of israel , saying , whosoever curseth his god shall bear his sin .
1	and he that smiteth any man mortally shall surely be put to death .
1	and he that smiteth a beast mortally shall make it good , life for life .
1	and if a man cause a blemish in his neighbor ; as he hath done , so shall it be done to him :
1	breach for breach , eye for eye , tooth for tooth ; as he hath caused a blemish in a man , so shall it be rendered unto him .
1	and he that killeth a beast shall make it good : and he that killeth a man shall be put to death .
1	ye shall have one manner of law , as well for the sojourner , as for the home-born : for i am jehovah your god .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses in mount sinai , saying ,
1	six years thou shalt sow thy field , and six years thou shalt prune thy vineyard , and gather in the fruits thereof ;
1	and for thy cattle , and for the beasts that are in thy land , shall all the increase thereof be for food .
1	for it is a jubilee ; it shall be holy unto you : ye shall eat the increase thereof out of the field .
1	in this year of jubilee ye shall return every man unto his possession .
1	and if thou sell aught unto thy neighbor , or buy of thy neighbor ’ s hand , ye shall not wrong one another .
1	and ye shall not wrong one another ; but thou shalt fear thy god : for i am jehovah your god .
1	wherefore ye shall do my statutes , and keep mine ordinances and do them ; and ye shall dwell in the land in safety .
1	and the land shall yield its fruit , and ye shall eat your fill , and dwell therein in safety .
1	and if ye shall say , what shall we eat the seventh year ? behold , we shall not sow , nor gather in our increase ;
1	then i will command my blessing upon you in the sixth year , and it shall bring forth fruit for the three years .
1	and the land shall not be sold in perpetuity ; for the land is mine : for ye are strangers and sojourners with me .
1	and in all the land of your possession ye shall grant a redemption for the land .
1	and if a man have no one to redeem it , and he be waxed rich and find sufficient to redeem it ;
1	nevertheless the cities of the levites , the houses of the cities of their possession , may the levites redeem at any time .
1	but the field of the suburbs of their cities may not be sold ; for it is their perpetual possession .
1	take thou no interest of him or increase , but fear thy god ; that thy brother may live with thee .
1	thou shalt not give him thy money upon interest , nor give him thy victuals for increase .
1	and if thy brother be waxed poor with thee , and sell himself unto thee ; thou shalt not make him to serve as a bondservant .
1	as a hired servant , and as a sojourner , he shall be with thee ; he shall serve with thee unto the year of jubilee :
1	for they are my servants , whom i brought forth out of the land of egypt : they shall not be sold as bondmen .
1	thou shalt not rule over him with rigor , but shalt fear thy god .
1	after that he is sold he may be redeemed : one of his brethren may redeem him ;
1	if there be yet many years , according unto them he shall give back the price of his redemption out of the money that he was bought for .
1	as a servant hired year by year shall he be with him : he shall not rule with rigor over him in thy sight .
1	and if he be not redeemed by these means , then he shall go out in the year of jubilee , he , and his children with him .
1	ye shall keep my sabbaths , and reverence my sanctuary : i am jehovah .
1	if ye walk in my statutes , and keep my commandments , and do them ;
1	then i will give your rains in their season , and the land shall yield its increase , and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit .
1	and ye shall chase your enemies , and they shall fall before you by the sword .
1	and five of you shall chase a hundred , and a hundred of you shall chase ten thousand ; and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword .
1	and i will have respect unto you , and make you fruitful , and multiply you , and will establish my covenant with you .
1	and ye shall eat old store long kept , and ye shall bring forth the old because of the new .
1	and i will set my tabernacle among you : and my soul shall not abhor you .
1	and i will walk among you , and will be your god , and ye shall be my people .
1	but if ye will not hearken unto me , and will not do all these commandments ;
1	and if ye will not yet for these things hearken unto me , then i will chastise you seven times more for your sins .
1	and i will break the pride of your power : and i will make your heaven as iron , and your earth as brass ;
1	and your strength shall be spent in vain ; for your land shall not yield its increase , neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruit .
1	and if ye walk contrary unto me , and will not hearken unto me , i will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins .
1	and if by these things ye will not be reformed unto me , but will walk contrary unto me ;
1	then will i also walk contrary unto you ; and i will smite you , even i , seven times for your sins .
1	and if ye will not for all this hearken unto me , but walk contrary unto me ;
1	then i will walk contrary unto you in wrath ; and i also will chastise you seven times for your sins .
1	and ye shall eat the flesh of your sons , and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat .
1	and i will make your cities a waste , and will bring your sanctuaries unto desolation , and i will not smell the savor of your sweet odors .
1	and i will bring the land into desolation ; and your enemies that dwell therein shall be astonished at it .
1	as long as it lieth desolate it shall have rest , even the rest which it had not in your sabbaths , when ye dwelt upon it .
1	and ye shall perish among the nations , and the land of your enemies shall eat you up .
1	these are the statutes and ordinances and laws , which jehovah made between him and the children of israel in mount sinai by moses .
1	and jehovah spake unto moses , saying ,
1	speak unto the children of israel , and say unto them , when a man shall accomplish a vow , the persons shall be for jehovah by thy estimation .
1	and if it be a female , then thy estimation shall be thirty shekels .
1	and if it be a beast , whereof men offer an oblation unto jehovah , all that any man giveth of such unto jehovah shall be holy .
1	and if it be any unclean beast , of which they do not offer an oblation unto jehovah , then he shall set the beast before the priest ;
1	and the priest shall value it , whether it be good or bad : as thou the priest valuest it , so shall it be .
1	but if he will indeed redeem it , then he shall add the fifth part thereof unto thy estimation .
1	if he sanctify his field from the year of jubilee , according to thy estimation it shall stand .
1	and if he will not redeem the field , or if he have sold the field to another man , it shall not be redeemed any more :
1	and if he sanctify unto jehovah a field which he hath bought , which is not of the field of his possession ;
1	in the year of jubilee the field shall return unto him of whom it was bought , even to him to whom the possession of the land belongeth .
1	and all thy estimations shall be according to the shekel of the sanctuary : twenty gerahs shall be the shekel .
1	no one devoted , that shall be devoted from among men , shall be ransomed ; he shall surely be put to death .
1	and if a man will redeem aught of his tithe , he shall add unto it the fifth part thereof .
1	and all the tithe of the herd or the flock , whatsoever passeth under the rod , the tenth shall be holy unto jehovah .
1	these are the commandments , which jehovah commanded moses for the children of israel in mount sinai .
1	forasmuch as many have taken in hand to draw up a narrative concerning those matters which have been fulfilled among us ,
1	even as they delivered them unto us , who from the beginning were eyewitnesses and ministers of the word ,
1	it seemed good to me also , having traced the course of all things accurately from the first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent theophilus ;
1	that thou mightest know the certainty concerning the things wherein thou wast instructed .

1	added this also to them all , that he shut up john in prison .
1	now it came to pass , when all the people were baptized , that , jesus also having been baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,

1	and jesus , full of the holy spirit , returned from the jordan , and was led in the spirit in the wilderness
1	during forty days , being tempted of the devil . and he did eat nothing in those days : and when they were completed , he hungered .
1	and the devil said unto him , if thou art the son of god , command this stone that it become bread .
1	and jesus answered unto him , it is written , man shall not live by bread alone .
1	and he led him up , and showed him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
1	if thou therefore wilt worship before me , it shall all be thine .
1	and jesus answered and said unto him , it is written , thou shalt worship the lord thy god , and him only shalt thou serve .
1	for it is written ,
1	and jesus answering said unto him , it is said , thou shalt not make trial of the lord thy god .
1	and when the devil had completed every temptation , he departed from him for a season .
1	and jesus returned in the power of the spirit into galilee : and a fame went out concerning him through all the region round about .
1	and he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
1	and there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet isaiah . and he opened the book , and found the place where it was written ,
1	the spirit of the lord is upon me ,
1	to proclaim the acceptable year of the lord .
1	and he began to say unto them , to-day hath this scripture been fulfilled in your ears .
1	and he said , verily i say unto you , no prophet is acceptable in his own country .
1	and unto none of them was elijah sent , but only to zarephath , in the land of sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
1	and there were many lepers in israel in the time of elisha the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , but only naaman the syrian .
1	and they were all filled with wrath in the synagogue , as they heard these things ;
1	but he passing through the midst of them went his way .
1	and he came down to capernaum , a city of galilee . and he was teaching them on the sabbath day :
1	and they were astonished at his teaching ; for his word was with authority .
1	and in the synagogue there was a man , that had a spirit of an unclean demon ; and he cried out with a loud voice ,
1	and there went forth a rumor concerning him into every place of the region round about .
1	and he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she rose up and ministered unto them .
1	but he said unto them , i must preach the good tidings of the kingdom of god to the other cities also : for therefore was i sent .
1	and he was preaching in the synagogues of galilee .
1	now it came to pass , while the multitude pressed upon him and heard the word of god , that he was standing by the lake of gennesaret ;
1	and he saw two boats standing by the lake : but the fishermen had gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
1	and when he had left speaking , he said unto simon , put out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
1	and simon answered and said , master , we toiled all night , and took nothing : but at thy word i will let down the nets .
1	and when they had done this , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes ; and their nets were breaking ;
1	for he was amazed , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken ;
1	and when they had brought their boats to land , they left all , and followed him .
1	and he stretched forth his hand , and touched him , saying , i will ; be thou made clean . and straightway the leprosy departed from him .
1	but so much the more went abroad the report concerning him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed of their infirmities .
1	but he withdrew himself in the deserts , and prayed .
1	and behold , men bring on a bed a man that was palsied : and they sought to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
1	and seeing their faith , he said , man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
1	and the scribes and the pharisees began to reason , saying , who is this that speaketh blasphemies ? who can forgive sins , but god alone ?
1	but jesus perceiving their reasonings , answered and said unto them , why reason ye in your hearts ?
1	which is easier , to say , thy sins are forgiven thee ; or to say , arise and walk ?
1	and immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his house , glorifying god .
1	and amazement took hold on all , and they glorified god ; and they were filled with fear , saying , we have seen strange things to-day .
1	and he forsook all , and rose up and followed him .
1	and levi made him a great feast in his house : and there was a great multitude of publicans and of others that were sitting at meat with them .
1	and the pharisees and their scribes murmured against his disciples , saying , why do ye eat and drink with the publicans and sinners ?
1	and jesus answering said unto them , they that are in health have no need of a physician ; but they that are sick .
1	i am not come to call the righteous but sinners to repentance .
1	and jesus said unto them , can ye make the sons of the bride-chamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
1	but the days will come ; and when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , then will they fast in those days .
1	but new wine must be put into fresh wine-skins .
1	and no man having drunk old wine desireth new ; for he saith , the old is good .
1	but certain of the pharisees said , why do ye that which it is not lawful to do on the sabbath day ?
1	and he said unto them , the son of man is lord of the sabbath .
1	and the scribes and the pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath ; that they might find how to accuse him .
1	and he looked round about on them all , and said unto him , stretch forth thy hand . and he did so : and his hand was restored .
1	but they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to jesus .
1	and it came to pass in these days , that he went out into the mountain to pray ; and he continued all night in prayer to god .
1	and when it was day , he called his disciples ; and he chose from them twelve , whom also he named apostles :
1	simon , whom he also named peter , and andrew his brother , and james and john , and philip and bartholomew ,
1	and matthew and thomas , and james the son of alphaeus , and simon who was called the zealot ,
1	and judas the son of james , and judas iscariot , who became a traitor ;
1	and they that were troubled with unclean spirits were healed .
1	and all the multitude sought to touch him ; for power came forth from him , and healed them all .
1	and he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , blessed are ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of god .
1	blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
1	but woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
1	woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for in the same manner did their fathers to the false prophets .
1	but i say unto you that hear , love your enemies , do good to them that hate you ,
1	bless them that curse you , pray for them that despitefully use you .
1	to him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and from him that taketh away thy cloak withhold not thy coat also .
1	give to every one that asketh thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
1	and as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
1	and if ye love them that love you , what thank have ye ? for even sinners love those that love them .
1	and if ye do good to them that do good to you , what thank have ye ? for even sinners do the same .
1	and if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? even sinners lend to sinners , to receive again as much .
1	be ye merciful , even as your father is merciful .
1	and judge not , and ye shall not be judged : and condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : release , and ye shall be released :
1	and he spake also a parable unto them , can the blind guide the blind ? shall they not both fall into a pit ?
1	the disciple is not above his teacher : but every one when he is perfected shall be as his teacher .
1	and why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ’ s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
1	for there is no good tree that bringeth forth corrupt fruit ; nor again a corrupt tree that bringeth forth good fruit .
1	for each tree is known by its own fruit . for of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
1	and why call ye me , lord , lord , and do not the things which i say ?
1	every one that cometh unto me , and heareth my words , and doeth them , i will show you to whom he is like :
1	after he had ended all his sayings in the ears of the people , he entered into capernaum .

1	and when he heard concerning jesus , he sent unto him elders of the jews , asking him that he would come and save his servant .
1	and they , when they came to jesus , besought him earnestly , saying , he is worthy that thou shouldest do this for him ;
1	for he loveth our nation , and himself built us our synagogue .
1	wherefore neither thought i myself worthy to come unto thee : but say the word , and my servant shall be healed .
1	and they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole .

1	and john calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to the lord , saying , art thou he that cometh , or look we for another ?

1	and her parents were amazed : but he charged them to tell no man what had been done .

1	and they did not receive him , because his face was as though he were going to jerusalem .
1	but he turned , and rebuked them .
1	and they went to another village .
1	and as they went on the way , a certain man said unto him , i will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .

1	but peter said , man , i know not what thou sayest . and immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
1	and he went out , and wept bitterly .
1	and the men that held jesus mocked him , and beat him .
1	and they blindfolded him , and asked him , saying , prophesy : who is he that struck thee ?
1	and many other things spake they against him , reviling him .
1	if thou art the christ , tell us . but he said unto them , if i tell you , ye will not believe :
1	and if i ask you , ye will not answer .
1	but from henceforth shall the son of man be seated at the right hand of the power of god .
1	and they all said , art thou then the son of god ? and he said unto them , ye say that i am .
1	and they said , what further need have we of witness ? for we ourselves have heard from his own mouth .
1	and the whole company of them rose up , and brought him before pilate .
1	and pilate asked him , saying , art thou the king of the jews ? and he answered him and said , thou sayest .
1	and pilate said unto the chief priests and the multitudes , i find no fault in this man .
1	but they were the more urgent , saying , he stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all judaea , and beginning from galilee even unto this place .
1	but when pilate heard it , he asked whether the man were a galilaean .
1	and when he knew that he was of herod ’ s jurisdiction , he sent him unto herod , who himself also was at jerusalem in these days .
1	and he questioned him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
1	and the chief priests and the scribes stood , vehemently accusing him .
1	and herod with his soldiers set him at nought , and mocked him , and arraying him in gorgeous apparel sent him back to pilate .
1	and herod and pilate became friends with each other that very day : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
1	and pilate called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
1	no , nor yet herod : for he sent him back unto us ; and behold , nothing worthy of death hath been done by him .
1	i will therefore chastise him , and release him .
1	but they cried out all together , saying , away with this man , and release unto us barabbas : —
1	one who for a certain insurrection made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison .
1	and pilate spake unto them again , desiring to release jesus ;
1	but they shouted , saying , crucify , crucify him .
1	but they were urgent with loud voices , asking that he might be crucified . and their voices prevailed .
1	and pilate gave sentence that what they asked for should be done .
1	and he released him that for insurrection and murder had been cast into prison , whom they asked for ; but jesus he delivered up to their will .
1	and there followed him a great multitude of the people , and of women who bewailed and lamented him .
1	but jesus turning unto them said , daughters of jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
1	then shall they begin to say to the mountains , fall on us ; and to the hills , cover us .
1	for if they do these things in the green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
1	and there were also two others , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
1	and jesus said , father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . and parting his garments among them , they cast lots .
1	and the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , offering him vinegar ,
1	and saying , if thou art the king of the jews , save thyself .
1	and there was also a superscription over him , this is the king of the jews .
1	and one of the malefactors that were hanged railed on him , saying , art not thou the christ ? save thyself and us .
1	but the other answered , and rebuking him said , dost thou not even fear god , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
1	and we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
1	and he said , jesus , remember me when thou comest in thy kingdom .
1	and he said unto him , verily i say unto thee , to-day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
1	and it was now about the sixth hour , and a darkness came over the whole land until the ninth hour ,
1	the sun ’ s light failing : and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
1	and when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified god , saying , certainly this was a righteous man .
1	and all the multitudes that came together to this sight , when they beheld the things that were done , returned smiting their breasts .
1	and all his acquaintance , and the women that followed with him from galilee , stood afar off , seeing these things .

1	and it was the day of the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
1	and the women , who had come with him out of galilee , followed after , and beheld the tomb , and how his body was laid .

1	but on the first day of the week , at early dawn , they came unto the tomb , bringing the spices which they had prepared .
1	and they found the stone rolled away from the tomb .

1	and it came to pass , while they were perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in dazzling apparel :
1	and as they were affrighted and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , why seek ye the living among the dead ?
1	he is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in galilee ,
1	saying that the son of man must be delivered up into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
1	and they remembered his words ,

1	now they were mary magdalene , and joanna , and mary the mother of james : and the other women with them told these things unto the apostles .
1	and these words appeared in their sight as idle talk ; and they disbelieved them .

1	and how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him up to be condemned to death , and crucified him .
1	moreover certain women of our company amazed us , having been early at the tomb ;
1	and when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , who said that he was alive .
1	and certain of them that were with us went to the tomb , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
1	and he said unto them , o foolish men , and slow of heart to believe in all that the prophets have spoken !
1	behooved it not the christ to suffer these things , and to enter into his glory ?
1	and beginning from moses and from all the prophets , he interpreted to them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
1	and they drew nigh unto the village , whither they were going : and he made as though he would go further .
1	and their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
1	and they rose up that very hour , and returned to jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
1	saying , the lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to simon .

1	and as they spake these things , he himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , peace be unto you .
1	but they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they beheld a spirit .
1	and he said unto them , why are ye troubled ? and wherefore do questionings arise in your heart ?
1	and when he had said this , he showed them his hands and his feet .
1	and while they still disbelieved for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , have ye here anything to eat ?
1	and they gave him a piece of a broiled fish .
1	and he took it , and ate before them .
1	then opened he their mind , that they might understand the scriptures ;
1	and he said unto them , thus it is written , that the christ should suffer , and rise again from the dead the third day ;

1	and it came to pass , while he blessed them , he parted from them , and was carried up into heaven .
1	and they worshipped him , and returned to jerusalem with great joy :
1	and were continually in the temple , blessing god .

1	and when he entered again into capernaum after some days , it was noised that he was in the house .

1	hearken : behold , the sower went forth to sow :
1	and it came to pass , as he sowed , some seed fell by the way side , and the birds came and devoured it .
1	and other fell on the rocky ground , where it had not much earth ; and straightway it sprang up , because it had no deepness of earth :
1	and when the sun was risen , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
1	and other fell among the thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
1	and others fell into the good ground , and yielded fruit , growing up and increasing ; and brought forth , thirtyfold , and sixtyfold , and a hundredfold .
1	and he said , who hath ears to hear , let him hear .

1	and he saith unto them , know ye not this parable ? and how shall ye know all the parables ?
1	the sower soweth the word .
1	and these in like manner are they that are sown upon the rocky places , who , when they have heard the word , straightway receive it with joy ;
1	and they have no root in themselves , but endure for a while ; then , when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , straightway they stumble .
1	and others are they that are sown among the thorns ; these are they that have heard the word ,
1	for there is nothing hid , save that it should be manifested ; neither was anything made secret , but that it should come to light .
1	if any man hath ears to hear , let him hear .
1	for he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken away even that which he hath .

1	and should sleep and rise night and day , and the seed should spring up and grow , he knoweth not how .
1	the earth beareth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , then the full grain in the ear .

1	and had seen that some of his disciples ate their bread with defiled , that is , unwashen , hands .
1	( for the pharisees , and all the jews , except they wash their hands diligently , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders ;
1	and the pharisees and the scribes ask him , why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat their bread with defiled hands ?
1	and he said unto them , well did isaiah prophesy of you hypocrites , as it is written ,
1	but in vain do they worship me ,
1	ye leave the commandment of god , and hold fast the tradition of men .
1	and he said unto them , full well do ye reject the commandment of god , that ye may keep your tradition .
1	for moses said , honor thy father and thy mother ; and , he that speaketh evil of father or mother , let him die the death :
1	ye no longer suffer him to do aught for his father or his mother ;
1	making void the word of god by your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things ye do .
1	and he called to him the multitude again , and said unto them , hear me all of you , and understand :
1	and when he was entered into the house from the multitude , his disciples asked of him the parable .
1	because it goeth not into his heart , but into his belly , and goeth out into the draught ? this he said , making all meats clean .
1	and he said , that which proceedeth out of the man , that defileth the man .
1	for from within , out of the heart of men , evil thoughts proceed , fornications , thefts , murders , adulteries ,
1	covetings , wickednesses , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , railing , pride , foolishness :
1	all these evil things proceed from within , and defile the man .
1	but straightway a woman , whose little daughter had an unclean spirit , having heard of him , came and fell down at his feet .
1	now the woman was a greek , a syrophoenician by race . and she besought him that he would cast forth the demon out of her daughter .
1	but she answered and saith unto him , yea , lord ; even the dogs under the table eat of the children ’ s crumbs .
1	and he said unto her , for this saying go thy way ; the demon is gone out of thy daughter .
1	and she went away unto her house , and found the child laid upon the bed , and the demon gone out .
1	and again he went out from the borders of tyre , and came through sidon unto the sea of galilee , through the midst of the borders of decapolis .
1	and they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to lay his hand upon him .
1	and he took him aside from the multitude privately , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spat , and touched his tongue ;
1	and looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , ephphatha , that is , be opened .
1	and his ears were opened , and the bond of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
1	and he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it .
1	and they were beyond measure astonished , saying , he hath done all things well ; he maketh even the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
1	i have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat :
1	and if i send them away fasting to their home , they will faint on the way ; and some of them are come from far .
1	and his disciples answered him , whence shall one be able to fill these men with bread here in a desert place ?
1	and he asked them , how many loaves have ye ? and they said , seven .
1	and they had a few small fishes : and having blessed them , he commanded to set these also before them .
1	and they ate , and were filled : and they took up , of broken pieces that remained over , seven baskets .
1	and they were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
1	and straightway he entered into the boat with his disciples , and came into the parts of dalmanutha .
1	and the pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , trying him .
1	and he left them , and again entering into the boat departed to the other side .
1	and they forgot to take bread ; and they had not in the boat with them more than one loaf .
1	and he charged them , saying , take heed , beware of the leaven of the pharisees and the leaven of herod .
1	and they reasoned one with another , saying , we have no bread .
1	having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
1	when i brake the five loaves among the five thousand , how many baskets full of broken pieces took ye up ? they say unto him , twelve .
1	and when the seven among the four thousand , how many basketfuls of broken pieces took ye up ? and they say unto him , seven .
1	and he said unto them , do ye not yet understand ?
1	and they come unto bethsaida . and they bring to him a blind man , and beseech him to touch him .
1	and he looked up , and said , i see men ; for i behold them as trees , walking .
1	then again he laid his hands upon his eyes ; and he looked stedfastly , and was restored , and saw all things clearly .
1	and he sent him away to his home , saying , do not even enter into the village .
1	and they told him , saying , john the baptist ; and others , elijah ; but others , one of the prophets .
1	and he asked them , but who say ye that i am ? peter answereth and saith unto him , thou art the christ .
1	and he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
1	and he spake the saying openly . and peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
1	for whosoever would save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ’ s shall save it .
1	for what doth it profit a man , to gain the whole world , and forfeit his life ?
1	for what should a man give in exchange for his life ?
1	and his garments became glistering , exceeding white , so as no fuller on earth can whiten them .
1	and there appeared unto them elijah with moses : and they were talking with jesus .
1	for he knew not what to answer ; for they became sore afraid .
1	and there came a cloud overshadowing them : and there came a voice out of the cloud , this is my beloved son : hear ye him .
1	and suddenly looking round about , they saw no one any more , save jesus only with themselves .
1	and they kept the saying , questioning among themselves what the rising again from the dead should mean .
1	and they asked him , saying , how is it that the scribes say that elijah must first come ?
1	but i say unto you , that elijah is come , and they have also done unto him whatsoever they would , even as it is written of him .
1	and when they came to the disciples , they saw a great multitude about them , and scribes questioning with them .
1	and straightway all the multitude , when they saw him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
1	and he asked them , what question ye with them ?
1	and one of the multitude answered him , teacher , i brought unto thee my son , who hath a dumb spirit ;
1	and he asked his father , how long time is it since this hath come unto him ? and he said , from a child .
1	and jesus said unto him , if thou canst ! all things are possible to him that believeth .
1	straightway the father of the child cried out , and said , i believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
1	but jesus took him by the hand , and raised him up ; and he arose .
1	and when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , how is it that we could not cast it out ?
1	and he said unto them , this kind can come out by nothing , save by prayer .
1	and they went forth from thence , and passed through galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
1	but they understood not the saying , and were afraid to ask him .
1	and they came to capernaum : and when he was in the house he asked them , what were ye reasoning on the way ?
1	but they held their peace : for they had disputed one with another on the way , who was the greatest .
1	and he took a little child , and set him in the midst of them : and taking him in his arms , he said unto them ,
1	whosoever shall receive one of such little children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever receiveth me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
1	john said unto him , teacher , we saw one casting out demons in thy name ; and we forbade him , because he followed not us .
1	for he that is not against us is for us .
1	where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
1	for every one shall be salted with fire .
1	and there came unto him pharisees , and asked him , is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? trying him .
1	and he answered and said unto them , what did moses command you ?
1	and they said , moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
1	but jesus said unto them , for your hardness of heart he wrote you this commandment .
1	but from the beginning of the creation , male and female made he them .
1	for this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife ;
1	and the two shall become one flesh : so that they are no more two , but one flesh .
1	what therefore god hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
1	and in the house the disciples asked him again of this matter .
1	and he saith unto them , whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her :
1	and if she herself shall put away her husband , and marry another , she committeth adultery .
1	and they were bringing unto him little children , that he should touch them : and the disciples rebuked them .
1	verily i say unto you , whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of god as a little child , he shall in no wise enter therein .
1	and he took them in his arms , and blessed them , laying his hands upon them .
1	and jesus said unto him , why callest thou me good ? none is good save one , even god .
1	and he said unto him , teacher , all these things have i observed from my youth .
1	but his countenance fell at the saying , and he went away sorrowful : for he was one that had great possessions .
1	and jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , how hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of god !
1	it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ’ s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of god .
1	and they were astonished exceedingly , saying unto him , then who can be saved ?
1	jesus looking upon them saith , with men it is impossible , but not with god : for all things are possible with god .
1	peter began to say unto him , lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
1	but many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
1	and he said unto them , what would ye that i should do for you ?
1	but to sit on my right hand or on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it is for them for whom it hath been prepared .
1	and when the ten heard it , they began to be moved with indignation concerning james and john .
1	but it is not so among you : but whosoever would become great among you , shall be your minister ;
1	and whosoever would be first among you , shall be servant of all .
1	for the son of man also came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
1	and he , casting away his garment , sprang up , and came to jesus .
